  • Bio bags can now hold droppers.
  • Chemistry bags can now hold droppers, syringes and medical sprays.

06 December 2018

coiax updated:

  • Cryo tubes will only ever send one message, even if they are auto ejecting.

coiax updated:

  • Adds the Physically Obstructive negative quirk. A person with this
  • quirk can't swap places with other people when moving, akin to someone
  • always being in non-help intent.

Skoglol updated:

  • Progress bar should no longer appear below the hud.

Blobby and Crossbowby updated:

  • KAs no longer have increased reload time because of crossbows
  • The aiming beam will no longer spam chat when aimed at a reflector blob

subject217 updated:

  • Plasma cutters will no longer accept infinite plasma, and will stop you when they are full.

05 December 2018

Steelpoint updated:

  • A new advanced first aid kit is now purchasable from any approved medical vendor. The kit contains an array of advanced healing items for more complex wounds and injuries.

coiax updated:

  • Nuclear operatives have a Christmas tree during the festive season.

04 December 2018

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • dragnet no longer stuns on hit
  • dragnet traps are removed 10x faster than previously.

Jordie0608 updated:

  • Ban interface rework. The banning and unbanning panels have received a new design which is easier to use and allows multiple role bans to be made at once.
  • Ban search and unbanning moved to unbanning panel, which is now a separate panel to the old banning panel.

Steelpoint updated:

  • MK II SWAT Suit has been officially added to the game, the base model the Captains SWAT Suit is based off of. Currently it does not spawn in the game anywhere and is admin only.

Denton updated:

  • Fixed sparks and igniters not properly igniting plasma.

03 December 2018

4dplanner updated:

  • You can no longer pre-scan in the cloner

02 December 2018

Skoglol updated:

  • Monkey recyclers now connected to the xenobiology consoles. Upgrading it now increases yield from monkeys gathered through the camera.
  • Adjusted monkey recycler numbers. Down from 4 cubes to 0.8 cubes per monkey at t4 parts.

coiax updated:

  • On Boxstation, Cargo can optionally open up their autolathe to the public, via shutters. Some consoles and machinery has moved to accomplish this feat.

Dennok updated:

  • Fix sensor set by reconnect button in atmos tank console.
  • Add rate button to atmos tank console to set injection rate.

XDTM updated:

  • The wizard federation announces that the Curse of Madness is out of beta and is now available for purchase for 4 points. It causes long-lasting brain traumas to all inhabitants of a target space station.
  • The wizard federation declines responsibility for any self-harm caused by curses cast while inside the targeted station.
  • Due to the extensive testing of the Curse of Madness some unique new trauma types have appeared across Nanotrasen-controlled space.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Beanbag slug shells can now be produced at the security protolathe.
  • Beanbag slug shells now have the same metal cost as other comparable shotgun shells.

coiax updated:

  • Broken lights that are still powered will occasionally spark.

XDTM updated:

  • Added the desynchronizer device, buildable in science protolathes.
  • The desynchronizer can desync the user from spacetime, effectively making them incorporeal (but immobile) while it lasts. The effect can be ended early, and has a maximum duration of five minutes.
  • Requires the Unregulated Bluespace techweb node.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Nanotrasen has saved materials on emergency oxygen tanks by decreasing the size of the tanks while increasing the pressure- they still hold the same amount of oxygen, but it'll be hard to fit more in.

Skoglol updated:

  • Reduced the beam rifle shots per charge from 10 to 5.
  • Beam rifle no longer looks empty before it is empty.

coiax updated:

  • A wizard's scrying orb now grants both xray vision, and the ability to hear the dead to whoever possesses it.
  • However, as soon as the orb is no longer in your possession, these abilities fade.

coiax updated:

  • Adds the Spontaneous Brain Trauma to the event pool. Sometimes your brain just goes a little wrong.

actioninja updated:

  • Suppressed and dry fire sounds are now stored as a variable, and can be edited on a per gun basis.
  • The standard gun dry fire sound was collapsed to one sound instead of 4. They were all just pitch variations anyways, which is now covered by built in sound pitch variation.
  • Revolvers now have a unique gunshot sound that is slightly different for 357 and 38.
  • Revolvers now have a unique dry fire sound.
  • Revolvers now make a unique noise when emptying them besides just the sound of shells falling out.
  • Spinning a revolver such as the Russian Revolver now makes a sound.
  • Syndicate sniper kit now includes a suppressor instead of a "supressor."

tralezab updated:

  • spellbooks now count towards the survivalist objective if they were not used.

XDTM updated:

  • Added the Hypnotic Flash to the uplink for 7 TC.
  • The Hypnotic Flash temporarily confuses and pacifies those it's used on.
  • If the victim is in a mentally vulnerable state (hallucinating, insane, reduced mental activity) they will instead fall into a trance, and will be hypnotized by the next words they hear.

Skoglol updated:

  • Added click shortcuts to xenobiology console. You no longer have to aim with the camera eye to do slime science.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed chem OD's causing damage to robotic limbs.
  • Fixed wood golems repairing robotic limbs every tick of life()
  • Fixed vampires repairing robotic limbs every tick of life()...
  • Fixed shadowpeople healing robotic limbs every tick of life()
  • Fixed poppeople healing robotic limbs every tick of life()
  • Fixed adjustBruteLoss and adjustFireLoss not properly discriminating for limb status types.
  • Fixed bibles healing robotic limbs, because your false deity can't fix SCIENCE.
  • Fixed the Starlight Condensation, Nocturnal Regeneration, Tissue Hydration, Regenerative Coma, and Radioactive Resonance virus symptoms repairing robotic limbs.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Signalers can now be attached to active paystands to send a signal when a certain amount of money is deposited.
  • Swiping your card on a paystand you own will let you lock it down, preventing it from being unbolted from the ground.
  • Paystands now ask for how much you want to deposit when interacting instead of a static price.

Skoglol updated:

  • Added missing typepaths for syndicate implanters.
  • Stealth implant now comes in a box.
  • Changed the names of some syndicate boxes.

01 December 2018

coiax updated:

  • Alien infestations are not limited to once per round only, but will never
  • happen while existing aliens are alive.

Skoglol updated:

  • Kitchen whetstones now have a sound when used.

Zxaber updated:

  • It is no longer possible to purge a malfunctioning AI's Law zero if the AI is currently using a shell.

coiax updated:

  • You can no longer turn blindfolds into regular sunglasses.

nichlas0010 updated:

  • wizards can teleport out of their den again

nicbn updated:

  • Layered pipes no longer stick out of their tile, also vents and other machines will always be in the middle of the tile.
  • Layer manifold now loos like an adaptor.

nicbn updated:

  • All-In-One Blender UI uses a radial menu now. You can see the contents and reagents by examining.

  • spawners check allegiance

Lavalandby updated:

Skoglol updated:

  • You can now alt click storage (bags, boxes, etc) to open it.

  • You can now thank the clown car driver
  • changes usr to user somewhere because seeing usr triggers my bones

YoYoBatty updated:

  • turn_off proc for jetpack wasn't having user being sent in argument.

Denton updated:

  • Double capacity emergency tanks are no longer available on stations, regular shuttles and free escape shuttles. They have been replaced with standard emergency oxygen tanks.
  • The Curator's NASA set contains a full-sized oxygen tank instead of a compact double emergency oxygen tank.
  • Death Squads now start with double capacity oxygen tanks instead of regular oxygen tanks.

Mickyan updated:

  • the quirk menu went through some minor formatting changes

Skoglol updated:

  • The space pirates will no longer ask for pocket change.

  • Fixes grenades not changing their detonation timer when attacked by a screwdriver.

Denton updated:

  • AIs that get upgraded with a combat software upgrade now see a reminder that this doesn't change their laws or antagonist status.
  • Added logging and an admin follow message to AI combat/surveillance software upgrades.

coiax updated:

  • Sometimes a low level cloning pod will make errors in replicating your brain,
  • leaving you with a mild brain trauma.

  • Fixed being unable to interact with broken microwaves

28 November 2018

XDTM updated:

  • Spraying holy water on tiles will now prevent cult-based teleportation from using them as a destination point.
  • Quantum, wormhole and magic teleportation is no longer disrupted by bags of holding.

Skoglol updated:

  • Reduced ventcrawl lag greatly.

Qustinnus / Floyd / Ethereal sprites by Space, is that it? / Alerts and food sprites by MrDroppodBringer updated:

  • Adds Ethereal; a race which lives off of electricity and shines bright. If they are healthy they shine a bright green light, and the more damaged they are, the less they shine and the greyer they become. Their punches do burn damage and they are weak to blunt attacks!
  • They dont need to eat normal food and dont have nutrition, Instead they gain charge by going into borg rechargers, eating ethereal food or doign specific interactions.
  • all nutrition changes now go through a proc so we can override behavior

Skoglol updated:

  • Smuggler satchels should now properly be removed from the pool upon spawn.

22 November 2018

Barhandar updated:

  • Magboots will yet again prevent singularity from pulling you in.
  • Magboots will now also prevent being pulled in by gravitational anomaly.
  • Magboots will also prevent effects of supermatter pull, gravitational catapult and RnD gravity gun.
  • Being prone will now prevent knockdown-stun of supermatter pull, removing accumulating chainstunning that rendered CO2 delams impossible to escape by humans. You still can get chainstunned, but now you have a few moments between stuns to try and get out.
  • Said supermatter pull stun now has player feedback.
  • Ghosts (and all other things that have no business being pulled) no longer get pulled by supermatter pull.
  • RnD gravity gun and gravity catapult had their proton packs removed too and should no longer throw ghosts around.

Denton updated:

  • Clowns that are consumed by singularities now either add or remove a much larger amount of energy.

Thunder12345 updated:

  • Boxstation's detective no longer starts the round undercover in a random job's spawn point

Nervere and subject217 updated:

  • The cook's CQC now only works when in the kitchen or the kitchen backroom.

tralezab updated:

  • select equipment no longer pesters you with alerts if it doesn't have to!

Zxaber updated:

  • The teleporter computers's selection window now shows the name of renamed beacons, as well as their location
  • For consistency's sake, tracking implants now show the carrier's location as well as name.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Updated the corgi & parrot inventory panels to use the same formatting as other mobs
  • Fixed corgi inventory panels not closing properly.
  • Fixed the parrot inventory panel not closing properly if you're not able to interact with it.

subject217 updated:

  • Damage deflection is handled at the machine level instead of the door level now, so it can be applied to any machine.
  • The stacking machine now has damage deflection, so it can't be destroyed by things like pickaxes.

actioninja updated:

  • Guns now have their shot volume and variation of shot pitch controlled by variables instead of hardcode
  • Racking a shotgun is no longer louder than the actual shot
  • Shotguns now have a unique sound effect. Blat blat.

Denton updated:

  • Malfunctioning or emagged borgs now only give away their antag status if their interface is locked/unlocked successfully. The new message is: "The cover interface glitches out for a split second."

Mickyan updated:

  • The voracious quirk now allows you to eat junk food without limits and overeating will no longer make you sad! Isn't that convenient?

XDTM updated:

  • Mannitol no longer cures mild traumas.
  • Added a new reagent, Neurine, made with Mannitol, Acetone and Oxygen. Neurine can cure mild traumas in the same way Mannitol did, but does not heal brain damage.

Mickyan updated:

  • Security webbing is now priced as intended

Dennok updated:

  • Now areas_in_z get areas spawned by templates and blueprints.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed building a new camera with EMP upgrades in it's assembly giving it the X-Ray upgrade, and vice versa.
  • The AI Camera network firmware upgrade will no longer change the icon of the upgraded cameras, with made it very obvious the AI was rogue when the entire station suddenly had X-Ray cameras.
  • You will no longer be able to detect the usage of the AI Camera network firmware upgrade by examining a camera to see if it has xray / emp upgrades.
  • You will no longer be able to detect the usage of the AI Camera network firmware upgrade by trying to upgrade the camera (it's a software thing, not a hardware thing.)
  • Cameras rebuilt after being upgraded by the AI Camera network firmware upgrade will now retain their upgrades.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Cutting the shut up wire on a vending machine will now make the vending machine shut up.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Combat knives can now get embedded in their victims again.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Putting an item back into your inventory as a cyborg will now automatically turn said item off (ie welders, lighters, ect.)
  • Cyborgs can now longer conceal unconcealable energy saws (ie ones that are activated) inside themselves. They will now turn off automatically.

Denton updated:

  • Added a negative deafness quirk worth two points.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Supermatter shards going critical and shitting out arcing beams of extremely high voltage electricity that burn the hell out of you and everyone around you (and can potentially stop your heart) will once again stun you.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Swinging the singularity hammer around as if you were a damn tornado will now stun the people you hit once again.

  • New sprites for the Security, Medical and Diagnostic Night Vision Goggles.

Skoglol updated:

  • Sleepy-pens now cause reactions, just like syringes.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed exosuit console showing some code by accident.
  • Restored the ability to send EMP pulses via the exosuit console
  • Fixed tracking beacons being added to mechas located at ruins allowing you to metagame their spawning.
  • Fixed exosuit consoles presenting some values via scientific notation (ie pressure being 3.258e-5)

Denton updated:

  • Pubbystation's engineering conveyor belts no longer stop working when the nearby maintenance APC runs out of power.
  • Pubbystation: The Gateway shutter control button now correctly checks for Gateway access.
  • Deltastation: Added an additional single conveyor belt to the mailroom. Cargo technicians now also have access to the ORM room.
  • Deltastation: Removed a duplicate airlock/firelock near the mining office.
  • Added some plating and caution decals to Pubbystation's mail room.
  • Adjusted cargo access requirements across all maps: Cargo bay airlocks no longer check for mailroom access, but instead cargo bay access.
  • Added cargo bay access requirements to mining shuttle blast doors.

  • mice can be butchered

  • Fixed some door interactions not being logged at all.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Blobs can now upgrade their strong blobs to reflect projectiles at the cost of their normal health and extra brute resistance.

ShizCalev updated:

  • The hotel ruin now has a maximum room number to select from.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Paper airplanes can now have their hit probability adjusted by badmins.
  • Added syndicate paper airplanes. They are rather robust and are guaranteed to hit someone in the eye.
  • Added The Art of Origami to the syndicate uplink. This allows you to fold weapons grade paper airplanes. It will also allow you to catch paper airplanes when you have the ability enabled.

Mickyan updated:

  • lowered the concentration of miasma required to display a warning message

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can no longer move / reconstruct a vending machine on lavaland to access all it's contents for free.
  • Rebuilding a vending machine which originated from lavaland on station will now carry over it's original pricing setup.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Pricing of premium vending machine items can now be altered.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Nanotrasen Security has unveiled a newly designed Security Webbing, a minor upgrade over the standard issue security belt that is comfortable, tactical and able to hold an extra security item.
  • However, the webbing is not considered standard issue, so any interested officers will need to buy the item from a SecVendor out of their own pay.

Trilbyspaceclone updated:

  • cargo toy crate now has more toys

ShizCalev updated:

  • Lethal turrets can now target blobs.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • nicotine now metabolizes far slower, but is actually dangerous at high doses. Try actually smoking!
  • cigarettes don't last as long, but more slowly inject reagents to hopefully last its entire lifetime. if you need it to burn fast, try a pipe or vape.
  • overdosing on nicotine now causes oxygen and toxin damage, as the description said it did.

Denton updated:

  • Added three new .38 ammo types. TRAC bullets, which embed a tracking implant inside the target's body. The implant only lasts for five minutes and doesn't work as a teleport beacon. Hot Shot bullets set targets on fire; Iceblox bullets drastically lower the target's body temperature. They are available after researching the Subdermal Implants node (TRAC) or Exotic Ammunition node (Hot Shot/Iceblox).
  • Renamed the Technological Shells research node to Exotic Ammunition.
  • The "lifespan_postmortem" var now determines how long tracking implants work after death.

Basilman updated:

  • Slimes can now pass through grilles

  • The shift E & B keybindings now take the item in the slot if it is not a storage item. The hotkey help has been updated accordingly.
  • Fixed shift E & B not updating hands when it was used to put an item directly into the slot(not into a storage item but the actual equip slot)

07 November 2018

MrDoombringer updated:

  • you can now rocket jump with rocketlaunchers! Just aim at the ground and fire!

XDTM updated:

  • You can now pay for cargo orders from your account with the cargo requests console. Credits will be detracted from the requester's account instead of the cargo budget. A 10% handling fee on top of the order will be paid to the cargo department budget.
  • Cargo employees must still accept the order for it to be delivered.
  • The delivery will arrive in a locked crate that can only be opened by an id with the paying bank account.

bobbahbrown updated:

  • RCDs are now more environmentally friendly and can now recycle rods and floor tiles without having to reduce them to sheets first.

Skoglol updated:

  • New helper proc for alt-click turf listing, bypasses any interaction overrides.
  • Ghosts and revenants now use the new proc.
  • Ghosts can no longer toggleopen sleepers, adjust skateboard speed or close laptops
  • Revenant can now alt-click turf to list contents.
  • Revenant now slightly less nosy, use shift click to examine.
  • Alt-clicking the same turf again no longer closes the turf listing tab.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • You will no longer attempt to use an explosive lance to craft an explosive lance

subject217 updated:

  • Disabler beams now deal 40 stamina damage, so they should be a bit more consistent in knocking people down in 3 hits.

nicbn updated:

  • On BoxStation, there's a vacant commissary where detective office used to be. Detective office is now located where Law Office was, and Law Office has been moved to the adjacent Vacant Office B.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed prying open a door with a jaws of life not checking if you're still holding them.
  • Fixed Xenos being able to force a door open even if they picked up another object during the action.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Turrets will now correctly target silicon mobs when check anomalies is disabled.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Flying / floating humans will no longer get stuck laying down if they have no legs.
  • Alien larva will no longer get stuck laying down after ventcrawling.

06 November 2018

CRTXBacon updated:

  • Moves the clown mask south-facing sprite down one pixel, putting it on level with its other directional sprites. Henk.

  • Updated the robotics control console interface a bit. Borgs are now grouped by their slaved AI.
  • Fixed the robotics control console showing the cultist conversion button on borgs which are already converted.

04 November 2018

Mickyan updated:

  • Added various new moodlets
  • Most notably, the Laughter chemical and breathing small quantities of N2O can improve mood
  • Psicodine: a new chemical that can restore sanity levels to normal and temporarily suppress phobias
  • Happiness: a homemade drug that supposedly gives a feeling of total bliss and.. emptiness? That can't be healthy... watch out for side effects.
  • The suffocation moodlet now triggers correctly
  • The drunk moodlet now clears as soon as the drunkenness wears off

Skoglol updated:

  • Borg ion thrusters now stop draining charge when you can move without them.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Using your SecHUD just adjust wanted status of a mob while not adjacent to them will no longer give you a useless out of range warning.
  • Trying to strip or equip a mob while while not in range will now close the inventory menu.
  • Trying to strip a non-human carbon mob while handcuffed/not in range will no longer give you duplicate warnings.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Covering your mouth when you cough/sneeze can now help stop the spread of germs.

Denton updated:

  • Most upgradeable machines now show their upgrade status when examined while standing right next to them.
  • Added examine messages to teleporter stations that hint at their multitool/wirecutter interactions.
  • Renamed teleporter stations from `station` to `teleporter station`.
  • Changed the teleporter hub `accurate` var to `accuracy`; the old name misled people into thinking that it was a boolean.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed x-ray cameras going invisible when in use by a camera monitor.
  • Fixed cameras having the incorrect icon when an xray module is installed after construction.
  • Fixed cameras not having the correct name when proximity sensors are installed after construction.
  • Fixed camera assemblies not passing their upgrades to a camera during construction.
  • Fixed camera assemblies consuming your entire stack of plasma sheets when upgrading it with EMP shielding instead of just 1 sheet.
  • Fixed upgrades within a camera assembly disappearing into bluespace when wrenched.
  • Fixed upgraded cameras having their internal upgrades deleted while still functioning not updating the camera's attributes (mostly for admins.)
  • Welding/unwelding a camera assembly to/from a wall now consumes 3 fuel.
  • Deconstructing a camera assembly with upgrades within it will now give you a prompt on what you'd like to remove.
  • Added examination text to cameras and camera assemblies to detail their current construction status and upgrades.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Supplypods sound a bit nicer as the land now.
  • admins can now adjust the animation duration for centcom-launched supplypods
  • admins can adjust any sounds that are played as the supplypod lands

03 November 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Hydroponics trays now work again.

02 November 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can no longer try to tactically reload rocket launchers, making it become invisible and breaking it's rocket.
  • You can no longer unload a rocket with TK
  • Suiciding while holding a rocket launcher will now cause you to blow yourself up with it.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Crowbarring an airlock to remove it's electronics will no longer bypass it's electronics security shielding.

nicbn updated:

  • The close radial icon is now clickable in the middle and more visible.
  • Dropping or throwing RCD will make radial close.
  • The change AI display verb will change your camera to the core so that you can choose it.

karma updated:

  • being able to pick up blood crawl items if they are dropped and being unable to drop them for the rest of the round is now fixed

01 November 2018

The Dreamweaver updated:

  • Nanotrasen has received word of a high-tech research facility that may contain advancements in bluespace-based research. Any crew members who become aware of its whereabouts are to report it to CentCom immediately and are restricted from sharing said info.
  • The turf reservation system now dynamically creates new z levels if the current reserved levels are full.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Buckled mobs will no longer go prone when killed/stunned/ect.

Skoglol updated:

  • Revenants now only use stolen essence to unlock new spells. No more counting corpses or waiting for regen before draining.
  • Spell unlock costs adjusted accordingly, defile upped from 0 to a cost of 10.
  • Reduced blight cost to 75, more in line with its underwhelming nature.
  • Drain targets in soft-crit will be stunned, to prevent them crawling away.

Skoglol updated:

  • Ghosts can no longer examine the inner workings of modular computers.

31 October 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • The really black suit is now a -really- black suit.

Shdorsh updated:

  • Circuitry module

Skoglol updated:

  • Multitool powernet readout now includes load and excess.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Ammoboxes will no longer say 'there are 1 shell left'.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Suiciding with a gun will now say 'You pull the trigger', instead of referring to you in the third person.

Skoglol updated:

  • Eating is now more gramatically correct

30 October 2018

Barhandar updated:

  • Basic tools are now a starting node and do not need researching.
  • Autolathe tools can now be printed again without needing a design disk.

Zxaber updated:

  • Fixed borg organ bags causing brain damage when picking up brains.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed an exploit allowing you to teleport ammo out of a magazine.
  • Fixed magazine loading sounds playing at the incorrect location if you load the magazine via TK.

29 October 2018

Barhandar updated:

  • Pumpkin meteors on Halloween now replace catastrophic meteor waves, instead of ALL OF THEM.

cyclowns updated:

  • Fixes stimulum and nitryl reagents running out too fast

Basilman updated:

  • fixed blindness identification blindfold changing color more than once
  • fixed blindfold item being split in your inventory

28 October 2018

Mickyan updated:

  • the description for the Heavy Sleeper quirk now mentions that it also affects being unconscious. Some (not all) of the most common sources of being knocked unconscious are: explosions, CO2 overload, seizures, low blood count

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can now examine bars of soap to tell how many uses (roughly) are left.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Droppers will now work when squirting into the eyes if a mob is wearing a hardsuit but doesn't have eye protection on.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Pandemic computers will no longer have a clickable empty button if the beaker is already empty.
  • Pandemic computers can now be alt-clicked to eject the contained beaker.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Engineering techweb node now requires basic tools to be researched first.

Ikacid updated:

  • Hooch now heals assistants.

YPOQ updated:

  • Fixed a bug that caused fire extinguishers to often fail to extinguish people

Coconutwarrior97 updated:

  • Allows Grilles to be built on space turf.

Buggy updated:

  • Nanotrasen has added the Overlord lawset to their AI law database. Nonetheless, they strongly advise against using it under any circumstances, and insist that it is intended for research purposes only.

27 October 2018

Basilman updated:

  • Added the blindness quirk, good luck.

Swindly updated:

  • Fixed MMIs not being able to use mecha equipment
  • Fixed MMIs not getting mecha mouse pointers
  • Fixed MMIs not getting medical HUDs in Odysseuses
  • Brains can now switch to harm intent

Kierany9 updated:

  • Electric shocks are no longer capped at a measly 90(+-5) damage, with a proper engine setup and hotwiring, electric shocks can now do up to 195(+-5). However, for the most part, shocks do less damage than before at charges under 2 MW.

Poojawa updated:

  • fixes getFlatIcon breaking if an overlay was a color matrix

ShizCalev updated:

  • The supermatter shuttle's walls no longer look derpy.

bobbahbrown updated:

  • Getting tabled is now far easier to prove due to advancements in logging technology!

Denton updated:

  • Added hydroponics guard armbands to Hydrobe clothes vendors.

XDTM updated:

  • Being really close to death might cause surreal experiences, almost as if you could hear the other side of the veil.

ShizCalev updated:

  • The gulag reclaimer will no longer break when a mob is gibbed, and will instead dump the mob's equipment on the ground when the console is next used.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Manually inserting sheets into the gulag stacking machine will now properly add points to the console.

Barhandar updated:

  • Reagent dispensers that aren't chemdisp will no longer contain T4 chemicals.

Nabski89 updated:

  • Some animals now move their legs when they walk.

Robustin updated:

  • The heart attack disease will now actually stop your heart (again)

Floyd / Qustinnus (sprites by Mickyan) updated:

  • sanity can now reach its highest level
  • Adds HUD icons for sanity

SouDescolado updated:

  • For every object that creates 3+, replaced with a for(var/i in x to y) and sometimes combined into a list

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed items worn by a burning mob not getting burning overlays while taking damage.
  • Fixed items with special effects when lit on fire not having the effect triggered when worn by a mob.

Nero1024 updated:

  • Bare feet will now make the correct footstep sounds.
  • Other mobs will make the correct footstep sounds.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Random Events now have a follow link for ghosts!

ShizCalev updated:

  • Added some examine messages to disembodied heads indicating if it's missing eyes, or if it's brain is nonfunctional.
  • Added some examine messages to cyborg parts to indicate their current construction status.
  • You can now remove the power cell and cut the wiring out of a cyborg chest during construction.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Added examine messages for helmets & guns with flashlights (and bayonets.)
  • Fixed an issue where you were able to remove flashlights/bayonets that were supposed to be permanently attached to a gun.
  • Fixed an issue where you were unable to remove flashlights & bayonets from certain weapons.
  • Fixed a potential issue where adding a flashlight to your helmet would've caused you to lose other action buttons.
  • Fixed a issue where guns with multiple action buttons would break all but one of those action buttons.
  • If you have both a bayonet and a flashlight attached to your gun, you'll now be given a prompt on which you'd like to remove when using a screwdriver on it.

26 October 2018

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Blob overminds, sentient diseases, etc. can no longer dump out boxes. Sorry gamers.

SpaceManiac updated:

  • Destruction on Lavaland will no longer reveal space in rare situations.

25 October 2018

davethwave updated:

  • reduces electrical storm chance by half

kevinz000 updated:

  • You can no longer spam fire alarms. Also, they're logged again.

Denton updated:

  • The 'Industrial Engineering' research node now includes empty oxygen and plasma tanks.

ShizCalev updated:

  • L3 biohazard closets now contain O2 tanks & breathmasks.

Zaex updated:

  • Supermatter Shard is now placed in front of other objects.

Robustin updated:

  • "Floor is lava" event no longer affects flying mobs

Mickyan updated:

  • Deltastation: the vacant commissary camera can now correctly be accessed from the camera console

24 October 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Admins can now personalize their asay message color on servers with the feature enabled.
  • Moved some admin only preference verbs out of the Preferences tab and to a new admin preferences tab to help unclutter it / prevent accidental toggling of fun things.

actioninja updated:

  • Slime Management Consoles now state the number of monkeys available when you recycle a monkey.

YPOQ updated:

  • Anti-magic items will now properly protect you from the tesla blast spell

Denton updated:

  • The deep storage bunker APCs and airlocks are now locked by default, but can be unlocked with bunker access IDs.
  • Fixed the deep storage bunker's entrance camera. The scrubber and vent inside the entrance chamber can now be controlled by the adjacent air alarm.

SpaceManiac updated:

  • It is now possible to set a different most-base-turf per z-level.

23 October 2018

XDTM updated:

  • Phobia trigger words are now more noticeable.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • The centcom podlauncher now has better logging
  • Cancelling a supplypod smite will now not throw an error message

QualityVan updated:

  • Diseases that damage bodyparts only work on organics now

Fel updated:

  • Dark blue (AKA Chilling) crossbreeds are now available. Feed an adult slime 10 dark blue extracts to obtain one!

22 October 2018

BebeYoshi updated:

  • Penguins drops their organs when butchered.
  • Baby penguins only drop one meat instead of three.

Denton updated:

  • Sleepers now show a message if players try to unscrew the maintenance hatch while they're occupied or open. Fixed typos in sleeper/organ harvester messages.
  • Sleepers can now be pried open with crowbars.
  • You can open and close sleepers by alt-clicking them.

GranpaWalton updated:

  • Added a new premium drink to the soda machine called "Grey Bull" which gives temporary shock resistance

21 October 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Added a notice when a user damages a brain during removal via ghetto surgery.

Mickyan updated:

  • the order in which items are listed in certain vendors has been changed, giving priority to cheaper items and occasionally sorting by category
  • prices for a number of items have been changed, certain vendors have new premium merchandise in stock
  • decreased the amount of reagents contained in ramen cups & hot coco
  • Chaplains no longer have to pay for their equipment

Kierany9 updated:

  • Finding an objective target by role now actually picks a random target

ShizCalev updated:

  • Added a config option to automatically reopen the job positions of players who have suicided at roundstart.

ninjanomnom updated:

  • Gaps between sounds in some looping sound effects should no longer happen as much under heavy server lag.

20 October 2018

Dennok updated:

  • now you dont lose you pulled item on world edge.

Mickyan updated:

  • Metastation: The janitorial closet has been moved in the maintenance section of the service wing
  • Metastation: Added the vacant commissary where the janitorial closet used to be

ShizCalev updated:

  • Jobbans are now displayed in a more user-friendly time format.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed Syndicate MMI's having their name swapped when inserting a brain.
  • Added better user feedback when inserting a dead brain into an MMI.

QualityVan updated:

  • Zombies get claws on resurrection again

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Explosions will no longer damage wizards in rod form

Supermichael777 updated:

  • The Wizards Federation has bound the foul spirit Soul Snatching Willy to their service. Their necromantic stones are now a bit more 'assertive' about binding the eternal service of the dead.

Nichlas0010 updated:

  • the AI icon-selection menu now uses a radial.

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can now stuff physical currency into your ID's (as was intended.)

ShizCalev updated:

  • Tidied up ID examine messages a bit.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed a minor issue where vacant offices and the vacant commissary were being selected by GR3YT1D3 virus and EGALITARIAN events.
  • Vacant rooms now have the correct ambience.

18 October 2018

Denton updated:

  • Added more possible names that Deathsquad members spawn with.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Penguins now waddle.
  • Penguins can now be butchered for the source of their waddling.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Ban durations are now a little more user-friendly (to read.)

landscaping moonman updated:

  • Due to resolved manufacturer complaints, more aesthetic basalt tiles will be yielded in crafting than previously, in line with the results of other floortile products.

Mickyan updated:

  • DeltaStation: added the Vacant Commissary, the perfect place for enterprising crew members to start their own... enterprise.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Mineral (and wood/paper) doors can now be unsecured from the ground with a wrench (the wiki is finally accurate after like 10 years.)
  • Mineral doors can now be deconstructed with a welder. In the case of paper/wood doors, use a crowbar instead.
  • Paper / wood doors can no longer be dug by a pickaxe.
  • Attacking a paper or wood door with a lit welder will now set it alight.
  • Damaged paper doors can now be repaired by hitting them with paper (wasn't consistent with paper windows.)
  • Paper windows will now inform you that they can be repaired when damaged.

17 October 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Cutting someone's brain out via ghetto surgery (ie brutally chopping their skull to pieces with a fireaxe) now has a high probability of damaging the brain due to it's non-surgical nature.
  • Likewise, attacking a brain will now cause minor brain damage.
  • With recent advancements in bluespace medical research, damaged (not braindead) brains can now be restored to a functional state by splashing them with 10u of mannitol.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Monkeys are no longer masters of spacetime and respect the laws of physics when it comes to movement speed.

Fel updated:

  • You can hide in a disgusting bloated human suit like it's a tauntaun and survive a single casting of Ei'Nath!

ShizCalev updated:

  • Clowns and mimes will no longer have the incorrect name on their ID's bank account.

obscolene updated:

  • Humans can no longer equip pet collars

ninjanomnom updated:

  • Wisps no longer get deleted when you use a telepad or other form of teleport.

QualityVan updated:

  • Hugging skeletons is now possible

nicbn updated:

  • Attacking the fire alarm with anything that has force and won't deconstruct it will turn it on
  • Toggling the fire alarm now leaves fingerprints

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Instruments received from the express delivery beacon are now delivered via orbital drop pod.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Corgi collars can now be removed!

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed sechuds not updating when a user removes/inserts an ID from/into their PDA/wallet/computer while it's in their ID slot.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Clothing (bags, gloves, belts, uniforms, armor, ect) will now inform you if they are resistant to frost, fire, acid, and lava when examined.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Nanite chamber interfaces will no longer give you the option to install a program if there isn't one on the inserted data disk.

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • better game tips

Floyd / Qustinnus updated:

  • Legion core / aheal now only removes temp moodies
  • Legion cores now give you a bad moodlet

Floyd / Qustinnus updated:

  • Clown and Mimes their ID cards no longer show the name of some random weirdo.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Centcom-launched supplypods will now properly delimb you (if they are designated to do so) instead of touching you then literally yeeting all of your internal organs out of your body.
  • Centcom can now specify if they want to yeet all of your organs out of your body with a supplypod

16 October 2018

Swindly updated:

  • Chairs made of one sheet of metal now drop two rods when smashed

Kierany9 updated:

  • Assimilation has been updated!
  • Two new objectives have been added to promote competition. Hivemind hosts may now be asked to have the biggest hive of them all at round end, or multiple hosts will be tasked with assimilating the same target, and ensuring that no-one else does.
  • Hivemind hosts now get four objectives instead of three.
  • Assimilation and kill/maroon objectives are no-longer mutually exclusive.
  • A description of each power is now shown in chat once it is unlocked.
  • Neural Shock no longer tells the target why they got shocked since this reveals the mode way too early.
  • Repair Protocol no longer weakens with distance, as the targets are randomly selected.
  • Increased the number of antagonists from 1 per 15 players to 1 per 12 players (and still with a 50% chance of one extra). Still caps at 5 (or 6 with the extra) antagonists
  • Assimilation is now a continuous mode, like traitors and changelings, it doesn't end when all antagonists are dead.

ShizCalev updated:

  • AI core display screen can now be set in character preferences.
  • AI core display screen will now be restore when revived.
  • Corrected some inconsistent capitalization in the player preferences screen.
  • Readded some forgotten AI sprites.
  • Fixed Hades AI death animation not playing.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Monkey revheads now properly count towards active revheads.
  • Nonhumanoid revolutionaries will now only be considered for promotion to a head-revolutionary role if there are no human revolutionaries remaining that are valid for promotion.

Mark9013100 updated:

  • Added the engineering hazard jumpsuit, can be found in the engidrobe. Sprites by sgtsammac.

Nichlas0010 updated:

  • air tanks now respect the layer they have been set to

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • borg upgrades price changes
  • mediborg chemical upgrades have been unified

Moonlit Protector updated:

  • Introducing the 'Heroic Beacon', standing vigil over service the curator can assume one three different historic heroes, each determining their equipment and emergent playstyle to suit the player; a beacon can be found in the curator's backpack upon spawning
  • Become the Braveheart, a fierce scottish warrior armed with a ceremonial claymore, spraycan, kilt and a disregard for underwear with the scottish themed hero pack.
  • A unique mention is the "First man on the Moon" heroic pack, with a two piece space worthy suit, air tank & a GPS for recreating a key spessfaring moment in history.
  • The Curadrobe has been stripped & refilled full of helpful library supplies, including varieties of pens and glasses including the jamjar's.
  • The curator's explorer equipment & whip has been moved into the 'Courageous Tomb Raider' heroic pack; removed from the backpack & the Curavend respectively.

15 October 2018

deathride58 updated:

  • Mechs now properly filter out non-ascii input, and can no longer have null names

ShizCalev updated:

  • Admin revives will now properly restore mutant organs.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Due to a recent policy review by Nanotrasen Central Command, we have determined that personnel who have committed suicide are too great of a risk to be borged, and are making half of the Robotics staff's job redundant (we pay them good money to do that!) As such, suicide is now considered a PERMANENT decision.
  • Fixed a specific scenario where ghosts would not be passed their suicider status.
  • Fixed a specific scenario where brains that suicided would not have their suicider var corrected upon being revived.
  • Defibrillator units will now correctly consider 180 damage in either brute or burn damage to be the cutoff for revival (down from 181.)
  • Fixed mobs suiciding in VR.

CRTXBacon updated:

  • Adds the intelliLantern, a big ol' spooky intelliCard skin
  • crafting recipe for the new intelliCard skin (requires 1 pumpkin, 1 intelliCard, 5 cables and a wirecutter as a tool)
  • changed the intelliTater crafting recipe to match the intelliLantern recipe (but with a potato for obvious reasons)

Swindly updated:

  • Fixed urinal cakes being inedible

Confused Rock updated:

  • Pais can now install the loudness booster to play horrible music so they can sound and look awful at the same time!

Naksu updated:

  • the hazy chameleon effect has been restored to the saboteur borg's chameleon module

  • Fixed moth wings burning off if a mob is ignite while in space.
  • Fixed moth wings burning off if the mob had the NOFIRE trait.
  • Fixed Xenos that were on fire heating up for one extra life() tick after being put out.

  • Removed unused access defines.

  • portable pumps eject button to use the replace tank logic

09 October 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Suiciding no longer counts towards the "Die a glorious death" objective. Getting drunk on Bahama Mama's in the bar and blowing your brains out with a revolver while Pun-Pun is watching isn't very glorious.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed a runtime resulting in grown weapons not containing the correct reagents of the seed used to grow them.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Corrected a few instances where bluespace was referred to as blue space.

Swindly updated:

  • Added suicide for glowsticks

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can now unlock a locker by attacking it with a PDA.

Denton updated:

  • Security officers who have been assigned to a department now have access to more areas inside it:
  • Supply: Cargo bay. Engineering: Atmospherics. Medical: Morgue, surgery and cloning. RnD: Toxins.

nicbn updated:

  • Fire alarm is now simpler. Touch it to activate, touch it to deactivate. When activated, it will blink inconsistently if it is emagged.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Prebuilt AI cores will no longer drop the wrong circuit board when deconstructed.

08 October 2018

TMTIME updated:

  • Travis works again

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Cards will now let you know if there is no registered account with the card, and how to add one.

The Dreamweaver updated:

  • Rebalances the Kinetic Accelerators cooldown mod so that it's on par with other mods.

Denton updated:

  • Buttons are no longer indestructible and won't cause endless tesla zap explosions. Buttons on CentCom and other special areas are still unbreakable.

bandit updated:

  • The necropolis tendril is anchored again.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Examine text for modular computers now properly reflect their modularity and state which components are installed, as well as what is contained within those components. At this time, AI card slots, ID slots, and printers are implemented.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Certain toxins will no longer notify the mob of their presence with the "You feel a dull pain in your abdomen" message, which allowed some stealthy (and some nonharmful) toxins to be easily detected.

  • Badass syndrones can now use nuke op weapons

  • Pirates can no longer ransom themselves to CentCom

  • fixed invalid characters breaking chat output for that message

ShizCalev updated:

  • Caks will no longer override the bonus reagents provided in a donut when frosting them.
  • Caks can no longer create frosted frosted jelly donuts.
  • Jelly donuts will no longer lose their vitamins when they're frosted.
  • Fixed chaos donuts potentially doubling the amount of reagents added when microwaved with something else.
  • Donuts now always contain 1 sprinkles as was stated on the wiki. Frosted donuts have a chance at adding an extra sprinkle.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Cleaned up some rogue pixels on a couple BYOND premium exclusive ghost sprites. Thanks for supporting BYOND guys.

Fixes the service cyborg's RSF updated:

  • Service cyborg's RSF can now dispense items again.

  • Supplypods no longer detonate their contents

Denton updated:

  • Light bulbs now shatter and hurt people when stepped on.
  • Light bulbs that have been sabotaged with plasma will spill it when they shatter.

04 October 2018

oranges updated:

  • Mecha internal logging removed, admin only
  • Mech logging overhauled to not use an internal list

bobbahbrown updated:

  • Headsets now dynamically show in their description how to speak on any channels they can use when held or worn.

Naksu updated:

  • a couple of things still had adv_bluespace as their techweb dependency, that's been fixed

Whoneedspacee updated:

  • ash drake fire does less damage now
  • ash drake takes longer to swoop down now
  • tiles take longer to fully convert into lava now, slowing down the arena attack as well
  • fire breath now moves slower
  • triple fire breath for the lava swoop only happens below half health now
  • https://github.com/tgstation/tgstation/issues/40621#issue-365415326

Dennok updated:

  • small update of crashed ship

03 October 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Looms can now be attacked.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Underpowered emitters will now show up as orange instead of green.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Updated the implant pad. Implants are now removed by alt-clicking it (no more meme hand swapping BS.) Implants will no longer disappear into the void if it didn't go into your hand. Dialog screens will now properly update when inserting and removing an implant.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Free Golems will no longer have the incorrect name when using Envy's Knife on them.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Pac-Man / portable generators will now show the correct power output.

Floyd / Qustinnus updated:

  • Liver damage is now healed when fully_heal is called on carbon mobs

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Nanotrasen's ID cards are once again clearly readable from a distance, meaning employees can show their ID's to eachother again. The Director of ID-Card technology promises that the temporary unreadability of said cards was not an oversight, and was in fact an intended, yet undocumented feature. promise. Alt+Clicking cards now dispenses money, and clicking on the card in-hand shows it off.

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can now alt-click assembled assemblies to rotate them.

ShizCalev updated:

  • ID cards now work with vending machines again.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Nanite viruses are now enabled.

02 October 2018

MMMiracles updated:

  • Botany can now grow cotton to produce cloth for various jumpsuits.
  • Cotton can be mutated into a much more durable strand, allowing for the production of crude armor.
  • Rainbow flowers, an alternative for clothing dyeing, is obtainable through cargo's exotic seed crate.
  • A loom can now be crafted with some planks so you can actually weave that cotton into a usable fabric.
  • Fannypacks, softcaps, beanies and scarves are now craftable with cloth and dyeable.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Deoxyribonucleic Saboteur now exists again.

Denton updated:

  • Split chemical bounties into simple/complex ones and removed some that are disproportionately hard to acquire.
  • The "More Bounties" bounty now awards five instead of three new bounties.

Denton updated:

  • Tweaked Runtimestation to include uplinks as well as a room for lighting testing.

Frosty Fridge updated:

  • CMO and Roboticist traitors can now purchase the brainwashing surgery disk.

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • new icon for the atmos projector and forcefield projector

imsxz updated:

  • plasma cutter turrets have their old damage again
  • plasma blasts have their dismemberment back

XDTM updated:

  • Holding an ID in your hands uses it instead of your worn ID for authentication purposes.
  • If you don't have an ID in your id slot, the belt slot will be checked as well.

Shdorsh updated:

  • Grabber mode -1 doesn't require a target

XDTM updated:

  • Added scanner gates: these buildable machines will scan any mob passing under it, and it will alert when a set condition is met.
  • Possible conditions: Wanted status, Mindshield, Nanites, Diseases, Species, or carrying guns.
  • Can be inverted, so it will alert when the condition is _not_ met, and can be id-locked to avoid tampering.

YPOQ updated:

  • Wizards will no longer be stuck after using rod form while in a container

Denton updated:

  • Tweaked lighting in some areas to better account for night lighting.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Lights constructed by players will now respect the local APC's nightshift setting.

01 October 2018

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • The ceres shuttle will no longer overlap with centcom. The architects responsible for this issue have been sternly reprimanded.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Admins can now launch supplypods the old, slightly quicker way as well

imsxz updated:

  • general beepsky can now properly be constructed again

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • morgues have had their proton packs removed and as such no longer suck in ghosts on closing.

ShizCalev updated:

  • An antagonist holding a syndicate balloon will now receive a positive mood modifier.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Resolved a large number of instances where items would not work as their respective tool types (ie plasma cutters not working as welders.)
  • Using an item that acts as a multitool that does not have a buffer on an object that requires a buffer will now consistently provide user feedback for why it failed.

30 September 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed bottles not smashing properly when slipping on puddles/lube.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • massive service department nerf: space can no longer be extra crispy.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Nanotrasen's Alien Life Detection Department has issued new training for crewmembers when facing blobs: the crew is now able to actually discern when a blob is dead.

Naksu updated:

  • DB queries are now async by default, the code that runs in /world/New has been adjusted to continue blocking as it apparently is not allowed to sleep.

The Dreamweaver (Idea: Roth) updated:

  • Space Fashion has discovered a new way to wear bandannas. With some simple minor adjustments and ties, bandannas can be made into fashionable neckerchiefs!

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Crew Monitors now only track crew with nanites when said crewmembers are on the same (or station) z-level

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • fix: Lacking hands will no tell you that "your hands are full" in a few situations

basilman updated:

  • changed the time for agent box to turn invisible from half a second to 2 seconds

Mickyan updated:

  • After rigorous mandatory art training for the crew, many new graffiti styles are now available

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed a bug related to reloading RPGs

29 September 2018

Naksu updated:

  • squeezed a little bit more perf out of atmos

Nanotrasen Reserve Bank updated:

  • Holochips have been given a noticeable redesign, and now use a combination of color and shape to show how many credits are in an individual chip, along with using a new coloring scheme outright.
  • Holochips now show how many credits they contain in their name.

28 September 2018

Moon Farmer updated:

  • Both reagent universal enzyme & sacks of flour are now availible for their respective costs from the biogenerator.
  • New crafting recipies for donut boxes, eggboxes & candle boxes have been added to cardboard recipies for the collective benefit of service personnel and the station.

XDTM updated:

  • Added a new severe brain trauma: hypnotic stupor. Victims of hypnotic stupor occasionally fall into a trance, and upon hearing a sentence they'll focus on it to the point of obsession, until it is replaced by a new hypnosis or the trauma is cured.

Poojawa updated:

  • Fire Alarms are visible in low light situations

27 September 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Camera assembly upgrades can now only be placed in stage 3 (just before completion.)

Dennok updated:

  • Teleconsole now can be researched again.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Storage items and parcels can no longer be fried.

Whoneedspacee updated:

  • new arena attack where ash drake summons lava around you
  • removed old swooping above you, instead flies above you instantly
  • ash drake now spawns temporary lava pools instead of meteors falling down
  • ash drake takes twice as long to swoop down now that he instantly goes above you
  • ash drake now moves twice as fast
  • increases the odds of lava spawns in the lava pool attack
  • increases fire line damage and decreases lava attacks direct damage
  • ash drake fire now shoots in the direction of the target
  • changes times of certain animations
  • changes sounds of meteor falling to lava creation
  • a bug where ash drakes attacks did not damage mechs
  • changes meteor icon to lava creation animation from lava staff

Floyd / Qustinnus (thx to mrdoombringer for sprite + idea) updated:

  • The clowncar now comes with an inbuilt cannon that can be activated by emagging its circuits
  • cars can only kidnap if they have the CAN_KIDNAP trait
  • removes a dot too much in a to_chat in clown car actions

cacogen updated:

  • Space cleaner in spray bottles travels 5 tiles instead of 3 (doesn't affect other reagents)
  • Trash bag fits in exosuit slot of janitor biosuit
  • All soaps are faster
  • Soaps now clean all decals on a tile instead of just one
  • Soap now has limited uses (100 for most, 300 for NT brand which janitor gets)
  • Mops are considerably faster
  • Basic mop holds twice the reagents
  • Janitorial cart now refills mops completely with one click
  • Basic and advanced mops are more robust (8 force and 12 force)
  • Galoshes no longer leave bloody footprints
  • Chameleon noslips no longer leave bloody footprints
  • Bulb boxes can be used on light replacers refill them in bulk
  • Light replacer can be used in-hand to change all bulbs on a tile
  • Custodial barrier projector which creates solid wet floor signs that force people to walk to pass (available through service protolathe)

ShizCalev updated:

  • Nuke Ops now have the ability to purchase a usable RPG, as well as a couple different types of rockets for it.

MetroidLover updated:

  • E-Katana can now be stored on your back

26 September 2018

Denton updated:

  • Removed roundstart sulphuric acid beakers. These aren't needed as circuit boards no longer require acid to print.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Fixes advanced buildmode not having the picker

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • skate bounty now accept the item version of the sakteboard

Denton updated:

  • Geneticist and Chief Medical Officer traitors can now purchase a box of gorilla cubes for 8TC.
  • Changed the clown car uplink description to mention emag interaction.

25 September 2018

XDTM updated:

  • Added credit holochips, a form of semi-physical currency to use in transactions. They can be generated by id cards by drawing from bank accounts and can be used to make payments.
  • There is no limit to the amount of credits that can be stored on a holochip, but being holograms they are vulnerable to electromagnetic pulses, and may disappear if exposed to one!
  • Holochips can be split with alt-click, and can be merged by clicking on another holochip.

bandit updated:

  • Due to cost-cutting measures throughout the company, Nanotrasen has changed the recipes for food supplied to sustenance vendors in all station brigs. Nanotrasen prides itself in its quality standards and is sure crew members will notice no difference in taste!

XDTM updated:

  • ID Cards now only display payday messages to the owner if they're being carried. Cards on the ground will still display them to nearby mobs.

subject217 updated:

  • Fixed a typo with 10mm ammo casings.

ninjanomnom updated:

  • Orbiting is a little more aggressive about staying in orbit. The wisp as a result now correctly follows you over shuttle moves.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Fixed vareditted bonfires not properly igniting at round start.
  • Fixed vareditted pianos switching to minimoogs at round start.
  • Fixed some vareddited flashlights not turning on properly at round start.
  • Fixed all missing floor icons
  • Fixed bookcases at the Wild West away mission not being properly populated.

24 September 2018

cacogen updated:

  • Luxury shuttle now attempts to charge humans' bank accounts in addition to taking held and dragged money
  • Luxury shuttle now attempts to return change to humans' bank accounts
  • You can now pay for the luxury shuttle in instalments (mostly useful for handless mobs)
  • Luxury shuttle ticket booth messages are now spoken, so you can spend loudly

YoYoBatty updated:

  • Particle accelerator control box now uses multitool_act and better ui_interact
  • Particle accelerator wires can be opened by borgs with multitools now.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • Sustenance vendors are free.

Kierany9 updated:

  • A new gamemode called Assimilation.
  • Several probably-inhuman creatures wielding psionic powers, known only as Hivemind Hosts, have appeared onboard the station and must assimilate as many crew members as possible. Assimilated crew serve as vessels for the Host to use their powers through (and on), and as a Host gains vessels, they gain new abilities.
  • Vessels are not antagonists. Assimilation does not convert crew in any way.
  • Assimilated crewmembers can escape this nightmare by either getting a mindshield implant or by dying. Mindshielding vessels will reveal the identity of whoever assimilated them. Mindshielded crew are initially protected, but should a Host get strong enough, they can break these implants with ease.
  • Nothing is stopping Hosts from working together, but as their hives grow, so does the incentive to backstab. At 8 vessels, Hosts can probe the minds of crew and discover the identity of any other Hosts who have assimilated them, and at 18, they can steal every single vessel from a captured enemy Host.
  • Assimilation requires 25 players roundstart.

Denton updated:

  • Deltastation's hydroponics department now has an APC and no longer draws its power from the twilight zone.

XDTM updated:

  • Advanced Bluespace Research has been split in Bluespace Travel and Miniaturized Bluespace Research, with the former relating to static teleporters and the latter to small devices and stock parts.
  • Hand teleporters are now protolathe-buildable in research and engineering, requiring Miniaturized Bluespace Research.
  • Added Quantum Keycards, devices that can link to a quantum pad, and can be used on any other quantum pad to teleport to its linked pad.
  • Bluespace Power Technology now requires Applied Bluespace Research instead of Advanced Bluespace Research.

XDTM updated:

  • Sending an activation code to a nanite program will reset its timer.
  • Fixed self-deactivating programs being unable to be reactivated afterwards.

23 September 2018

Barhandar updated:

  • Plasma cutters now flash you (same intensity as experimental welder) when used for welding.
  • Plasma cutters also use charge to weld. 25 per most things like vents or walls, more for specials like airlock shielding.

imsxz updated:

  • plasma cutter blasts no longer have a pressure penalty, but do 1/4 their old damage

ShizCalev updated:

  • Grenade launchers will no longer report an incorrect number of live rounds.

bobbahbrown updated:

  • Unsecured grenade assemblies now show the number and type of beakers inside when not wearing science goggles.
  • Science goggles now show the type of beakers inside a grenade assembly.

Naksu updated:

  • RCDs now have a comfier interface

Shdorsh updated:

  • Fuel cell circuits are now using the right pin

bobbahbrown updated:

  • We are no longer shaked, but shaken.

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Ever since Centcom got their own supplypod cannon, they've neglected any of the station's requests for supply-pod delivered orders. The operators responsible have been fired (out of an airlock) and replaced with better ones. As such, Express Consoles work again.
  • Also, the centcom podlauncher verb no longer spams "Explosion with size (0,0,0)"

Naksu updated:

  • some floor tiles had their broken states broken by the list-culling PR a while back. they're fixed now.

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • traps check for antimagic

ShizCalev updated:

  • Every department has been given access to their corresponding mecha's maintenance features. These accesses are provided at roundstart, and can be altered by the HoP if need be.
  • In continuation with the mech accesses, station side personnel will no longer be able to access the maintenance protocols of CentCom & Syndicate exclusive mechas.

22 September 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • AIs can now unbolt again.

21 September 2018

Mark9013100 updated:

  • Added ERT backpacks, sprites by PlasmaRifle.
  • Replaced the old metal foam grenades with smart foam grenades in engineering ERT locker.

ShizCalev updated:

  • You can no longer put a pocket protector in your shirt pocket if you're only wearing a pair of pants. This also applies to pinning medals on your chest (owww.)

ShizCalev updated:

  • Flashbangs will now make a sound if nobody is around to see them. (honk)
  • Flashbangs now come with sparks and will also light things up around them on detonation!
  • Flashes, flashers, flash powder, and cameras also now produce lighting! Woo!
  • Cameras will no longer give you a prompt when alt-clicking them while not adjacent to them.

20 September 2018

MrDoomBringer updated:

  • Admins can now spawn things in ICly (as well as do a bunch of other cool new stuff) using the Config/Launch Supplypod verb!
  • also supplypods have been refactored

Time-Green updated:

  • staff of the locker no longer gibs or deletes people

Granpawalton updated:

  • toxins on all maps now have an unlocked chamber air alarm, 2 air pumps, a rpd, a heater, a freezer, and igniters
  • the pipe arrangements in toxins have been reorganized for efficiency

Denton updated:

  • Omegastation has been scrapped.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Gas sensors in the incinerator chamber will no longer catch on fire.
  • Airlock sensors are no longer completely immune to damage
  • No smoking signs are now flammable, fire warning signs are now fireproofed

octareenroon91 updated:

  • toolbelts will now show alien screwdrivers on the item sprite

ShizCalev updated:

  • The lavaproofing slime potion is now lavaproof!

19 September 2018

Naksu & octareenroon91 updated:

  • plasmaglass windows leave plasmaglass shards when destroyed, these shards can also be used to make spears.
  • fulltile windows didn't give you the promised 2 shards, this has been fixed.

Denton updated:

  • Changed a few wizard spell descriptions to better explain what they do.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Blood cultists using a stun spell now emit a flash of red light when.... they emit a flash of red light!
  • Blood cult stun spells now properly check for any holy items on the target mob.
  • Targets immune to blood cult stun spells will now glow with holy light for a short duration after.

SpaceManiac updated:

  • Non-TGM format shuttle templates no longer leave some of their turfs behind.

cacogen updated:

  • The luxury shuttle now accepts dragged money. Useful for mobs without hands.

18 September 2018

ShizCalev updated:

  • Flying and ventcrawling mobs will no longer make footstep sounds.

ShizClaev updated:

  • Bloodcrawling and jaunting mobs will no longer be consumed by chasms.

ShizCalev updated:

  • Lavarocks will no longer be invisible.

17 September 2018

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • combat knifes can stick in the wounds now

Frosty Fridge updated:

  • Reduced steps for reconstruction surgery & increased healing

AnturK updated:

  • Failsafe codes for uplinks are now available for purchase.

16 September 2018

Dax Dupont updated:

  • Fixes missing human mob subtype for felinids.

SpaceManiac updated:

  • Git revision info is now gathered by rust-g instead of manually reading .git files.

Naksu updated:

  • windows no longer hold whole instances of the things that pop out from them hoping for the day some assistant breaks the windows in reebe.

Naksu updated:

  • Added a new framework for saving memory on type-associated invariant lists

SpaceManiac updated:

  • The telecomms log computers now use the actual language of messages, rather than mob type.

15 September 2018

actioninja updated:

  • Bone Hurting Juice

kevinz000 updated:

  • All atom movables now have move force and move resist, and pull force An atom can only pull another atom if its pull force is stronger than that atom's move resist
  • Mobs with a higher move force than an atom's move resist will automatically try to force the atom out of its way. This might not always work, depending on how snowflakey code is.
  • As of right now, everything has a move force and resist of 100, and a pull force of 101. Things take (resist - force) damage when bumped into
  • experimental; Failing to move onto a tile will now still bump up your last move timer. However, successfully pushing something out of your way will result in you automatically moving into where it was.

Cobby (using cyclown's formula) updated:

  • Techweb point gen via toxins are now very-hard-soft capped at 50K point rewards. After 50K points have been awarded, you can still get points for bombs that would reward higher than 50K, but they are worth only a flat 1K (hint: it's not beneficial). Give those other bombs to mining!
  • Techweb toxins equation has been edited (once again)

14 September 2018

Administrative Moonman updated:

  • Fake nuclear disks no longer appear in null-crates, but can appear in surplus traitor crates with the regularity they had before.

Skoglol updated:

  • Power changes between power ticks are now tracked by the powernets and applied to the next power tick.
  • Power sinks now apply load before machines. This includes SMES and APC charging.
  • Electric grilles, ninja gloves, apc terminals and power sinks now use helper procs to add load.
  • Power beacons can no longer cause powernet excess to go negative instead of turning off.
  • Shocks can no longer cause powernet excess to go negative.

Naksu updated:

  • archaeology component no longer handles sand-digging, it has been disabled until someone works on xenoarch again.

Cobby updated:

  • Cyberorgans give small benefits (advanced versions now also get these obviously)
  • Cyber Heart - Gives Epinephrine once in hardcrit
  • Cyber Liver - 10% better health and toxicity tolerance, with 10% less lethality
  • Cyber Lungs - Can breath at 13 kPa oxygen compared to the normal 16 kPa

Granpawalton updated:

  • fixed some round start atmospherics differences on lavaland caused by the ufo crash ruin

YPOQ updated:

  • Stealth implants work again

Denton updated:

  • The EngiVend, welding and electrical lockers in Meta/Delta shared engineering storage have been moved back into the Engineering department. The reason for this is that Atmos techs never had ID access to them in the first place.

XDTM updated:

  • Added the experimental dissection surgery, which can be performed once per corpse to gain techweb points.
  • Rarer specimens are more valuable, so xenos and rare species are more efficient subjects.

Shdorsh updated:

  • atmos analyzer circuit not analyzing certain stuff

Zxaber updated:

  • Cyborg Self-Repair item no longer attaches an action button to anyone that picks it up under certain circumstances. You can no longer remote-control a borg's Self-Repair.

YoYoBatty updated:

  • Added signals for various mob attacking actions.

Garen updated:

  • Fixes soap cleaning things before it checks that it can.

13 September 2018

Skoglol updated:

  • Power sinks now explode within a reasonable amount of time.

basilman updated:

  • mobs without an attached mind dont contribute towards his grace ascension

Mickyan updated:

  • Gauzes can be deconstructed using any sharp object

WJohn & Naksu updated:

  • Nuke ops may now order a borg with the Syndicate Saboteur module. It's a streamlined engineering unit capable of extraordinary robustness by virtue of not only not being able to leave its welder in the shuttle, but also quick travel around the station via the disposal system. Oh and it can also disguise itself.
  • Syndicate medical and assault modules have received improved sprites

Denton updated:

  • Added nanite circuit boards to tech storage.

Crazylemon updated:

  • "Fill" Buildmode, "Area Edit" Buildmode, "Boom" Buildmode
  • Buildmode is now in modules instead of defining new modes by extra branches of switch statements.
  • Switches buildmode button icons to something with a slightly more refined background.
  • Buildmode now switches between modes using a discrete switcher, instead of by repeatedly clicking.

The Dreamweaver updated:

  • An unknown, adventurous greyshirt has discovered a way to make a special type of bola out of gondola hide. The effects of the gondola seem to rub off on the victim while attached.

12 September 2018

Denton updated:

  • Added new available items to all departmental protolathes. Keep an eye out for the new "Basic Tools" and "Basic Security Equipment" research nodes.
  • Made the AI surveillance upgrade available through the "Illegal Technology" research node.
  • Created a "Tool Designs" lathe subsection and moved most tools into it.
  • Made defibrillators easier to print by moving them to the basic biotechnology research node.
  • Health analyzers are now properly printable once researched.

subject217 updated:

  • The Clown Car can no longer move unrestricted in zero gravity environments.
  • The Clown Car now costs 20 TC to purchase.

Naksu updated:

  • crayons now have about 10% less shitcode

Denton updated:

  • Bees only inject the reagent they were mutated with. Non-mutated bees still inject toxin when stinging someone.

Denton updated:

  • Fixed various missing texture errors.

Denton updated:

  • Heat resistant species no longer burn their hands on lightbulbs.

Cobby updated:

  • Employees at Centcom's supply department have been asked to wear glasses so that you don't have to spread the adamantine across the floor to get the proper reward.

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • seed extractor and dna manipulator are now in the right tab

Denton updated:

  • Added a plasmaman EVA suit pack to cargo for 4000 bucks each.

11 September 2018

ninjanomnom updated:

  • Radiation toxin damage has been slightly increased.
  • Contaminated objects are overall a bit weaker but are easier to create in the first place.
  • Showers deal with high amounts of contamination much faster but aren't that great at dealing with weakly contaminated objects.
  • Atmos holo-barriers have been given radiation insulation like the engineering ones.

Denton updated:

  • Fixed the Cere emergency shuttle brig floor.
  • Removed access restrictions on the Hi Daniel shuttle's booze-o-mat.
  • Added missing surgical drills and cauteries to emergency shuttles.
  • Replaced boring high traction floors in the SnapPop!(tm) shuttle with exciting bananium floors.

Potato Masher updated:

  • CentCom would like to announce that new station AIs will now support updated surveillance software, allowing units to monitor multiple locations with ease with customizable viewing range, albeit at an overall reduced viewing radius.
  • Cruix's AI Multicamera mode has been finally enabled, with a new config option for enabling and disabling it as well!

Cobby updated:

  • emojis

10 September 2018

Denton updated:

  • Multitools and quantum pads now show infos about their buffer when examined.
  • Players no longer bash quantum pads with multitools that contain no pad in their buffer.
  • You can no longer link a quantum pad to itself.

Denton updated:

  • The CMO office and morgue disposal bins on Deltastation are now connected to the disposal loop.

Denton updated:

  • The damage caused by liver failure has been reduced, to give players more time to seek help.
  • Made feedback messages for liver failure/damage more obvious.
  • Fixed typos and capitalization in health scanner messages.

Poojawaw updated:

  • APCs are now able to be rebuilt in Maintenance

09 September 2018

Cw3040 updated:

  • Added Improvised Jetpacks, with approx. 2/7ths of the volume of a normal jetpack, acts like a hardsuit jetpack in terms of speed and can cut out at random!
  • Sprite by obscolene

Tlaltecuhtli updated:

  • .38 no longer insta stuns, it still deals 25 brute

Naksu updated:

  • ghosts will no longer lose their hearing from jumping between z-levels via orbiting

08 September 2018

granpawalton updated:

  • pubby atmospherics now has black gloves and smart foam grenades

ninjanomnom updated:

  • Mappers no longer need to manually update the size and offset vars on mobile docks while mapping.

  • stimulum now makes you stun/sleep immune and some generic stamina heal

Supermichael777 updated:

  • NTs crack archeo-gastronomers have discovered a long lost recipe for a meat based donut.

Mickyan updated:

  • the length of footprint trails from blood pools now scales with the amount of blood they contain
  • blood pools from bleeding will take slightly longer to congregate

ShizCalev updated:

  • Nar-Sie's name has been revised to Nar'Sie.

  • Made the self reference pins for reagents reference themselves automatically.
  • Made it possible to copy datas frop pin to pin with the debugger.
  • Removed ugly useless brackets from printers.

  • a new admin secret has been added to create a customized portal storm

  • Hand drills are now better ghetto alternatives for surgical drills than standard screwdrivers

  • Laser slug shells have been changed to fire scatter lasers.

WJohn updated:

  • Fixed pubby's bugged R&D tiles.

Denton updated:

  • You can no longer infinitely sell immortality talismans.
  • Added a cooldown message for the immortality talisman.
