31 July 2017

Joan updated:

  • Geis now mutes for 12-14 seconds and "stuns" the target, via a binding effect, for 25 seconds instead of initiating a conversion.
  • Geis's "stun" restrains the target and prevents them from taking actions, but its duration is halved if the binding is not being pulled by a Servant.
  • Using Geis on a target prevents you from taking actions other than attempting to pull the binding. If you are pulling the binding, you can dispel it at any time.
  • As should be obvious, if the binding is destroyed or dispelled, you can once again take normal actions.
  • Sigils of Submission are now permanent and have been moved from the Script tier to the Driver tier, with an according cost adjustment. They still do not penetrate mindshield implants.
  • Removed Taunting Tirade.
  • Removed Sigils of Accession.

Xhuis updated:

  • Removed an improper period from the supermatter sliver theft objective's name.

kingofkosmos updated:

  • Inhands for One-point bluespace-gravitational manipulator, DRAGnet and Chem Sprayer.

Joan updated:

  • Colossus's shotgun is now a static-spread blast of 6 bolts, making it more predictable.

Anonmare updated:

  • Surgical toolarm to protolathe and exofab
  • Toolarm tools are less robust but more efficient at surgery
  • Arm augments are no longer a huge item

30 July 2017

More Robust Than You updated:

  • RCL and Ghetto RCLs are no longer invisible
  • RCL action button now has a sprite

XDTM updated:

  • Eyes can now be properly damaged.

Xhuis updated:

  • Stun baton overlays now appear on security belts when active.

Xhuis updated:

  • Syringes now properly inject targets wearing thick clothing on different slots.

Xhuis updated:

  • Player-controlled medibots now receive a notice whenever they try to heal someone with too high health.

Pubby updated:

  • PubbyStation's layout is now more public.
  • PubbyStation's turbine engine is now in atmospherics.
  • PubbyStation's monastery can now be reached by transit tube.
  • PubbyStation's aux mining base is now in engineering maint.

28 July 2017

Joan updated:

  • Removed the Volt Blaster scripture.
  • Ratvarian spears can no longer impale.
  • Vitality Matrices now require a flat 150 Vitality to revive Servants, from 20 + the Servant's non-oxygen damage. Vitality Matrices are also no longer destroyed when reviving Servants.
  • Ratvarian spear damage changed from 18 to 20, Ratvarian spears now generate 5 Vitality when attacking living targets. Ratvarian spear armour penetration changed from 0 to 10.
  • The Judicial Visor's mark now immediately applies Belligerent and knocks down for 0.5 seconds. Mark exploding no longer mutes, mark explosion stun changed from 16 seconds to 1.5 seconds, mark explosion damage changed from 10 to 20.

Joan updated:

  • Sigils of Transmission can now drain power in a large area when activated by a Servant.
  • Interdiction Lenses have been removed, as they were largely only used to drain power into Sigils of Transmission.
  • Sigils can no longer directly be removed by Servants.

Joan updated:

  • Prolonging Prisms have a higher cost to delay, but no longer increase in cost based off of CV.
  • Base delay cost changed from 2500W to 3000W, cost increase per activation changed from 750W to 1250W, cost increase per 10 CV changed from 75W to 0W.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Badmins: Buildmode map generators have names in the list to select them, instead of paths.
  • Also, a new map generator has been added, repair/reload station. Use it VERY sparingly, it deletes the block of the map and reloads it to roundstart. THIS CAN CAUSE ISSUES WITH MACHINES AND ATMOSPHERICS, SO DO NOT USE IT UNLESS YOU ABSOLUTELY HAVE TO!
  • The reload station one tagged DO NOT USE shouldn't be used as it doesn't delete anything before loading, so if you use it you'll have two copies of things. That can result in a LOT of issues, so don't use it unless you're a codermin and know what you're doing/abusing!

ktccd updated:

  • Ashstorms no longer pierces the protected people to kill anyone/anything in them.

FuryMcFlurry updated:

  • Added mummy, scarecrow, skeleton, and jester costumes. They don't spawn on the map yet, so make sure to beg the admins for them!

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Sound should carry further, but should get quieter and quieter the further you are from it

More Robust Than You updated:

  • Nanotrasen has begun production of the Rapid Cable Layer, a tool that helps you lay down cables faster
  • You can now craft ghetto RCLs with metal, a screwdriver, welder, and wrench. They hold less cable, and may fall apart or jam!

  • Crafting satchels from leather now makes a leather satchel rather than a regular satchel.

Xhuis updated:

15 July 2017

Xhuis updated:

  • Time stop is now fixed, finally!
  • Time stop's sound now plays in reverse when the effect ends.

Joan updated:

  • Removed the Soul Vessel, Cogscarab, and Anima Fragment Scriptures.

Fox McCloud updated:

  • blood and gibs on turfs can no longer infect nearby people
  • Tuberculosis bypasses species virus immunity (it's not a virus!)
  • Disease and appendicitis events no longer infect clientless mobs
  • Disease event will no longer pick virus immune mobs
  • Appendicitis event will no longer pick mobs without an appendix
  • Fixed changeling panacea curing non-harmful viruses

14 July 2017

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Fixes IV drips not properly injecting the right amount of blood

13 July 2017

XDTM updated:

  • Viruses and symptoms have been havily reworked.
  • Symptoms now have statistic thresholds, that give them new properties or improve their existing ones if the overall virus statistic is above the threshold. Check the pull request in github or the wiki (soon) for the full list.
  • Some symptoms no longer scale linearly with stats, and instead have thresholds.
  • The symptom limit is now 6.
  • Viruses can no longer be made invisible to the Pandemic
  • Symptoms no longer trigger with a 5% chance every second, but instead have a minimum and maximum number of seconds between each activation, making them more consistent.
  • The symptoms Blood Vomit and Projectile Vomit have been removed, and are now bonuses for the base Vomit symptom.
  • The Weakness symptom has been removed as it was completely useless.
  • The Sensory Destruction symptom has been reworked into Narcolepsy, which causes drowsiness and sleep.
  • Viral Aggressive Metabolism now has a timer before it starts decaying the virus. It scales with the highest between Resistance or Stage Speed.
  • You can now neuter symptoms, making them inactive. They will still affect stats. Adding formaldehyde to a virus will neuter a random symptom. A bottle of formaldehyde starts in the virus fridge.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • Deltastation's auxiliary storage in arrivals can be accessed by anyone now.
  • Deltastation's cargo bay maintenance can now be accessed by cargo techs.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Personal Cabinets now have piano synthesizers for handheld piano playing.
  • Thank @nicbn for the sprites!

12 July 2017

Xhuis & Cyberboss updated:

  • New hivebot invasion event

11 July 2017

shizcalev updated:

  • Cerestation's emergency shuttle autopilot will no longer fly you in reverse back to Centcom!

Xhuis updated:

  • The tachyon-doppler array's rotation now has messages, sprites, and examine text.

MrStonedOne & Fox-McCloud updated:

  • Made pathfinding much quicker

10 July 2017

Xhuis updated:

  • Clockwork slabs now show icons of the components used in scripture instead of initials.

Tacolizard and Cyberboss updated:

  • Added two new organs, the liver and stomach. Without them, you won't metabolize chemicals.
  • The liver is responsible for processing all chemicals except nutrients. If your liver is removed, you will be unable to metabolize any drugs and will slowly die of toxin damage.
  • Drinking too much alcohol or having too many toxins in you will damage your liver, if it becomes too damaged, it will undergo liver failure and you will slowly die of toxin damage. Your liver naturally heals a small amount of its damage. However, it doesn't heal enough to offset stronger alcohols or large amounts of toxins, at least until they are metabolized out of your body.
  • to conduct a liver transplant, inject corazone into the patient. Corazone will prevent the patient from taking damage due to either not having a liver or undergoing liver failure. Corazone will metabolize out of the patient quickly, so at least 50u is recommended.
  • The stomach is responsible for metabolizing nutrients. Without a stomach, you will be unable to get fat, but you will also be unable to process any nutrients, meaning you will eventually starve to death.

Tacolizard updated:

  • Admins can now set a message/warning when they delay the round end, to be shown to anyone who tries to reboot the world.

factoryman942 updated:

  • Boxstation Robotics now has 6 flashes, from 2.
  • Metastation Robotics now has 40 sheets of glass, instead of 20.

RandomMarine updated:

  • Drones can now switch between help and harm intent.

Xhuis updated:

  • Mobs spawned by Necropolis curses are now immune to chasms.

Xhuis updated:

  • The BoxStation warden's office now has a crew monitoring console.

Steelpoint updated:

Steelpoint updated:

  • Station Engineers spawn with a Industrial Welder in their toolbelt.
  • Engineering Welder Locker now only holds three standard Welders.

JJRcop updated:

  • Fixed telekinesis remote item pick up exploit

24 June 2017

Improvedname updated:

  • You can now export cat ears/tails for 1000 credits

Expletive updated:

  • Maid Costume aprons can now be detached and reattached to any uniform.

Kor updated:

  • Robotic legs now let you use pockets without a jumpsuit, and a robot chest now lets you use the belt slot and ID slot without a jumpsuit.

That Really Good Soda Flavor updated:

  • Fixed nuclear bombs being radioactive.

23 June 2017

That Really Good Soda Flavor updated:

  • Added the ability for a holiday to start on the nth weekday of a month.
  • Allahu ackbar! Added the ability to calculate Ramadan.
  • Added Thanksgiving, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Ramadan, and Columbus Day to the possible holidays.

Xhuis updated:

  • Nearly-full goliath hide stacks now correctly have a sprite.

Xhuis updated:

  • You can now unfasten intercoms from walls and place them elsewhere on the station.
  • Intercom frames can now be created at an autolathe for 75 metal and 25 glass.

Expletive updated:

  • Adds the skull codpiece, which can be crafted from parts of lavaland monsters.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • The clowndagger now has the correct skin.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Makes old chat show while goonchat loads. Should goonchat fail to load, the old chat will still be operational.

21 June 2017

Xhuis updated:

  • Tablets now have a built-in flashlight! It can even change colors, as long as they're light enough in hue.

Nanotrasen Robotics Department updated:

  • Traitor AIs' malfunction modules have received a firmware update and are more responsive, with HUD buttons and more sensible menus.
  • Overload and Override Machines now function differently; instead of right-clicking a machine to choose a context menu option, you activate the ability, which lets you left-click on a machine to overload or override it. This also changes your cursor.

Expletive updated:

  • Flame thrower plasma tanks can be removed with alt-click.

Xhuis updated:

  • The names of several objects, such as the holopad and biogenerator, have been lowercased.
  • Added some descriptions to a few objects that lacked them.

Xhuis updated:

  • Alt-clicking the Show/Hide Actions button will now reset the positions of all action buttons.
  • Hints to the two shortcuts for action buttons are now included in the Show/Hide Actions button's tooltip.
  • (As a reminder, that's shift-click to reset the clicked button, and alt-clicking the Show/Hide Actions button to reset it and all the others!)

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Dressers are now constructable, and unanchorable with a wrench.

ClosingBracket updated:

  • Fixes small typographical errors on flight suits and implanters.

Lordpidey updated:

  • True and arch devils are no longer deaf.
  • Fixed some edge cases with devils getting two sets of spells.
  • True/arch devils can now instabreak cuffs.
  • The codex gigas now indicates if a devil is ascendable or not.
  • Hellfire has been buffed, it now explodes multiple times.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Nanofrost setting and metal foam synthesizer on the Atmos watertank backpack changed to "Resin", which is a solid, but transparent structure similar to metal foam that scrubs the air of toxins, regulates temperature, etc
  • Atmos holobarrier device swapped out for an Atmos holo-firelock device, which creates holographic firelocks that prevent atmospheric changes from going over them

20 June 2017

bandit updated:

  • Nanotrasen researchers have made the breakthrough discovery that Lavaland's plants are, in fact, plants, and can be harvested with seed extractors.

pigeonsk updated:

  • After a janitorial audit Nanotrasen has decided to further cut costs by removing the janicart's secret space propulsion functionality

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Grenade belts and bandoliers will no longer obscure half the screen when they're completely filled.

Tacolizard updated:

  • Some items now have custom force strings in their tooltips.
  • items with no force can still use a custom force string.

Xhuis updated:

  • Disablers now have an in-hand sprite.

LanCartwright updated:

  • Removed loot drops from Syndicate Simple mobs.

Xhuis updated:

  • The display cases in luxury shelter capsules will no longer spawn unobtainable, abstract offhand objects.

Xhuis updated:

  • The straight jacket now takes five seconds to put on.

nicbn updated:

  • Changed cryo sprites to Bay cryopods, which show the person inside of them.

Xhuis updated:

  • The station's heaters and freezers have been sternly reprimanded and will now drop the correct circuit boards and cable coils.

19 June 2017

RandomMarine updated:

  • Bonfires now work on lavaland!

Tacolizard updated:

  • Repurposed the action button tooltip code to add tooltips with the examine details of all held and equipped items. Hover your mouse over any item equipped, held or in your inventory to examine it.
  • Examine tooltips can be toggled with the 'toggle-examine-tooltips' verb, which can be typed or accessed from the OOC menu.
  • You can change the delay before a tooltip appears with the 'set-examine-tooltip-delay' verb, also accessible via the OOC menu. The default delay is 500ms.

Expletive updated:

  • Thanks to the invention of "Bill slots", vending machines can now accept space cash.

Xhuis updated:

  • Alien lockers now correctly cost two alloy to build, instead of one.

18 June 2017

optional name here updated:

  • 1D4 into Lavaland Mining base crate.

Expletive updated:

  • Paper frames can be created using wood and paper, and can be used to create decorative structures.
  • Natural paper can now be crafted
  • KorPhaeron can now start a maid cafe, if they so desire.

Expletive updated:

  • The Clown and Mime can now find their unique crayons stored inside their PDAs

optional name here updated:

  • Puny windows will no longer stop the progress of Ratvar.

bandit updated:

  • The Syndicate has been observed with supermatter technology. Nanotrasen is investigating potential tampering with its supermatter devices.
  • Traitors can steal supermatter slivers now. It works much like the plutonium core.

RandomMarine updated:

  • Compressed matter cartridge production costs now reflect their material worth at basic efficiency.
  • Compressed matter cartridges can now be exported.

Expletive updated:

  • Stacks of space cash now tell you their total value and their value per bill when you examine them.

17 June 2017

Xhuis updated:

  • Tablets with IDs in them now show the ID's name when examining someone with that tablet in their ID slot, similar to a PDA would.

Joan updated:

  • The Hierophant is a little less chaotic and murdery on average.

Expletive updated:

  • Nerds on the station will be pleased to know they now have pocket protectors.

RandomMarine updated:

  • RCDs now always use matter consistent with the material needed when building.
  • Floors now cost 3 or 1 matter to build, based on if a lattice exists on the tile.
  • Reinforced windows cost 12 matter. Normal windows cost 8 matter. (Both up/down from 10)
  • Glass airlocks cost 20 matter.
  • RCDs are faster at building grilles and plain glass windows.

Cyberboss updated:

  • NT now provides education on the proper response for experiencing the excrutiating pain of varying degree burns (You scream when burning)

optional name here updated:

  • Cryo cells work properly on mobs with varying max health values.

optional name here updated:

  • Penguins, penguin chicks, penguin eggs.
  • Penguin family to Winter Wonderland.

Expletive updated:

  • The Captain now starts with a deluxe fountain pen in their PDA.
  • The quartermaster, curator, research director, lawyer, and bartender start with normal fountain pens in their PDAs.
  • Cargo can order fountain pens via the Calligraphy Crate.

16 June 2017

Tacolizard updated:

  • Flashes no longer have a tech requirement

QualityVan updated:

  • The botany vending machine now has a stock of onion seeds

Xhuis updated:

  • The names of the hand drill, jaws of life, and emitter are now lowercase.
  • The descriptions of the hand drill, jaws of life, and emitter have been changed to be more descriptive and less lengthy.

Joan updated:

  • Cultists must be human to run for Cult Master status.

Thunder12345 and Improvedname updated:

  • You can now turn severed cat tails and ears into genuine kitty ears
  • Cat tails can now be used to make a cat o' nine tails, similarly to the liz o' nine tails.

MrStonedOne and Lummox JR updated:

  • Fixed icon scaling and size preferences not loading (Technically size preferences were loading because byond saves that locally, but that's not reliable because ss13 shares a hub)

15 June 2017

bandit updated:

  • Default short/medium/long brig times are now, in order, 2, 3, and 5 minutes.

  • High luminosity eyes will have material science instead of an error research type

Joan updated:

  • Being converted to clockcult will briefly cause your world to turn yellow and you to hear the machines of Reebe, matching the description in the messages.
  • The messages for being converted and for failing conversion to clockcult have been updated.

  • The medalboxes are now fancy.
  • New sprites for opened medal boxes.

  • Flamethrowers no longer say they're being ignited when you extinguish them

12 June 2017

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Added some code to detect the byond bug causing clients to send phantom actions shortly after connection. It will attempt to fix or work around the issue.

optional name here updated:

  • Flashdarks can no longer be used to examine head based organs.

Nanotrasen Robotics Department updated:

  • To aid in general-purpose cleaning and maintaining of station faculties, all janitor cyborgs are now outfitted with a screwdriver, crowbar, and floor tile synthesizer.

Expletive updated:

  • Paper planes are now the same color as the paper used to make them.

Joan updated:

  • Renamed AI liquid dispensers to foam dispensers.
  • Foam dispensers now activate immediately when clicked, rather than forcing the user to go through a menu. They also have better visual, message, and examine feedback on if they can be activated.

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Tweaked game options animal speed value to match live server

11 June 2017

Xhuis updated:

  • You can now pin papers and photos to airlocks. Anyone examining the airlock from up close can see the details. You can cut them down with wirecutters.

WJohn updated:

  • It is now easier to wire the powernet into box's telecomms SMES cell.

Nanotrasen Consistency Affairs updated:

  • You no longer see yourself in place of the user when examining active Spirit Sight runes.

10 June 2017

octareenroon91 updated:

  • Mecha tools now respond to MMI control signals as intended.

lordpidey updated:

  • Added F.R.A.M.E. cartridge to uplinks. This PDA cartridge contains 5 viruses, which when used will unlock the target's PDA into a syndicate uplink, in addition, you will receive the code needed to unlock the uplink again, if you so desire.
  • If you use telecrystals on a F.R.A.M.E. cartridge, the next time it is used, it will also give those crystals to the target uplink.

Expletive updated:

  • Glass tables are shinier

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Cloning dismembered heads and brains now respects husking and other clone preventing disabilities.

09 June 2017

TrustyGun updated:

  • Some of the clown's toys have been moved into a crate in the theater. If you think you are missing something, check in there.
  • Wooden crates have been added. You can construct them with 6 wooden planks, and deconstruct them the same way as regular crates

oranges updated:

  • Medical record descriptions are single inputs now

Tacolizard and Cyberboss, idea by RandomMarine updated:

  • You can now add a commendation message when pinning a medal on someone.
  • Medal commendations will be displayed when the round ends.
  • Refactored the outfit datum to allow accessories as part of an outfit.
  • The Captain spawns with the Medal of Captaincy again.

Nanotrasen Shiny Object Appreciation Club updated:

  • The RD and HoS now receive medal lockboxes in their lockers, containing science and security medals, respectively.

oranges updated:

  • Security minor and major crime descriptors are now a single line input, making it easier to add them

08 June 2017

Lzimann + Cyberboss updated:

  • Ported goonchat. Much less laggy and crashy than BYOND chat. + Frills!

Xhuis updated:

  • Defibrillator paddles will no longer stick to your hands, and will snap back onto the unit if you drop them somehow.

Expletive updated:

  • The detective's flask has Hearty Punch instead of whiskey.
  • The Detective's fedora no longer clips with hair.
  • Adds 91 new sprites to fix clipping issues with the Detective's fedora and hair.
  • Change the standard fedora to match the detective and treasure hunter variants.
  • Detective, Treasure Hunter, and standard fedoras now all benefit from new sprites.

lzimann updated:

  • Xeno queens can no longer be maids

Robustin updated:

  • The blood cult can only attempt to summon Nar-Sie in one of three rooms that are randomly selected at round-start.

Joan updated:

  • Added Prolonging Prism as an application scripture.
  • Prolonging Prism will delay the arrival of an emergency shuttle by 2 minutes at the cost of 2500W of power plus 75W for every 10 CV and 750W for every previous activation. In addition to the high cost, it very obviously affects the shuttle dock and leaves an obvious trail to the prism.

Joan updated:

  • Script scripture now requires 6 Servants to unlock, from 5, and Application scripture now requires 9 Servants to unlock, from 8.

oranges updated:

  • Added stungloves to the brain damage lines

4dplanner updated:

  • traitors show up on antagHUD

QualityVan updated:

  • Cremators now still work when there's only one thing in them

QualityVan updated:

  • The ORM now uses the intended amount of resources when making alloys

QualityVan updated:

  • Cyborgs can no longer alt-click their material stacks to split them

07 June 2017

NanoTrasen Public Relations Department updated:

  • A mining accident has released large amounts of space dust, which is starting to drift near our stations. Don't panic, it's probably safe.

Nanotrasen Plastic Surgery Advert updated:

  • Are you a mutant? Were you born hideously deformed? Do you have ears growing out of the top of your head? Or even a tail? Don't worry, with our patented surgical techniques, Nanotrasen's highly trained medical staff can make you normal! Schedule an appointment, and one of our surgeons can see you same day.
  • Cat ears now give you double the ear damage.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Daemons are no longer totally disabled if you drop below the servant requirement.
  • Instead, Tinkerer's Daemons will disable until the number of active daemons is equal to or less than one-fifth of the living Servants.
  • Tinkerer's Daemons produce components very slightly slower.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Tracking implants and chem implants have been added to rnd
  • Adrenaline and freedom implants have been removed from rnd

QualityVan updated:

  • Surplus rifles are no longer invisible while unloaded

Expletive updated:

  • New plasma medals have been added to the Captain's medal box. Don't get them too warm.
  • New sprites for plasma medals.
  • Icon and worn sprites for all medals and the lawyer's badge have been improved. Worn medals more closely match their icons.
  • The bone talisman is an accessory again, so it's not useless.
  • It also has a new worn sprite, based on an arm band.
  • Ties have been removed from accessories.dmi and vice versa. Same for
  • the explorer's webbing sprites that were in there. ties.dmi is now neck.dmi, and has sprites for scarves, ties, sthetoscopes, etc.
  • Examining an accessory now tells you how to use it.

Joan updated:

  • Renamed Volt Void to Volt Blaster.
  • Volt Blaster does not consume power when firing and does not cause backlash if you don't fire.
  • Volt Blaster does 25 damage, from 20-40 depending on power, and has 5 shots, from 4, over its duration.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The Changeling Transformation Sting is once again stealthy. However, it no longer transfers mutations.
  • The chemical cost of Transformation Sting has been increased to 50

06 June 2017

Joan updated:

  • KA modkits in necropolis chests are now design discs with designs for those modkits, to force miners to bring back minerals.

05 June 2017

steamp0rt updated:

  • you can burn your brains out with a flashlight if you're tired of life

Joan updated:

  • Cogscarabs can no longer use guns.

Joan updated:

  • Renames Clockwork Proselytizers to Replica Fabricators.
  • Replica Fabricators can directly consume floor tiles, rods, metal, and plasteel for power instead of needing to convert to brass first.

Joan updated:

  • Added a new unique Kinetic Accelerator module to necropolis chests.

Joan updated:

  • Removes Revenant scriptures entirely.

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult scripture tiers can no longer be lost by dipping below their requirements once they are unlocked.

Expletive updated:

  • The Ore Redemption Machine has been ported to TGUI. New features include the addition of "Release All" and "Smelt All" buttons.
  • The Ore Redemption Machine now be loaded with sheets of material.
  • The Ore Redemption Machine can now 'smelt' Reinforced Glass.

InsaneHyena updated:

  • Removes crashed marine transport from lavaland

MMMiracles updated:

  • Deepstorage ruin has been redone to be more self-sufficient and up to better mapping standards.

Joan updated:

  • Only human and silicon servants can help recite multi-invoker scriptures. This means cogscarabs, clockwork marauders, and anima fragments DO NOT COUNT for scriptures that require multiple invokers.

04 June 2017

Expletive updated:

  • Riot suits no longer hide jumpsuits.

Expletive updated:

  • Bulldog Shotguns should update their sprite properly when you remove the magazine.

Joan updated:

  • Rod Form now costs 2 points, from 3.
  • Rod Form now does 70 damage, from 160, but gains 20 damage, per upgrade, when upgraded. This means you'll need to spend 6 points on it to instantly crit people from full health.

Swindly updated:

  • Chemical grenades are no longer permanently disabled after being unlocked by wirecutters after being primed.

Expletive updated:

  • Many stacks now update their sprite based on their amount.
  • Stacks will now weigh less if they're less than full.
  • Added new icon states for glass, reinforced glass, metal, plasteel, plastic, plasma, plastitanium, titanium, gold, silver, adamantine, brass, bruise packs, ointment, gauze, cloth, leather, wet leather, hairless hide, human hide, ash drake hide, goliath hide, bones, sandstone blocks, and snow blocks.
  • Some lavaland stacks' max amounts have been reduced.

03 June 2017

Mothership Epsilon updated:

  • All your base are belong to us.

Expletive updated:

  • The crafting menu now has subcategories!
  • Food recipe categories have been combined as subcategories of the Foods category.
  • Weaponry and Ammunition have been combined as subcategories of the Weaponry category.

WJohnston updated:

  • Deltastation's south nuke op shuttle location should no longer be possible to teleport into by moving off the map and back on, and moved the rest closer to the station.

Expletive updated:

  • The Seed Vault's chemical dispenser now has all the chemicals a pod person could want.

Expletive updated:

  • Chem Dispensers now store their power in their batteries.
  • Instead of being based on battery and capacitor ratings, recharge delay for portable chem dispensers is now based on their capacitor and matter bin ratings.

Penguaro updated:

  • [Box] Removes extra/unattached vent from Xeno Lab

Improvedname updated:

  • Janitors now start with a flyswatter

02 June 2017

p440 updated:

  • Fixed duping cable coils with magic APC terminals
  • Fixed invalid icon state for empty APCs

octareenroon91 updated:

  • Attempts to add items to a storage container beyond its slots limit will now obtain a failure message again.

Joan updated:

  • Goliaths, Watchers, and Legions have a small chance of dropping a kinetic crusher trophy item when killed with a kinetic crusher. Like the boss trophy items, these give various effects.
  • Kinetic crushers recharge very slightly slower.

Swindly updated:

  • Nitrous oxide no longer produces water as a by-product, requires 2 parts ammonia instead of 3, and produces 5 parts when made instead of 2.

QualityVan updated:

  • The tactical rigging in op closets is more tacticool

Nanotrasen Mining Alert updated:

  • Nanotrasen's mining operations have created far more corpses than an entire galaxy of cooks could hope to deal with. To solve this, we decided to just dump them all from orbit onto the barren lava planet. Unfortunately, the creatures called "Legion" have infested a great number of them, and you can now commonly find the bodies of former Nanotrasen employees left behind. Additionally, there are reports of natives, other settlers, and even stranger things found among the corpses.

Joan updated:

  • Three unique Kinetic Accelerator modules will now appear in necropolis chests.

  • Gang turrets now follow the mouse of the person using them! Yay!

31 May 2017

Expletive updated:

  • Adds the NT75 Electromagnetic Power Inducer, a tool which can be used to quickly recharge many devices! They can be found in Electrical Closets, the CE's locker, ordered by cargo, or created in RnD.

30 May 2017

Expletive updated:

  • Luxury versions of the bluespace shelter capsule are now available! Purchase them at the mining equipment vendor.
  • Cardboard cutouts have a new option: Xenomorph Maid
  • Black Carpet can now be crafted using a stack of carpet and a black crayon.
  • Black fancy tables can now be crafted using Black Carpet.
  • Shower curtains can now be recoloured with crayons, unscrewed from the floor, disassembled with wire cutters, and reassembled using cloth, plastic, and a metal rod.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Research and Development have recieved designs for new prototype Beam Marksman Rifles. These rifles require a short aiming cycle to fire, however, have extreme velocity over other weapons.
  • Aiming time is 2 seconds, hold down mouse to aim, aiming time increases if you change your aim based on angle changed, or if you move while aiming. The weapon can not be fired while unscoped.
  • However, someone tripped and pulled out the power cord while your servers were being updated with the latest revision of accelerator laser cannons. All data have been lost...

bandit updated:

  • The officer's sabre standard in Nanotrasen captain rollouts can be used to remove the tails of lizard traitors, or lizards in general.

  • Abductors have learned how to properly delete the memories of their test subjects.

28 May 2017

Steelpoint updated:

  • Central Command has listened to complaints and, as such, has now stationed "real" Private Security Officers at centcom docks.
  • A new Nanotrasen Security Officer NPC variant is available to admins, this 'peaceful' version will only attack people who attack it first. Great for keeping order.

Swindly updated:

  • fixed not being able to attach heads without brainmobs in them

QualityVan updated:

  • Crew monitoring consoles once again have minimaps while you're on the station level

Steelpoint updated:

  • A New Iron Hawk troop transport ruin has been added to lavaland. Can the sole surviving Marine somehow survive the horrors of lavaland? Lore fluff included.

QualityVan updated:

  • Cloning pods which are interrupted by a emagging will now produce a slightly lumpier smoothie
  • Cloning pods that have stopped cloning early can no longer be broken open to extract leftover parts

cacogen updated:

  • Adds AI follow links to holopad speech and PDA messages. Note that PDA messages point to the owner of the PDA and not the PDA's actual location.
  • Fixes PDA icon not showing up beside received messages for AIs

Joan updated:

  • The kinetic crusher can now gain bonus effects via trophy items gained by killing bosses with it.
  • Yes, you do have to kill the boss primarily doing damage via the kinetic crusher, or you won't get the trophy item and the bonus effect it grants.

QualityVan updated:

  • Bayonets can now be used for butchery

cacogen updated:

  • You can now rename dog beds by buckling a new owner to them
  • Dogs that spawn in an area with a vacant bed will take possession of and rename the bed

27 May 2017

Expletive updated:

  • E-Cigarettes can now fit in your pocket.

Joan updated:

  • Necropolis tendrils will once again emit light.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Nanotrasen's new titanium wall blueprints are smooth enough that it can reflect projectiles!

ClosingBracket updated:

  • Allows explorer webbings to hold marker beacons.

Joan updated:

  • Miner borgs can now place marker beacons from a storage of 30.

26 May 2017

Kor updated:

  • The chaplains possessed blade, shades, and constructs, can once again speak galactic common.

Moonlighting Mac says updated:

  • You can now craft a strong cloak with a hood made out of goliath and monster materials from within the primitive crafting screen.
  • The cloak has a suit slot for all kind of primitive supplies, however it cannot carry most electronic miner equipment.
  • Due to the recipe requiring leather, it is not normally accessible to all ghost roles without a source of water & electricity.

kevinz000 updated:

  • You can now add bayonets to kinetic accelerators. However, only combat knives and survival knives can be added. Harm intent attacking things will cause you to attack that thing with the bayonet instead!

4dplanner, robustin updated:

  • c4 has always taken 3 seconds to plant, and you are not allow to believe otherwise

  • 20% of internal affairs agents are actually traitors

Crexfu updated:

  • typo fix for origin tech

Cyberboss updated:

  • Indestructible objects can no longer be destroyed by bombs

24 May 2017

4dplanner updated:

  • crushers now apply marks properly

optional name here updated:

  • The cost of plasma has been reduced from 500 to 300, but retain their immunity to saturation

Cyberboss updated:

  • Explosions will no longer have a start up delay

Joan, WJohnston updated:

  • Adds marker beacons to mining as a vendible item. They can be bought in stacks of 1, 10, and 30 at a rate of 10 points per beacon.
  • Miners start with a stack of 10 in their backpack, and the Extraction and Rescue Kit contains a stack of 30.
  • Marker beacons come in a large selection of colors and simply light up a small area when placed, but are useful as a path marker or to indicate dangers.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Fixed Battleship Raven's bridge blast doors not working.

That Really Good Soda Flavor updated:

  • People who are high and beach bums can now talk in their own stoner language.
  • Beach bums can only communicate with other beach bums and people who are high.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Changes to production of Nanotrasen Auto Rifle armour piercing bullets have now made AP bullets better able to penetrate armour, but at the cost of the amount of possible damage the bullet can do to soft targets.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Many Ballistic weapons now have new sounds related to reloading or placing bullets into magazines.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Boxstation armoury weapon racks now have glass panes to help prevent the weapons easily flying out of a breached hull.

QualityVan updated:

  • Hairless hides now become wet when exposed to water
  • You can microwave wet leather to dry it

That Really Good Soda Flavor updated:

  • Changed spray tan overdoses to be more realistic.

QualityVan updated:

  • Inserted legion cores no longer work if they went inert before implanting

Steelpoint updated:

  • Sketchin alternative magazines (Armour Piercing, Hollow Point, Incendiary) now have unique sprites to better identify them.

Steelpoint updated:

  • ERT Sec Tactical Energy Guns now have a unique sprite.

Tacolizard updated:

  • Station based armour is slightly more descriptive of what it does.

23 May 2017

: That Really Good Soda Flavor updated:

  • Fixed a bug where paper bins could swallow up pens into the void.

Joan updated:

  • Nanotrasen has taken a lower bid for their meson suppliers, and meson scanners will no longer display terrain layouts while on the planet.
  • However, they have discovered that, with some tweaks, mineral scanners will no longer actually require you to be wearing mesons.
  • The cheaper mesons will not completely remove reliance on light.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Auto Rifle alt ammo mags (AP, Incendiary, Uranium Tipped) now have a coloured stripe to denote them.

Joan updated:

  • Chasms will glow dimly, like lava.

ma44 updated:

  • Reports of syndicate base on lavaland has been outfitted with a state of the art donksoft toy weapon dispenser.

22 May 2017

Joan updated:

  • Ripleys will collect all ore in front of them when they move with a clamp and stored ore box.

Robustin updated:

  • Added a sexy new icon for the harvester's AOE conversion spell
  • Fixed construct's forcewall being invisible
  • Fixed cult constructs "Locate Master" and "Locate Prey" not functioning
  • Fixed spell action buttons not showing their actual availability status
  • Changed the duration of a few frames for the new Cult ending

Joan, Repukan updated:

  • Traitor miners can now buy up to 2 KA Pressure Mods for 5 TC each.
  • KA Pressure Mods now only take up 35 mod capacity each, allowing traitor miners to use 2 and have space for 1 other mod.
  • R&D can no longer build KA Pressure Mods.

coiax updated:

  • Galactic Common has been added to silicon's internal language
  • database, meaning even if a cyborg is created from someone who
  • previously did not know Galactic Common, they will be able to speak it
  • as a silicon.

ClosingBracket updated:

  • Fixed very minor inconsistencies on items & punctuation on items.

That Really Good Soda Flavor updated:

  • Martial arts are no longer lost when mind-swapping, cloning, moving your brain, et cetera.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Spessmen seems to have stopped suffering from the mental condition that makes them believe they can't move fast if they have only one leg, even if they're in space and using a jetpack!

Joan updated:

  • Swapped how far plasma cutter blasts go when going through rock and in open air. This means blasts through air will go 4/5 tiles, but will mine 7/10 tiles, for normal/advanced plasma cutters, respectively.

Joan updated:

  • There is now a buffer zone between the mining base and lavaland where megafauna will not spawn.
  • Ruins will no longer spawn directly in front of the mining base.

Lzimann updated:

  • Pandemic is now tgui!

21 May 2017

Swindly updated:

  • Monkeys can be weakened by stamina loss

Joan updated:

  • Resonator fields now visually show how long they have until they burst.
  • Hitting a legion skull with a resonator will now produce a field.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Nanotrasen decided to remove the integrated jet engines from jetpacks. They can no longer be used successfully indoors.

Steelpoint updated:

  • The Warden's Cycler Shotgun has been replaced with a Compact Combat Shotgun. A unique weapon, it can fit in armour slots but at the sacrifice of a smaller ammo capacity of four shells.

RandomMarine updated:

  • Drone laws no longer restrict drones to the station.

20 May 2017

Gun Hog updated:

  • The Auxiliary Base can no longer land outside the lavaland map's boundaries.

Joan updated:

  • Proto-kinetic crushers have been worked over by our highly qualified techs, will recharge 12% faster, and no longer require very low-pressure atmospheres to fire!
  • In addition, our techs have tweaked the quantum linker module and proto-kinetic crushers can apply multiple marks to different targets! Marks applied may eventually expire if not detonated.

Steelpoint updated:

  • Pulse Pistols can now be recharged.

coiax updated:

  • When a shuttle is called, sometimes an on-call admiral, using
  • available information to them, will recall the shuttle from Centcom.

Steelpoint updated:

  • ERT, non-red alert, Security Response Officers spawn with a Tactical Energy Gun. This is a military variant of the Egun that, in addition to laser and disable rounds, has access to stun rounds.

19 May 2017

Steelpoint updated:

  • All Pulse weapons now accurately show, by their sprites, what fire mode they are in.

Swindly updated:

  • Added modified syringe guns. They fire DNA injectors. Geneticists and CMOs can buy them from the traitor uplink for 14 TC.

octareenroon91 updated:

  • Golems touching a shell can now choose to stay in their own body.

18 May 2017

4dplanner updated:

  • the Hierophant club has gained in power

Lordpidey updated:

  • Toy toolboxes with realistic rumbling action have been added to arcade prizes.

Tacolizard Forever: Plasmaman Powercreep updated:

  • Plasmaman tanks are the same size as emergency oxygen tanks.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Peacekeeper cyborgs now have projectile dampening fields.

Lordpidey updated:

  • Space ninjas now use action buttons instead of verbs for a more consistent user experience.

coiax updated:

  • Various vending machines, when shooting their inventory at nearby
  • people, will "demonstrate their products features". This means that if a
  • cigarette vending machine throws a lighter at you, it will be on.
  • Vending machines also choose random products when throwing, rather than
  • the first available one.

Joan updated:

  • Proselytizing alloy shards will now proselytize all the shards in the tile, instead of requiring you to proselytize each one at a time.

coiax updated:

  • Plastic explosives can no longer be detonated by EMPs.

coiax updated:

  • Syndicate agents can purchase a "codespeak manual", that teaches
  • them a language that sounds like a series of codewords. You can also hit
  • other people with the manual to teach them. One use per manual.
  • Nuclear operatives have access to a deluxe manual that is more
  • expensive but has unlimited uses.
  • Syndicate AIs know Codespeak for free.

17 May 2017

coiax updated:

  • Spacevines can no longer spread on space transit turfs.

4dplanner updated:

  • revenant respawning will not spam up deadchat so much, and is less likely to break.

Penguaro updated:

  • Centcom Engineering has reviewed the power schematic for the engine room and added an Area Power Controller.

16 May 2017

coiax updated:

  • Magic eightballs are now tiny items, able to fit into a box and
  • pocket.

Expletive updated:

  • Syndicate Tomes have been added to traitor uplinks for 9 TC. They let an agent or an operative provide both weal and woe.

fludd12 updated:

  • You can now add grills to a bonfire, letting you cook things on top of them.

Penguaro updated:

  • Centcom Intelligence reports that the Hidden Syndicate Research Base may have received a shipment of viruses.

QualityVan updated:

  • People without eyes and ears are no longer susceptible to flashbangs they aren't directly on top of

QualityVan updated:

  • Fixed fire alarms not being repairable if the board was broken

Penguaro updated:

  • There is now Space under the rocks at the Dragoon's Tomb

15 May 2017

Moonlighting Mac says updated:

  • Starthistles now return seeds when they are harvested, amongst having a overhaul of description, alteration of statistics & a mutational path into harebells. These seeds have been supplied into the hydroponics seed vendor.
  • Starthistle tray sprites have been restructured & also fixed from a issue of them being broken and not appearing in trays. In addition there are new sprites for its seeds.

Qbopper updated:

  • The supermatter crystal now sends its warning messages to the engineering channel. (if it's in critical condition the message will be sent to the common radio channel as before)

Profakos updated:

  • Centcom has decided to upgrade the Ore Redemption machines with a floppy drive, intended for design disks.

Expletive updated:

  • You can now create water bottles and wet floor signs by using plastic sheets.
  • You can create toy swords out of plastic sheets, a piece of cable, and a light bulb.

McBawbaggings updated:

  • Wizards are now at least 30 years old. Apprentices will be in-between ages 17 to 29.

Penguaro updated:

  • Centcom Engineering has reviewed the plans for the Box series station and has addressed some concerns related to some APCs not affecting their designated section. APCs for the Detective's Office, Cargobay, and Gateway, now control those rooms. The Bridge Maintenance APC has been removed from future construction as it serves no purpose and thus is an unnecessary construction cost.
  • The pipe from the station to the AI Satellite has been completed.

Penguaro updated:

  • The Gravity Generator description now mentions a graviton field as opposed to a gravaton field. What is Gravaty anyway?

ma44 updated:

  • Seed vault remapped
  • The seed vault random seed spawner can now spawn cherry bombs instead of regular cherry seeds
  • BEES to plant vault

Joan updated:

  • The summoned ghosts from Manifest Spirit can no longer break airlocks with their standard blade.
  • Manifest Spirit now does a small amount of damage when initially manifesting a ghost.

McBawbaggings updated:

  • SMES units will now accept charge from the power network even if the available load is less than the input rate. Credit to Zaers for the original code.

14 May 2017

coiax updated:

  • Curator soapstones now successfully leave messages for future
  • shifts.
  • Soapstones can no longer be purchased in cargo.
  • The janitor no longer starts with an empty soapstone.
  • Engraved messages can be left anywhere in the world, but be
  • wary that the terrain of places like lavaland and space can change shift
  • to shift.

Joan updated:

  • Glowshrooms now have a less saturated glow.

octareenroon91 updated:

  • Ambrosia Deus can now mutate into Gaia, and Gaia into Deus.
  • A single branch of Ambrosia Gaia will not immediately make a hydroponics tray self-sufficient.
  • A (total) dose of 20u Earthsblood (from Gaia) will make a hydroponics tray self-sufficient.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Ambrosia Gaia is back

Dorsidwarf updated:

  • Nanotrasen Robotics Supply Division has successfully petitioned to replace the "My First Robot" motors in turret coverings with a standard commercial brand. As such, they will now open faster.

Swindly updated:

  • Nitrous oxide now causes anemia.

coiax updated:

  • Goats on the station have developed a taste for glowshrooms, and
  • will eat them if they encounter any.

coiax updated:

  • Free Golems can purchase Royal Capes of the Liberator at their
  • mining equipment vendor.

13 May 2017

Kingofcarrotflowerspt1 updated:

  • Adds Dakimakuras, more colloquially known as "anime girl body pillows"
  • They take up a hand slot and can hold a few items. Many different girls to choose from!

Tacolizard Forever: It's hip to fuck bees updated:

  • Added a honey jar item. It's not implemented yet.
  • Honey is now more robust at healing, but don't eat too much or you'll turn into a fatty landwhale.

TehZombehz updated:

  • Butter noodles, butter biscuits, buttered toast, and pigs in a blanket can now be crafted using sticks of butter and other ingredients.

coiax updated:

octareenroon91 updated:

  • Hermit ruin now includes a portable seed extractor.

  • Pizza boxes once again look different when open

12 May 2017

optional name here updated:

  • Zombies can now see in the dark. If you steal their eyes you'll be able to see in the dark as well!

New Antag Alert sounds updated:

  • added sounds that alert players to their antag status
  • Blood cult has a new alert sound
  • Clock cult has a new alert sound
  • changeling has a new alert sound
  • Malf/traitor AI has a new alert sound
  • Nuke Ops has a new alert sound
  • Ragin' Mages has a new alert sound
  • Traitor has a new alert sound

MMMiracles (Cerestation) updated:

  • Hydroponics has been revamped, adding a few things missing before and adding a bee room in place of the backroom.
  • Fixed some other stuff.

Swindly updated:

  • Solid plasma now begins burning at the temperature at which it was ignited.
  • Snow walls no longer block explosions, are deconstructed faster, and no longer leave girders when deconstructed.

coiax updated:

  • Nanotrasen Cloning Divison's three hundred identical scientists
  • have announced an upgrade to the cloning computer's software. You can
  • now scan brains or dismembered heads and successfully clone from them.
  • Brains seem to remember the DNA of the last body they were attached to.

Joan updated:

  • Wraiths now refund Phase Shift's cooldown by attacking; 1 second on normal attacks, 5 seconds when putting a target into critical, and a full refund when killing a target.
  • Increased Phase Shift's cooldown from 20 seconds to 25 seconds.

Joan updated:

  • Manifest Spirit will no longer continue to cost the user health if the summoned ghost is put into critical or gibbed.
  • Ghosts summoned by Manifest Spirit are outfitted with ghostly armor and a ghostly cult blade that does slightly less damage than a normal cult blade.
  • Manifest Spirit now consumes 1 health per second per summoned ghost, from 0.333~.
  • Manifest Spirit can now only summon a maximum of 5 ghosts per rune, and the summoned ghosts cannot use Manifest Spirit to summon more ghosts.

11 May 2017

optional name here updated:

  • Plasma Golems now have the correct updated tip.
  • Plasma Golems no longer take damage from fire, and take normal instead of increased burn damage from other sources. They will still explode if on fire and hot enough.
  • Plasma Golems can now self-ignite with an action button.
  • Plasma Golems are now warned when they're close to exploding.
  • Plasma Golems now have a constant chance of exploding after 850K instead of a precise threshold at 900K, making it less predictable.

duncathan updated:

  • opening a dangerous canister will only alert admins if it contains meaningful amounts of a dangerous gas. No more being bwoinked because you opened an empty canister that used to have plasma in it.

bandit updated:

  • Nanotrasen has enhanced personality matchmaking for its personal AIs. pAI candidates will now see who is requesting a pAI personality.

10 May 2017

ma44 updated:

  • Doubles the amount of points wooden planks sell for (now 50 points)

TehZombehz updated:

  • Sticks of butter and liquid mayonnaise can now be produced via a new 'mix' function on the grinder. Please eat responsibly.

Joan, Robustin updated:

  • Harvesters can no longer break walls, construct walls, convert floors, or emit paralyzing smoke.
  • Harvesters now remove the limbs of humans when attacking, can heal OTHER constructs, have thermal vision, and can move through cult walls.
  • Harvesters can now convert turfs in a small area around them and can create a wall of force.
  • Harvesters are now cultists.
  • When Nar-Sie is summoned, she will convert all living non-construct cultists to harvesters, who will automatically track her.

Joan updated:

  • You can now buy double eswords from the uplink for 16 telecrystals. They cannot be bought below 25 players.
  • You can no longer use two eswords to construct a double esword.

Kor updated:

  • a new mysterious book has been discovered in lavaland chests!
  • weird purple hearts found in lavaland chests have started beating again! what could this mean?

lordpidey updated:

  • Modified chances for returning someone's soul using an employment contract. Now everyone has a chance, not just lawyers and HoP.
  • Particularly brain damaged people can no longer sign infernal contracts properly.
  • Infernal contracts for power no longer give fireball, and instead give robeless 'lightning bolt' spell.
  • Devils can now sell you a friend, for the cost of your soul.
  • The codex gigas should now be easier to use, and less finicky.
  • The codex gigas no longer sintouches readers.

QualityVan updated:

  • Machine names will be capitalized when they talk on radio

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Fixes t-ray mode on engineering goggles not resetting the lighting override properly.

09 May 2017

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Lighting now defaults to fully bright until the first update tick for that tile. This makes shuttle movements less immersion breaking.
  • Rather than remove the light source from the system and then re-adding it on light movements, the system now calculates and applies the difference to each tile. This should speed up lighting updates.

Penguaro updated:

  • [Meta] The Slime Control Console boundaries have been adjusted around the Kill Room

Expletive updated:

  • Curator's fedora has a pocket, like all the other fedoras.
  • Treasure hunter suits can now hold large internal tanks, to ease the exploration of lavaland.
  • The curator can now access the Auxillary Base and open doors on the mining station.

Penguaro updated:

  • The Central Command Ferry will now dock at one of the ports in Arrivals

XDTM updated:

  • Added bluespace launchpads. They can be built with R&D, and can teleport objects and mobs up to 5 tiles away (8 at max upgrades), from the pad to the target and viceversa.
  • To set up a launchpad, a launchpad and a launchpad console must be built. The pad must be opened with a screwdriver, then linked to the console using a multitool. A console can support up to 4 pads.
  • Launchpads require some time to charge up teleports, but don't require cooldowns unlike quantum pads. Upgrading launchpads increases the range by 1 per manipulator tier.
  • A special variant, the Briefcase Launchpad, has also been added to the traitor uplink for 6 TC.
  • Briefcase Launchpads look like briefcases until setup (which requires a few seconds). When setup, the launchpad will be functional, but can still be dragged on the ground. To pick a pad back up, click and drag it to your character's sprite.
  • Unlike stationary launchpads, briefcase pads only have 3 tiles of maximum range.
  • Briefcase pads are controlled by a remote (that is sent with the briefcase) instead of a console. The remote must be linked to the briefcase by simply hitting it. Each remote can only be linked to one pad, unlike consoles.

coiax updated:

  • Visible ghosts emit light.

08 May 2017

Penguaro updated:

  • Adjusts Meteor Shuttle Name

coiax updated:

  • Fixes being able to bypass language restrictions by selecting
  • languages you can't speak as your default language.

Penguaro updated:

  • The Design Names in the various machines are now capitalized consistently

coiax updated:

  • Fixes various mobs speaking languages that they were only supposed
  • to understand.

Penguaro updated:

  • The Slime Scanner is available from the Autolathe.

Joan updated:

  • The verb to Assert Leadership over the cult has been replaced with an action button that does the same thing, but is much more visible.

Moonlighting Mac says updated:

  • After a recent trade fair, employees have took it upon themselves to learn how to craft leather objects out of finished leather sheets, for novices they are pretty good at it! Try it yourself!
  • Muzzles to silence people are now craftable out of leather sheets.
  • You can no longer print off designs from a bio-generator that can now be crafted out of leather sheets.
  • Complete sheets of leather can be printed from the bio-generator for 150 biomass to accommodate for a loss of designs.
  • Specialist objects from the leather & cloth category bio-generator category were not removed as to encourage interdepartmental interaction & balance.

ninjanomnom updated:

  • Highlander no longer breaks your speakers

Dorsisdwarf updated:

  • Fixed being unable to hit museum cases in melee

07 May 2017

Moonlighting Mac updated:

  • Due to budget cuts and oil synthesis replacing expensive processes of digging up haunted primeval ashwalker burial grounds, Nanotransen has taught chemists how to make plastic from chemicals in the hopes that new plastic products can reduce expenditure on metal and glass.
  • you can now make plastic sheets from chemistry out of heated up crude oil, ash & sodium chloride

coiax updated:

  • Smartfridges no longer magically gain medicines if deconstructed
  • and rebuilt.

Anonmare updated:

  • Removes organic check from mediborg storage container

coiax updated:

  • Ash walkers now know and speak Draconic by default, but still know
  • Galactic Common. Remember, Galcom's language key is ",0" and you can
  • review your known languages with the Language Menu.

  • Moved to a new system to make top menu items easier to edit.
  • Moved icon size stuff to a sub menu
  • Added option to change icon scaling mode.
  • Byond added fancy shader supported scaling(Point Sampling), this sucks because it's blurry, the default for /tg/station has changed back to the old nearest neighbor scaling.

  • Anywhere there was lava below a tile on the station is now space.

Robustin updated:

  • c4 planting is now 40% faster

  • Sigils of Transgression are slightly brighter.

  • Cultists of Nar-sie have their own language. The language's key is ",n".

  • fixed bug that caused an infinite connection loop when connecting on a new computer or computer with recently changed hardware.

Penguaro updated:

  • Adjusted the Examine description of the right-most tiles of the Space Station 13 sign to be consistent with the rest of the tiles.

06 May 2017

coiax updated:

  • Fixed adamantine vocal cord (F) links not working for observers.

QualityVan updated:

  • Cargo can order restocking units for NanoMed vending machines
  • NanoMed vending machines can be build and unbuilt

coiax updated:

  • It is now possible to make plastic golems, who are made of a material
  • flexible enough to crawl through vents (while not carrying equipment). They also can pass through plastic flaps.

LanCartwright updated:

  • Reduction to nutrition when consuming Miner's salve.
  • Stun/weaken that bypasses bugged chemical protection when consuming Miner's salve.

4dplanner updated:

  • Internal Affairs Agents now obtain the kill objectives of their targets when they die.
  • Internal Affairs Agents now have an integrated nanotrasen pinpointer that tracks their target at distances further than ten squares.
  • Internal Affairs Agents will now lose any restrictions on collateral damage and gain a "Die a glorious death" objective upon becoming the last man standing, and revert if any of their targets are cloned.

coiax updated:

  • The lavaland Seed Vault ruin can spawn only once.

Lzimann updated:

  • Telescience is no more.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • Deltastation's chemistry now has a screwdriver.
  • Deltastation's morgue no longer has a blue tile.
  • Deltastation's chemistry smart fridge is no longer blocked by a disposal unit.

05 May 2017

coiax updated:

  • Adamantine golems have special vocal cords that allow them to send
  • one-way messages to all golems, due to fragments of resonating
  • adamantine in their heads. Both of these are organs, and can be removed
  • and put in other species.
  • You can use adamantine vocal cords by prefixing your message with
  • ":x".
  • Xenobiology is no longer capable of making golem runes with plasma.
  • Instead, inject plasma into the adamantine slime core to get bars of adamantine
  • which you can then craft into an incomplete golem shell. Add 10 sheets of
  • suitable material to finish the shell.
  • The metal adamantine is also quite valuable when sold via cargo.

coiax updated:

  • Golems no longer have underwear, undershorts or socks.

Joan updated:

  • Sigils of Transgression are slightly more visible and glow very faintly.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Teslas now give off light

coiax updated:

  • If you know more than the usual number of languages, you'll now remember them after you get cloned.
  • Humans turning into monkeys will not suddenly be able to speak the monkey language, and will continue to understand and speak human.
  • Ghosts can now modify their own understood languages with the
  • language menu.
  • Any mob can also open their language menu with the IC->Open Language Menu verb.
  • Silicons can now understand Draconic as part of their internal databases.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • Pubbystation no longer has two airlocks stacked on top of each other leading into xenobiology's kill room.

04 May 2017

QualityVan updated:

  • Dental implants stay with the head they're in

Incoming updated:

  • Display cases now require a key to open, which the curator spawns with

bgobandit updated:

  • The Syndicate has added basic functionality to their state-of-the-art equipment. Nuke ops can now donate all TCs at once.

LanCartwright updated:

  • Lesser smoke book to Delta and Metastation
  • Normal smoke book from Delta and Metastation
  • Civilian smoke book now has a 360 max cooldown (from 120) and halved smoke output.

lordpidey updated:

  • There is a new traitor poison, spewium. It will cause uncontrollable vomiting, which gets worse the longer it's in your system. An overdose can cause vomiting of organs.
  • Committing suicide with a gas pump can now shoot out random organs.
  • Toxic vomit now shows up as intended.

Joan updated:

  • Sigil of Accession, Fellowship Armory, Memory Allocation, Anima Fragment, and Sigil of Transmission are not affected by the previously-mentioned % reduction to Application scripture costs.

Joan updated:

  • Ratvarian Spears have new inhand icons.

Moonlighting Mac says updated:

  • Courtesy of the art & crafts division, imitation basalt tiles themed on the rough volcanic terrain of lavaland are now available to be made out of sandstone.
  • The manufacturer even managed to replicate the way that it lights up with volcanic energy, it is the perfect accompaniment to other fake (or real) lava-land tiles or a independent piece.

QualityVan updated:

  • Point flashlights at mouths to see what's inside them

4dplanner updated:

  • Turrets can no longer see invisible things, such as unrevealed revenants

4dplanner updated:

  • revenants now properly resurrect from ectoplasm, as opposed to ectoplasm merely spawning a new grief ghost

Joan updated:

  • Mania Motors now do minor toxin damage over time and will convert those affected if the toxin damage is high enough.
  • The effects of a Mania Motor continue to apply to targets after they leave its range, though they will fall off extremely quickly.
  • Mania Motors no longer cause brain damage.

03 May 2017

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork component generation is twice as fast.
  • Scriptures cost up to twice as much; Driver scriptures are unaffected, meaning they cost 50% less, Script scriptures cost 25% less, Application scriptures cost about 12.5% less, and Revenant scriptures cost about 5% less.

coiax updated:

  • Plasma vessels, the organs inside aliens that are responsible
  • for their internal plasma storage, will regenerate small amounts of
  • plasma even if the owner is not on resin weeds.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • Omega shuttle now has lighting.

coiax updated:

  • Restrictions on Lizardpeople using their native language on the
  • station have been lifted by Centcom, in order to maximise worker
  • productivity. The language's key is ",o".

Kor, Profakos, Iamgoofball updated:

  • The Librarian has been replaced by the Curator.
  • Persistent trophy cases have been added to the library on Meta, Delta, and Box. These are only usable by the Curator.
  • The Curator now starts with his whip.
  • The Curator now has access to his treasure hunter outfit, stashed in his private office.

deathride58 updated:

  • Fixed the slimecore HUD's neck slot sprite.

02 May 2017

Jordie0608 updated:

  • Investigate logs are now persistent.
  • Game logs are now stored per-round; use .getserverlog to access previous rounds.
  • .giveruntimelog and .getruntimelog removed.

XDTM updated:

  • Golems can now click on empty golem shells to transfer into them.
  • Plasma Golems now no longer explode on death. They instead explode if they're on fire and are hot enough. The explosion size has been increased.
  • Plasma Golems are now always flammable.

coiax updated:

  • When talking on the alien hivemind, a person will be identified by
  • their real name, rather than who they are disguised as.

XDTM updated:

  • Blood Cult's talisman of Horrors now works at range. It will still give no warning to the victim.

01 May 2017

4dplanner updated:

  • Squishy plants will now affect walls and other turfs they get squished on

Kor, Goof and Plizzard updated:

  • Adds persistent trophy cases. They are not on any map yet.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The biogenerator will now show its recipes again.

ninjanomnom updated:

  • TEG displays power in kw or MW now
  • TEG power bar only maxes over 1MW now
  • Moves TEG to SSair
  • Moves SM to SSair

QualityVan updated:

  • Saline glucose now acts as temporary blood instead of increasing blood regeneration

Cyberboss updated:

  • You can now make holocalls! Simply stand on a pad, bring up the menu, and select the holopad you wish to call. Remain still until someone answers. When they do, you'll be able to act just like an AI hologram until the call ends

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult component generation will automatically focus on components needed to activate the Ark if it exists.

Joan updated:

  • Belligerent now prevents you from running for 7 seconds after every chant.
  • However, you no longer remain walking after Belligerent's effect fades.

Joan updated:

  • Gaining Vanguard, such as from the Linked Vanguard scripture, will remove existing stuns.

Cobby updated:

  • The Gang pen is now stealthy. Stab away!

4dplanner updated:

  • Syndicate surplus crates now contain fewer implants

Moonlighting Mac says updated:

  • Due to a clerical error in the chef's cookbooks now being resolved, you can now make the pristine cookery dish "Stuffed Legion" out of exotic ingredients from Lavaland.
  • After being found again you will now be able to enjoy its special blend of flavors with your tastebuds. Mmm.

Swindly updated:

  • Mercury and Lithium make people move when not in space instead of when in space.

Joan updated:

  • Proselytizers can now charge from Sigils of Transmission at a rate of 1000W per second.
  • Sigils of Transmission can be charged with brass at a rate of 250W per sheet.

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Deep storage space ruin has been readded.
  • Space Cola machines now stock bottles of water.

30 April 2017

QualityVan updated:

  • Changelings can once again revive with their brain missing

XDTM updated:

  • Voice of God's Rest command now no longer makes listeners rest. It instead activates the sleep command.

29 April 2017

coiax updated:

  • The Bank Machine in the vault now uses the radio to announce
  • unauthorized withdrawals, rather than an endless stream of
  • loud announcements.

Kor updated:

  • Removed double agents mode.
  • Replaced it with Internal Affairs mode.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • The emergency backup shuttle has lighting now.
  • Plating in deltastation's aux tool storage is no longer checkered.

coiax updated:

  • Swarmer traps are no longer summoned by The Traps.
  • Wizard traps automatically disappear five minutes after being
  • summoned.
  • Wizard traps disappear after firing, whether triggered via
  • person or something being thrown across it.
  • Wizards are immune to their own traps.
  • The Traps are now marked as a Defensive spell, rather than an
  • Offensive spell.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Songs can now be added to disco machines with add_track(file, name, length, beat). Only file is required, the other 3 should still be put in, though.

Cobby updated:

  • Syndicate Lavabase now has more explicit instructions when it comes to outing non-syndicate affiliated enemies of Nanotrasen.

Joan updated:

  • Removed Mending Motor.
  • Added Mending Mantra, which is a script that causes you to repair nearby constructs and structures as long as you continue chanting it.
  • Mending Mantra will also heal Servants as long as they're wearing clockwork armor.

Swindly updated:

  • Added organ storage bags for medical cyborgs. They can hold an organic body part. Use the bag on a carbon during organ manipulation or prosthetic replacement to add the held body part.

28 April 2017

Kor updated:

  • Librarians can speak any language

coiax, WJohnston updated:

  • Languages no longer colour their text.
  • Languages now have icons to identify them. Galatic Common does not have an icon if understood.

27 April 2017

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Server hop verb moved to the OOC tab
  • Server hop verb can now be used in the lobby as well as while a ghost.

Gun Hog updated:

  • The GPS interface has been converted to tgui.
  • GPS now update automatically or manually, give distance and direction to a signal, and many other improvements!

QualityVan updated:

  • You can hit emagged cloning pods with a medical ID to empty them

QualityVan updated:

  • Crayons can be ground
  • Crayon powder can be used to color stuff

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Heads of staff may now download the ID card modification program from NTNet.

bgobandit updated:

  • When jumpsuits take severe damage, their suit sensors break. They can be fixed by applying a cable coil.

coiax updated:

  • Anomalous crystals can be examined by ghosts to determine their
  • function and activation method.
  • Lightbringers can understand Slime and Galactic Common, and can
  • only speak Slime, as before.
  • The helper anomalous crystal is in the orbit list after it has been
  • activated.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Tweaked how things were deleted to cut down on lag from consecutive deletes and provide better logging for things that cause lag when hard-deleted.

CoreOverload updated:

  • Gas injectors are now buildable!

flashdim updated:

  • Omega Station had two APCs not wired properly. (#26526)

  • Ash Drake swoops no longer teleport the Ash Drake to your position.
  • Some other tweaks to Ash Drake attacks and patterns; discover these yourself!

coiax updated:

  • The wizard spell Rod Form now costs 3 points, up from 2.

coiax updated:

  • You no longer die when turning into a monkey.

  • T-Ray scans no longer allow viewers to interact with underfloor objects.

  • Examining a window now gives hints to the appropriate tool for the
  • next stage of construction/deconstruction.

  • Skeletons and plasmamen's hitboxes now more closely match that of humans. They are no longer full of holes and incredibly frustrating to hit, should they run around naked.

  • The vent in the Escape Coridoor on Omega Station has been fixed.

  • instead of, in some cases, silently damaging you.

  • plasteel to make the firedoor reinforced.

  • from human lungs.

  • still sound the same, it's just purple. Like them.

  • deafness. A carbon without any ears is deaf. Genetic
  • deafness functions as before.

Cyberboss updated:

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Nightvision was heavily modified.
  • Nightvision has been given 3 levels of nightvisionness. (some, most, and full)
  • ghosts, aliens, guardians, night vision eyes, and statues were given all 3 levels in a cycling toggle
  • thermals, and hud+NV goggles give "some" nightvisionness
  • standalone masons are unchanged.
  • Nightvision goggles (that aren't also sec huds or medhuds or the like) give "most" nightvisionness. Nightvision masons also give "most" nightvisionness
  • Most simple mobs with the ability to see in the dark were given "most" nightvisionness, others got full nightvisionness.
  • Fixed certain ghost only things disappearing when disabling darkness.
  • Fixed ash storms not being visible when using things that modified your ability to see darkness

  • The anime admin button will no longer cause equipped items to drop.

09 April 2017

JJRcop updated:

  • Refactors whisper, now all living mobs can use it
  • Prefix any message with # to whisper, for example, "# Man, that guy is weird.", you can still use the whisper verb if you whish.
  • This is compatible with languages, for example "#,r That HoS is a problem, we should kill him"
  • Removes #a #b #c etc radio codes, as well as :w and .w, which used to be whisper.

02 April 2017

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Lighting visuals have been changed slightly to reduce it's cost to the client. If you had trouble running the new lighting, it might run a little better now.

coiax updated:

  • Adds seperate languages to the game. Now Ratvarian, Drone, Machine, Swarmer, Human (now called Galactic Common), Slime and Monkey are separate languages. Each languages has its own comma prefix, for example, Galcom has the ,0 prefix, while Ratvarian has the ,r prefix. If you don't understand a language when it is spoken to you, you will hear a scrambled version that will vary depending on the language that you're not understanding.
  • This does not change who can understand what.
  • Removed the talk wheel feature.
  • Clicking the speech bubble icon now opens the Language Menu, allowing you to review which languages you speak, their keys, and letting you set which language you speak by default. Admins have additional abilities to add and remove languages from mobs using this menu.

Penguaro updated:

  • [Meta] The maintenance tunnels in the Xeno Lab now have radiation shielding. The Slime Euthanization Chamber will not have radiation shielding at this time as dead slimes will not mind radiation.

Penguaro updated:

  • [Meta] The Chapel Security Hatches were very intimidating. They have been changed to more inviting glass doors.

BeeSting12 updated:

  • Boxstation's HoP office now has a PDA tech.

MMMiracles (CereStation) updated:

  • Added a patrol path for bots, includes 2 round-start securitrons placed on opposite sites of station.
  • Due to map size, mulebots are still somewhat unreliable on longer distances. Disposals are still advised, but mule bots are now technically an option for delivery.
  • Added multiple status displays, extinguishers, and appropriate newscasters to hallways.
  • A drone dispenser is now located underneath Engineering in maintenance.
  • Each security checkpoint now has a disposal chute that directs to a waiting cell in the Brig for rapid processing of criminals. Why run half-way across the station with some petty thief when you can just shove him in the criminal chute and have the warden deal with him?
  • Security's mail chute no longer leads into the armory. This was probably not the best idea in hindsight.
  • Virology has a bathroom now.
  • Genetics monkey pen is a bit more green now.
  • Lawyer now has access the brig cells so he can complain more effectively.
  • Xenobio kill chamber is now in range of a camera.
  • Removed rogue bits of Vault area.
  • Medbay escape pod no longer juts out far enough to block the disposal's path.
  • Captain's spare ID is now real and not just a gold ID card.

Cyberboss updated:

  • False alarms are now guaranteed to actually announce something

Cyberboss updated:

  • Blood and other decals will no longer remain on turfs they shouldn't

Cyberboss updated:

  • Firedoors no longer operate automatically without power

ktccd updated:

  • Ninja suits have received a new software update, making them able to **actually steal tech levels** from R&D consoles and servers, thus avoid being forced to honourably kill themselves for failing their objective.

Gun Hog and Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The AI may now deploy to cyborgs prepared as AI shells. The module to do this may be research in the exosuit fabricator. Simply slot the module into a completed cyborg frame as with an MMI, or into a playerless (with no ckey) cyborg.
  • AI shells and AIs controlling a shell can be determined through the Diagnostic HUD.
  • AIs can deploy to a shell using the new action buttons or by simply clicking on it.
  • An AI shell will always have the laws of its controlling AI.

  • provided the phylactery is intact.

  • phylactery is intact.

  • automatic.
  • Stationloving objects like the nuke disk are not valid objects for
  • a phylactery.

  • charging, blue is charging, green is full. Emagged APCs are also blue.

20 March 2017

Joan updated:

  • Caches produce components every 70 seconds, from every 90, but each other linked, component-producing cache slows down cache generation by 10 seconds.

XDTM updated:

  • Golem Shells can now be completed with medical gauze or cloth to form cloth golems, which are weaker and extremely flammable. However, if they die, they turn into a pile of cloth that will eventually re-animate back into full health. That is, unless someone lights it on fire.

  • Everyone's eyes aren't white anymore.

Cobby updated:

  • All core traits [Hydroponics] scale with the parts in the gene machine. Time to beg Duke's Guide Read.... I mean RND!
  • Data disks with genes on them will have just the name of the gene instead of the prefix "plant data disk".
  • If you were unaware, you can rename these disks with a pen. Now, you can also change the description if you felt inclined to.

  • Kinetic Accelerator Range Mod now takes up 25% space instead of 24%

  • base is guaranteed by payloads embedded in the walls.
