Mervill updated:

  • Intents can be cycled forward and backwards with hotkeys again

karlnp updated:

  • made facehuggers work again

Joan updated:

  • Adds Replicant and Tinkerer's Cache to the default slab quickbind.

Kor updated:

  • Added the treasure hunter's hat, coat, uniform, and whip. These aren't available on the map yet, but will be available to the librarian soon.

Supermichael777 updated:

  • INCOMING WAS BREAKING THE LAW
  • Sechailer has new audio clips!

14 December 2016

Erwgd updated:

  • Limb Grower circuit boards can now be made in Research and Development, requiring level 3 in data theory and level 2 in biological technology.

jughu updated:

  • sandals are not fireproof or acidproof anymore
  • add: Magical sandals for the wizard that are still fireproof/acid proof
  • tweak: makes the marisa boots acid and fire proof too

coiax updated:

  • Adds upgrades for the medical cyborg!
  • The Hypospray Expanded Synthesiser that adds chemicals to treat
  • blindness, deafness, brain damage, genetic corruption and drug abuse.
  • The Hypospray High-Strength Synthesiser, containing stronger
  • versions of drugs to treat brute, burn, oxyloss and toxic damage.
  • The Piercing Hypospray (also applicable to the Standard and
  • Peacekeeper borgs) that allows a hypospray to pierce thick clothing and
  • hardsuits.
  • The Defibrillator, giving the medical cyborg an onboard
  • defibrillator.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Side entrance to Box Medbay, a few layout changes.

XDTM updated:

  • Abductor Agents have now been equipped with extremely advanced construction and hacking tools.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Recently we've been receiving reports of cheap knock off nuclear authentication disks circulating among the syndicate network. Don't be fooled by these decoys, only the real deal can be used to destroy the station!
  • Please don't destroy the station in an attempt to make sure the disk is real.

13 December 2016

Joan updated:

  • Mania Motors now require a much larger amount of power to convert people adjacent, and people converted by it are knocked out.

Mindustry updated:

  • Goliath meat can be cooked in lava again

Okand37 updated:

  • DeltaStation's emergency shuttle

Joan updated:

  • The Ark of the Clockwork Justicar will now force objects away from it.

Joan updated:

  • The Ark of the Clockwork Justicar can no longer be repaired.
  • The Ark now has 20% more health.

Joan updated:

  • Faster-than-normal tools are somewhat slower than before.

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Adds in random botany seeds; never the same twice.
  • Adds in new trait that makes a grown release smoke when squashed
  • Weed rates and chances are now core seed genes

Mekhi Anderson updated:

  • Nanotrasen has incorporated the latest in mobile holochassis emitters into PAI designs. PAIs can now turn into holochassis mode, which allows them to walk around with pre-set holographic images.
  • Ghosts can now set themselves as a pAI candidate, allowing any PAI device to download them.
  • No more PAI spam! Ghosts will now get a button to register themselves as a PAI candidate, instead of being notified whenever someone tries to view pai candidates.
  • Viewing available PAI candidates no longer incurs a delay.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork proselytizers suffer doubled cost and proselytization time when not on the station, mining, or centcom.
  • Trying to recite scripture offstation is more clearly disapproved of.

XDTM updated:

  • The internal rage of the crew has been suppressed, and they will no longer attack their own backpacks when opening them.

12 December 2016

Dannno updated:

  • more chaplain outfits
  • animal and tribal masks to the theater vendor

11 December 2016

coiax updated:

  • Cyborgs now have a reset module wire, that when pulsed, triggers
  • the cyborg's reset module hardware.
  • Cyborgs now eject all upgrades when reset, rather than the upgrades being destroyed.
  • Removed redundant reset module.

Joan updated:

  • Invoking Nezbere now increases ocular warden damage slightly more, but increases ocular warden range slightly less.

Cobby updated:

  • Fixes literally everything regarding renaming so far. When adding unique_rename to objects, make sure the attackby checks for inheritance.

Cobby updated:

  • You can pull as other mobs now. Sorry, clickcode is stupid.

Swindly updated:

  • The recipe for moonshine now calls for 5 units of nutriment and 5 units of sugar instead of 10 units of nutriment.

10 December 2016

Thunder12345 updated:

  • Scrapheap Challenge shuttle now actually works

Cyberboss updated:

  • Frozen things will now unfreeze above 0C

09 December 2016

Supermichael777 updated:

  • Conveyors have been more firmly anchored. No fun allowed

Thunder12345 updated:

  • Added the Standby Emergency Vessel "Scrapheap Challenge" as a new emergency shuttle option. You'll even be paid 1000 credits to use it!

Cyberboss updated:

  • The slips bug (which made freon laggy) is fixed

Kor updated:

  • Deleted all (3000+) left handed inhand icons. They are now automatically mirrored from the right hand, saving spriters a lot of tedious busywork.

Kor updated:

  • By crafting a wall mounted flasher frame (can be ordered via cargo), a flash, and a riot shield, you can now construct a strobe shield. The strobe shield combines the functionality of a riot shield and a flash, and can be reloaded with flash bulbs.

optional name here updated:

  • fixed ashdrake's flame wall.
  • fixed walls decon spawning metal in a random location in the same room.

coiax updated:

  • Due to a combination of radiation and water supply contamination,
  • stations have been reporting animals gaining self awareness.

08 December 2016

XDTM updated:

  • Replica Pod cloning now works on people who have been decapitated.

Mervill updated:

  • The light replacer can now create bulbs from glass shards
  • Click a light replacer while holding a glass shard to add the shard to the replacer
  • Click a glass shard while holding a light replacer to consume the shard

MrStonedOne updated:

  • fixed the modify bodypart admin tool not working

Joan updated:

  • You can now see what an ocular warden is attacking.

Joan updated:

  • The clockwork slab's interface is now TGUI.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • world initialization is now faster.

TehZombehz updated:

  • Nanotrasen Culinary Division has authorized the production of tacos, both plain and classic.

07 December 2016

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Swarmer beacons now have 750 health, down from 3000.

Fox McCloud updated:

  • The ability to harvest a plant, repeatedly, is now a gene-extractable trait that can be spliced into other plants
  • can extract the battery capabilities of potatoes and splice them into other plants
  • Plants types are now gene traits that can be added/removed from plants
  • Adds new stinging plant trait that will inject a bit of a plant's reagents when thrown at someone

coiax updated:

  • Additional mice sometimes appear in the maintenance tunnels.
  • Engineers beware!

Thunder12345 updated:

  • You can now only order a replacement shuttle once

LOOT DUDE updated:

  • Swarmers will drop bluespace crystals on death, non-artificial crystals.

MisterTikva updated:

  • Nanotrasen Mushroom Studies Division proudly announces that growth serum producing plants were genetically reassembled. You no longer alternate between sizes with doses 20u+ and more effects were added to higher doses.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Atmos canisters now stay connected after relabeling them

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Server owners that use the panic bunker feature can now optionally redirect new players to a different server. See config.txt for details.

06 December 2016

Mervill updated:

  • Examining now lists the neck slot

Swindly updated:

  • Adds a new toxin: Anacea. It metabolizes very slowly and quickly purges medicines in the victim while dealing light toxin damage. Its recipe is 1 part Haloperidol, 1 part Impedrezene, 1 part Radium.

MisterTikva updated:

  • Nanotrasen informs that certain berry and root plants have been infused with additional genetic traits.
  • Watermelons now have water in them!
  • Blumpkin's chlorine production has been reduced for better workplace efficiency.
  • Squishy plants now obey the laws of physics and will squash all over you if fall on them.

BASILMAN YOUR MAIN MAN updated:

  • fixes people "walking over the glass shard!" when they're on the ground, changes message when incapacitated

Chnkr updated:

  • Nuclear Operatives can now customize the message broadcast to the station when declaring war.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The lavaland syndicate agents, as well as the ID for all simple_animal syndicate corpses should have their ID actually have syndicate access on it now!

Cyberboss updated:

  • The atmos waste lines for the Metastation Kitchen and Botany departments is now actually connected

05 December 2016

Joan updated:

  • You can now cancel AI intellicard wiping.

Joan updated:

  • Geis now takes 5 seconds to resist.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Server owners may now customize the population levels required to play various modes. Keep in mind that this does not preserve the balance of the mode if you change it drastically. See game_modes.txt for details.

XDTM updated:

  • Quantum Pads are now buildable in R&D!
  • Quantum Pads, once built, can be linked to other Quantum Pads using a multitool. Using a Pad who has been linked will teleport everything on the sending pad to the linked pad!
  • Pads do not need to be linked in pairs: Pad A can lead to Pad B which can lead to pad C.
  • Upgrading a Quantum Pad will reduce the cooldown, charge-up time, and power consumption.
  • Quantum Pads require a bluespace crystal, a micro manipulator, a capacitor and a cable piece.

kilkun updated:

  • New lore surrounding the various SWAT suits.
  • Captain's hardsuit/SWAT suit got a few buffs. It's now much more robust.
  • Captain's space suit is now heat proof as well as fireproof. Long overlooked no longer.

Cobby updated:

  • fix: You can once again add salt to your favorite dishes!

Joan updated:

  • You can now proselytize floor tiles at a rate of 20 tiles to 1 brass sheet or 2 tiles to 1 liquified alloy for cogscarabs.
  • Proselytizers will automatically pry up floor tiles if those tiles can be proselytized.
  • Brass floor tiles no longer exist. Instead, you can just apply brass sheets to a tile. Crowbarring up a clockwork floor will yield that brass sheet.

04 December 2016

WJohn updated:

  • AI core turrets can once again hit you if you are standing in front of the glass panes, or in the viewing area's doorway.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • The timer for shuttle calls/recalls now scales with the security level of the station (Code Red/Green, etc.). You no longer have to feel dumb if you forget to call Code Red before you call the shuttle!
  • Shuttles called in Code Green (the lowest level) now take 20 minutes to arrive, but may be recalled for up to 10 minutes. They also don't require a reason to be called.
  • That doesn't mean you should call a code green shuttle every round the moment it finishes refueling.

Gun Hog updated:

  • Nanotrasen Janitorial Sciences Division is proud to announce a new concept for the Advanced Mop prototype; It now includes a built-in condenser for self re-hydration! See your local Scientist today! In the event that janitorial staff wish to use more expensive solutions, the condenser may be shut off with a handy handle switch!

Durkel updated:

  • Recent enemy reports indicate that changelings have grown bored with attacking near desolate stations and have shifted focus to more fertile hunting grounds.

03 December 2016

Joan updated:

  • Converted engineering and miner cyborgs can now create Sigils of Transgression.

RandomMarine updated:

  • Airlocks will keep their original name when their electronics are removed and replaced. You may still use a pen to rename the assembly if desired.

02 December 2016

Joan updated:

  • Trying to move while bound by Geis will cause you to start resisting, but the time required to resist is up by half a second.
  • Resisting out of Geis now does damage to the binding, and as such being stunned while bound will no longer totally reset your resist progress.
  • Using Geis on someone already bound by Geis will interrupt them resisting out of it and will fully repair the binding.
  • Geis's pre-binding channel now takes longer for each servant above 5. Geis's conversion channel also takes slightly longer for each servant above 5.

01 December 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • Added a new lavaland "boss"
  • Hostile mobs will now find a new target if they failed to attack their current one for 30 seconds, this reduces cheese by simply making the mob find something else to do/someone to kill
  • Hostile mobs with search_objects will now regain that value after a certain amount of time (per-mob, base 3 seconds), this is because being attacked causes mobs with this var to turn it off, so they can run away, however it was literally never turned on which caused swarmers to get depression and never do anything.

Cobby updated:

  • Removes the exploit that allowed you to bypass grabcooldowns with Ctrl+Click

PeopleAreStrange updated:

  • Changed F7 to buildmode, F8 to Invismin (again). Removed stealthmin toggle

30 November 2016

Cyberboss updated:

  • tgui windows will now close on round end

Joan updated:

  • The Ark of the Clockwork Justicar now converts all silicons once it finishes proselytizing the station.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's caches now increase in cost every 4 caches, from 5.

Thunder12345 updated:

  • Added anti-armour launcher. A single-use rocket launcher capable of penetrating all but the heaviest of armour. Deals massively increased damage to cyborgs and mechs.

Cobby [Idea stolen from Shaps] updated:

  • For objects that you could previously rename with a pen, you can now edit their description as well.

Gun Hog updated:

  • Syndicate Medical Cyborg hyposprays now properly work through Operative hardsuits and other thick clothing.

29 November 2016

ANGRY CODER updated:

  • NT news reports the clandestine criminal organization known as the syndicate may have upgraded one of their illegally stolen cyborg modules with additional healing technology.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Roundstart airlock electronics now properly generate the correct accesses

Joan updated:

  • Cogscarabs will once again convert metal, rods, and plasteel directly to alloy.

Mervill updated:

  • AI hologram can move seamlessly between holopads

Cobby [stolen from Bandit] updated:

  • add: Allows one to rename bartending drinks

Cyberboss updated:

  • Due to budget cuts. Firelocks no longer have safety features

28 November 2016

Swindly updated:

  • Microwaves now heat open reagent containers to 1000K.

Joan updated:

  • Interdiction Lenses are more likely to turn off if damaged.
  • Reduced Interdiction Lens and Tinkerer's Daemon CV from 25 to 20.

RemieRichards updated:

  • Devils may now spawn with an obligation to accept dance off challanges, if they have this obligation they also gain a spell to summon/unsummon a 3x3 dance floor at will.

XDTM updated:

  • Added new types of golem: glass, sand, wood, plasteel, titanium, plastitanium, alien alloy, bananium, bluespace, each with their own traits. Experiment!
  • Golems will be told what their traits are when spawning.
  • Putting a golem in a gibber will give ores of its mineral type, instead of meat.
  • Using Iron on an adamantine slime extract will spawn an incomplete golem shell, that will be slaved to whoever completes it, much like a normal adamantine golem.

27 November 2016

jughu updated:

  • Proselytizing airlocks into pinion airlocks takes longer.

Xhuis updated:

  • Cyborgs can now open morgue trays. This does not include crematoriums!

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork walls are now about as hard for hulks to break as rwalls.

Joan updated:

  • You can now quickbind up to 5 scriptures from the recital menu, and the recital menu has less empty space.
  • Clockwork slabs now only start with only Geis pre-bound.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Borers no longer randomly lose control based on host brain damage
  • Borer Dominate Victim stun time reduced from 4 -> 2.
  • Borers no longer force unhidden when infesting someone.
  • Borer event is rarer (weight 20->15).
  • Borer reproduction chemicals required increased from 100 to 200.

Xhuis updated:

  • Plastic explosives now actually explode when you commit suicide with them.
  • Resisting out of straight jackets now works properly.
  • Highlander will no longer announce the last man standing.

Lzimann updated:

  • The robots stole Santa's Elfs jobs.

26 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • Shaft miners can now redeem their starting voucher for a conscription kit, which contains everything they need to rope their friend into joining them on lavaland.

Gun Hog updated:

  • AIs piloting a mech may now be recovered with an Intellicard from the wreckage if the mech is destroyed. They will be require repair once recovered.
  • Instructions for piloting mechs as an AI are now more obvious.
  • Traitor and Ratvar AIs may now be carded from mechs, at their discretion.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Jump boots now have a pocket
  • Jump boots from mining now have on-character icons.

25 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • You can now see which emergency shuttle is coming in the status panel.

Swindly updated:

  • Wet leather can be dried by putting it on a drying rack.

Cyberboss updated:

  • False armblades are now removed after one minute. Start feeling the P A R A N O I A when you see em

Mervill updated:

  • As the AI: Click an AI status display to bring up the prompt for changing the image

Mervill updated:

  • Disposal units now use a tgui instead of plain html

Joan updated:

  • Replaced the "No Cache" alert with an alert that will show what you need for the next tier of scripture.

MrPerson updated:

  • Humans can now see in the dark slightly around themselves.

24 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • The captain may now purchase an unfinished shuttle chassis, which will dock immediately when bought, but will not launch until the end of the regular shuttle call procedure. The shuttle is empty and devoid of atmosphere however, so you'll need to do some work on it if you want a safe trip home.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The cortical borer event is now admin only

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The activation button for the AI integrity restorer modular program actually works now!

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult AIs with borgs 'slaved' to them will convert them when hacking via the robotics console.

Gun Hog updated:

  • The mech mounted plasma cutter now fires faster and costs less per
  • shot.
  • Changed the mech plasma cutter's sound to match the other cutters.

23 November 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • Multiverse sword is no longer buyable by wizards

erwgd updated:

  • Plasmamen get their own random names.

Kor updated:

  • Shaft miners now have access to the science channel.

22 November 2016

XDTM updated:

  • Golems now have special properties based on the mineral they're made of:
  • Silver golems have a higher chance of stun when punching
  • Gold golems are faster but less armoured
  • Diamond golems are more armoured
  • Uranium golems are radioactive
  • Plasma golems explode on death
  • Iron and adamantine golems are unchanged.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Changing an airlock's security level no longer heals it

Gun Hog updated:

  • Medibots now heal toxin damage again.

Joan updated:

  • Due to complaints that the new slab interface was too difficult to navigate, it now starts off in compressed format. The button to toggle this is now also larger.

21 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • Rounds ending on one server will send a news report to the other server.

Swindly updated:

  • Most small items can now be placed in the microwave. Remember not to microwave metallic objects.

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult AIs can now listen to conversations through cameras.

jakeramsay007 updated:

  • Borers can no longer take control of people who have a mindshield implant or are a member of either cult. This however does not stop them from infesting and controlling them through other means, such as chemicals.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Borers now have a 10 second delay before waking up after sugar leaves the host system
  • There is a chance for borers to lose control, based on brain damage levels

Crushtoe updated:

  • Added more tips.
  • Fixes some sprites and spelling issues, namely bedsheet capes.

20 November 2016

Cobby updated:

  • mining/labor shuttles are now radiation proof.

Joan updated:

  • Servant cyborgs no longer have emagged modules.
  • Servant cyborgs now have a limited selection of scripture and tools, which varies by cyborg type.

Basilman updated:

  • Added a new beard style, Broken Man.

Kor updated:

  • Station goals will once again function in extended.

Swindly updated:

  • Added a nitrous oxide reagent. It can be created by heating 3 parts ammonia, 1 part nitrogen, and 2 parts oxygen to 525K. The process produces water as a by-product and will cause an explosion if too much heat is applied.

19 November 2016

Incoming5643 updated:

  • The warp whistle has been added to the wizard's repertoire of spells and artifacts.
  • The drop table for summon magic has been expanded.

Cobby updated:

  • Airlock security is only given to vault doors, centcomm, and Secure Tech [Secure Tech just requires a welder]

Crushtoe updated:

  • Added a shiny new icon for the reaper's scythe in-hand and normal sprite. It's 25% less gardener.

RandomMarine updated:

  • An instruction paper has been added to the morgue on most maps, because somehow it's needed.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Added the AI integrity restorer as a modular computer program
  • Added an AI intelliCard slot. Insert an Intellicard into it to be able to use the restoration program.
  • Fixes Alarm program detecting ruins
  • Fixes being unable to toggle the card reader module power
  • The downloader will now tell you if a program is incompatible with your hardware

18 November 2016

Joan updated:

  • Added a new UI style, Clockwork.

Joan updated:

  • You can now cancel out of selecting a robot module!
  • Robot modules now only have a generic transform animation when selected; the borg is locked in place for 5 seconds in a small cloud of smoke while the base borg sprite fades out and the new module fades in.
  • Resetting a borg will do that animation.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • The charge spell should once again work correctly with guns/wands

NikNak updated:

  • Added tator tots, made my putting a potato in the food processor
  • French fries are now made by cutting up a potato into wedges and putting the wedges (plate and all) into the food processor

Cyberboss updated:

  • The amount of metal used to construct High Security airlocks with the RCD is now consistent with the actual cost

Joan updated:

  • Adds Networked Fibers, which gains points instead of automatic expansion and causes manual expansion near its core to move its core.

17 November 2016

erwgd updated:

  • You can now make emergency welding tools in the autolathe.

16 November 2016

coiax updated:

  • The observer visible countdown timer for the malfunctioning AI doomsday device is now formatted and rounded appropriately.

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult AIs have power as long as they are on a Clockwork Floor or next to a Sigil of Transmission. This is in addition to having power under normal conditions.

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult silicons can now activate Clockwork Structures from a distance.
  • Interdiction Lenses will not disable cameras if there are no living unconverted AIs.

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult Cyborgs can charge from Sigils of Transmission by crossing them; after a 5 second delay, the cyborg regains either their missing charge or the amount of power in the sigil(whichever is lower) over 10 seconds.

Swindly updated:

  • Dice can now be rigged by microwaving them.

15 November 2016

Pubby updated:

  • cyclelinked airlock pairs now close behind you even when running through at full speed.

Mysak0CZ updated:

  • Door can now have higher security, making them stronger and wires harder to access
  • More info can be found on github or wiki (if this passes)
  • Protected wires now have sprites

Kor updated:

  • You can now buy an asteroid with engines strapped to it to replace the emergency escape shuttle.
  • You can now buy a luxury shuttle to replace the emergency escape shuttle. Each crewmember must bring 500 credits worth of cash or coins to board though.

Kor updated:

  • The vault is now home to a new machine which can accept cash deposits, adding to the cargo point total.
  • You can also use this machine to steal credits from the cargo point total. Doing so takes time, and will set off an alarm.

coiax updated:

  • Mice (the rodent, not the peripheral) now start in random locations.

Supermichael777 updated:

  • The atmos grenades have been removed. if you want to burn down the shuttle use canisters or something but at least work at it.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Brains and heads with brains trigger the emergency stop on the recycler

14 November 2016

Lexorion & Lzimann updated:

  • Wizards have developed a new spell. It's called Arcane Barrage and it has been reported that it has a similar function to Lesser Summon Guns!

Joan updated:

  • Fixed Vitality Matrices and Raise Dead runes not reviving if the target happened to be in their body already.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Changed the Command and Security radio colors

Mysak0CZ updated:

  • MetaStation's xenobiology disposals now work properly

Joan updated:

  • Servants of Ratvar can now reactivate Cogscarabs with a screwdriver.
  • Cogscarab proselytizers proselytize things twice as fast.
  • Cogscarabs now have 1.6 seconds of delay when firing guns, as much as an unmodded kinetic accelerator.

Joan updated:

  • You can no longer pick up cogscarabs.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Added raw telecrystals to the uplink, can be used with uplinks and uplink implants.
  • Added 10mm ammo variants to uplink

Kor updated:

  • Extended mode now has a special command report that tells you the round type. This is to let people know they have time to start on large scale projects rather than milling about waiting for antagonists to attack.
  • All station goals are now unlocked during extended.

13 November 2016

Joan updated:

  • Servants of Ratvar can now unsecure and move most Clockwork Structures with a wrench, though doing so will damage the structure by 25% of its maximum integrity.
  • Clockwork Structures become less effective as their integrity lowers, reducing their effect by up to 50% at 25% integrity.
  • You can now deconstruct unsecured wall gears with a screwdriver.
  • Wall gears now have much more health and can be repaired with a proselytizer.

coiax updated:

  • Lich phylacteries are now in the "points of interest" for ghosts.

Mysak0CZ updated:

  • You can now use wrech to anchor (as long as it is not in space) / unanchor lockers
  • Cyborgs can now simply use "hand" to open / close lockers (instead of using toggle open verb)
  • You can now properly put unlit welder inside lockers
  • Lockers using different decostruction tools (like cardboard boxes wirecutters) can now be deconstructed too

coiax updated:

  • Swarmers can now use :b to talk on Swarm Communication.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Added the cueball helmet, scratch suit, joy mask to Autodrobe

12 November 2016

Cyberboss updated:

  • Using a screwdriver on a conveyor belt will reverse it's direction

Gun Hog updated:

  • Wizard (and Devil) fireballs now automatically toggle off once fired.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Silicons no longer get warm skin when irradiated

Cyberboss updated:

  • Medibots, by default, can no longer OD you on tricord
  • They will now use charcoal instead of anti-toxin to heal tox damage

Joan updated:

  • Reciting Scripture is now done through an actual interface, and can thus be done much faster.
  • The recital and quickbind functions that Recollection had have been moved to this interface instead.

Xhuis updated:

  • All computers now have sounds. Try them out!

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Cancel Assume Control works as borer now

Joan updated:

  • Judicial Visors now protect from flashes.

11 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • Bedsheets are now worn in the neck slot, rather than the back slot.

Kor updated:

  • The forcewall spell now creates a 3x1 wall which the caster can pass through.

10 November 2016

Cyberboss updated:

  • Facehuggers can no longer latch onto mobs without a head... How the fuck did you get a living mob without a head?

Cyberboss updated:

  • Objects will no longer get stuck behind the recycler on Boxstation

Cyberboss updated:

  • Hulks and monkeys can no longer bypass armor

Kor updated:

  • Explosions are no longer capped on the mining z level.

Kor updated:

  • The Captain can now purchase alternate escape shuttles from the communications console. This drains from the station supply of cargo points, and you can only do so once per round, so spend wisely.
  • Some shuttles are less desirable than the default, and will instead grant the station a credit bonus when purchased.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Promotion of revheads won't occur if they are restrained/incapacitated

Cyberboss updated:

  • Metastation now has a waste to space line

Joan updated:

  • You can now repair reinforced walls by using the tool you'd use to get to the state they're currently in. Examining will give you a hint as to which tool to use.

Joan updated:

  • Renamed Guvax to Geis. This also applies to the component, which has been similarly renamed.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • fixed brains not having ckeys when removed
  • hopefully fixed multiple ghosts entering a borer ghosting all but one
  • tweaked the formula for hosts needed for borer event to 1+humans/6
  • borer endround report is a lot nicer

Kor updated:

  • The wizard has a new spell, Rod Form, which allows him to transform into an immovable rod.

09 November 2016

Joan updated:

  • Vitality Matrices will no longer heal dead Servants that they cannot outright revive.

Joan updated:

  • The Celestial Gateway will now prevent the emergency shuttle from leaving.
  • However, Centcom will alert, in general terms, the location of the Celestial Gateway two minutes after it is summoned.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Removed the restriction on attacking people with a fire extinguisher on help intent if the safety is on.

Kor updated:

  • Cloaks are now cosmetic items that can be worn in the neck slot, allowing you to wear them over armour.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Added Cortical Borers, a brainslug parasite.
  • Added Cortical Borer Event

Joan updated:

  • Reciting scripture while not on the station, centcom, or mining/lavaland will double recital time and component costs.

08 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • The game will now recognize a successful detonation of the nuclear bomb in the syndicate base.

Changes updated:

  • Mini lavaland and mining shuttle
  • Old mining asteroid is more interesting (mining world can be picked in ministation.dm)
  • Space around ministation is now half(?) the size of normal space
  • Loot spawners to maintenance
  • Rad storms frying maintenance
  • Bad conveyor belts in mining/cargo area of station
  • Bombs completely destroying toxins test site
  • Cyborg job available again
  • Mining cyborgs can use steel rods when asteroid mining is enabled

Kor updated:

  • You can now examine an r-wall to find out which tool is needed to continue deconstructing it.

Joan updated:

  • Repairing clockwork structures with a Clockwork Proselytizer now only costs 1 alloy per point of damage.

07 November 2016

Kor updated:

  • Multiverse teams now have HUD icons.
  • Multiverse war is back in the spellbook.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Tesla zaps that don't come from an energy ball can no longer destroy nukes and gravity generators

Joan updated:

  • You can now Quickbind scripture other than Guvax and Vanguard to the Clockwork Slab's action buttons, via Recollection.
  • You can also recite scripture directly from Recollection, if doing so suits your taste. Of course it suits your taste, it's way easier than menus.
  • You can also toggle compact scripture in Recollection, so that you don't see description, invocation time, component cost, or tips.

Pubby updated:

  • A space monastery and chaplain job have been added to PubbyStation.

Joan updated:

  • Dropping items into Spatial Gateways no longer consumes a use from the gateway.
  • If your Spatial Gateway target is unconscious, you can pick a new target instead.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork armor is much stronger against bullets and bombs but much weaker against lasers.
  • Specific numbers; Bullet armor from 50% to 70%, bomb armor from 35% to 60%, laser armor from -15% to -25%. This means lasers are a 4-hit crit.

Joan updated:

  • Ratvarian Spears now do 18 damage and ignore a small amount of armor on normal attacks, but have a slightly lower chance to knowdown/knockout. Impaling also ignores a larger amount of armor.
  • Throwing a Ratvarian Spear at a Servant will not damage them and may cause them to catch the spear.

06 November 2016

Basilman updated:

  • CQC users can now block attacks by having their throw mode on.
  • The CQC kick and Disorient-disarm combos are now much easier to use, CQC harm intent attacks are stronger aswell.
  • Fixed being able to CQC restrain someone, let him go, then 10 minutes later disarm someone else to instantly chokehold them.
  • CQC costs more TC (13)

Joan updated:

  • Standard drones will be converted to Cogscarabs by Ratvar and the Celestial Gateway proselytization.
  • Cogscarabs no longer receive station alerts.
  • Anima Fragments, Clockwork Marauders, and cult constructs are now properly immune to heat and electricity.

phil235 updated:

  • Altclicking a PDA without id now removes its pen.
  • The PDA's sprite now shows whether it has an id, a pAI, a pen, or if its light is on.

05 November 2016

Joan updated:

  • Dragging people over a Vitality Matrix will actually cause the Matrix to start working on them instead of failing to start draining because it's "active" from when the dragging person crossed it.

phil235 updated:

  • You can now use tabs when writing on paper by writing "[tab]"

phil235 updated:

  • You can now climb on transit tube, like tables.

04 November 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • You can no longer walk holding shift.

Joan updated:

  • Heal glows now appear when mending motors repair clockwork mobs and objects.

Joan updated:

  • Proselytizer conversion now accounts for existing materials, and deconstructing a wall, a girder, or a window for its materials is no longer more efficient than just converting it.

02 November 2016

Joan updated:

  • Clockcult's "Convert All Silicons" objective now also requires that Application scripture is unlocked.
  • The "Convert All Silicons" objective will also only be given if there is an AI, instead of only if there is a silicon.

Joan updated:

  • Proselytizing a window will automatically proselytize any grilles under it. This is free, so don't worry about wasting alloy.
  • Trying to proselytize something that can't be proselytized will try to proselytize the turf under it, instead.

Cobby updated:

  • Adds a geisha outfit to the clothesmate on hacking. QT space ninja BF not included

Joan updated:

  • Hulks no longer one-shot most clockwork structures and will no longer four-shot the Gateway to the Celestial Derelict.
  • Hulks are no longer a blob counter.

Joan updated:

  • Mending Motors have an increased range and heal for more.
  • Mending Motors will no longer waste massive amounts of power on slightly damaged objects; instead, they will heal a small amount, use a small amount of power, and stop if the object is fully healed.
  • Mending Motors can now heal all clockwork objects, including pinion airlocks, brass windows, and anything else you can think of.

Joan updated:

  • Ocular Wardens will no longer attack targets that are handcuffed, buckled to something AND lying, or in the process of being converted by Guvax.
  • Also, they do very slightly more damage.

XDTM updated:

  • Ninjas are now slightly visible when stealthing.

01 November 2016

Joan updated:

  • Brass windows and windoors no longer drop full sheets of brass when destroyed.
  • Instead, they'll drop gear bits, which can be proselytized for a small amount of liquified alloy; 80% of the materials used to construct the window.

phil235 updated:

  • Spray cleaner and soap can now wash off paint color.

31 October 2016

Xhuis updated:

  • Disposal units, outlets, etc. are now fireproof.
  • Changelings can now use biodegrade to escape silk cocoons.

Joan updated:

  • Brass windows will now survive two fireaxe hits, and are slightly more resistant to bullets.

Lzimann updated:

  • Changelings no longer have the Swap Forms ability.

30 October 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • You can once again order books by its ID in the library.

Joan updated:

  • The Recollection option in the Clockwork Slab has been significantly improved, with a better information to fluff ratio, and the ability to toggle which tiers of scripture that are visible in Recollection.

bgobandit updated:

  • The creepy clown epidemic has arrived at Space Station 13.
  • Honk.

29 October 2016

Mysak0CZ updated:

  • You no longer need to deconstruct emagged (or AI-hacked) APC to fix them, replacing board is sufficient
  • You can no longer unlock AI-hacked APCs
  • Removing APC's and SMES's terminal no longer ignore current tool's speed
  • You can repair APC's cover (only if APC is not compleatly broken) by using APC frame on it
  • closing APC's cover will lock it

Erwgd updated:

  • The NanoMed Plus now stocks premium items.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Caches no longer need to see a clockwork wall to link to it and generate components.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Shoes do not go on heads.

Cobby updated:

  • Adds several Halloween-Themed Emojis. See if you can get them all! [no code diving cheaters!]

Joan updated:

  • Guvax is now targeted; invoking it charges your slab to bind and start converting the next target attacked in melee within 10 seconds. This makes your slab visible in-hand.
  • Above 5 Servants, the invocation to charge your slab is not whispered, and the conversion time is increased for each Servant above 5.
  • Using Guvax on an already bound target will stun them. The bound target can resist out, which will prevent conversion.
  • Sentinel's Compromise is now targeted, like Guvax, but can select any target in vision range.
  • Sentinel's Compromise now also removes holy water from the target Servant.
  • Clicking your slab will cancel these scriptures.
  • Both of these will change your cursor, to make it obvious they're active and you can't do anything else.

Chowder McArthor updated:

  • Added in icons for the neck slot for the other huds.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The HOS and other heads of staff no longer have a chance to be revheads

XDTM updated:

  • Wizards no longer need sandals to cast robed spells.

TehZombehz updated:

  • Small cartons can be crafted using 1 piece of cardboard. Don't be late for school.
  • Apples can now be juiced for apple juice. Chocolate milk can now be crafted using milk and cocoa.
  • Chocolate bar recipe has been modified to compensate for chocolate milk. The soy milk version of the chocolate bar recipe remains unchanged.
  • Grapes can now be properly juiced for grape juice using a grinder.

TehZombehz updated:

  • Custom food items can now fit inside of smaller containers, such as paper sacks.

28 October 2016

Joan updated:

  • Arks of the Clockwork Justicar that do not summon Ratvar will still quick-call the shuttle.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork structures that return power can now return power to the APC of the area they're in if there happens to be one.
  • Clockwork structures that use power from an APC will cause that APC to start charging and update the tgUI of anyone looking at the APC.

Joan updated:

  • Converting metal, rods, or plasteel to brass with a clockwork proselytizer while holding it will no longer leave a remainder inside of you.
  • Plasteel to brass is now a 2:1 ratio, from a 2.5:1 ratio. Accordingly, you now only need 2 sheets of plasteel to convert it to brass instead of 10 sheets.
  • Wall gears are now converted to brass sheets instead of directly to alloy.
  • You can no longer do other proselytizer actions while refueling from a cache.
  • Fixed a bug where certain stacks wouldn't merge with other stacks, even when they should have been.
  • Clockwork structures constructed from brass sheets now all have appropriate construction value to replicant alloy ratios.

Xhuis updated:

  • Syndicate and malfunctioning AIs may now be transferred onto an intelliCard if their parent core has been destroyed. This may only be done with the AI's consent, and the AI may not be re-transferred onto another APC or the APC it came from.

Pubby updated:

  • The holodeck has been upgraded with new programs. Try them out!

Xhuis updated:

  • New additions have been made for this Halloween and all future ones. Happy Halloween!

ma44 updated:

  • You can now solidify liquid gold into sheets of gold with frostoil and a very little amount of iron

NikNak updated:

  • Action figures are finally winnable at arcade machines. Comes in boxes of 4.

27 October 2016

Erwgd updated:

  • You can now use cloth to make black or fingerless gloves.
  • Biogenerators require less biomass to produce botanist's leather gloves.

Tacolizard updated:

  • Added a new contraband crate to cargo, the ATV crate.

WJohnston updated:

  • Adds an unlocked miner equipment locker on Boxstation and Metastation's Aux Base Construction area, as well as a telescreen to the camera inside. All mining outpost computers can also see through that camera.

Swindly updated:

  • Chem implants can now be properly filled and implanted

26 October 2016

Gun Hog updated:

  • Fixed AIs uploaded to mechs having their camera view stuck to their card.

Chowder McArthor updated:

  • Added a neck slot.
  • Modified some of the attachment items (ties, scarves, etc) to be neck slot items instead.

Cyberboss updated:

  • NEW HOTKEYS
  • The number pad can be used to select the body part you want to target (Cycle through head -> eyes -> mouth with 8) in hotkey mode. Be sure Numlock is on!
  • Holding shift can be used as a modifier to your current run state in both hotkey and normal mode.

25 October 2016

Cyberboss updated:

  • Emag can no longer be spammed on shuttle console

Joan updated:

  • The Interdiction Lens now properly has a high Belligerent Eye cost instead of a high Replicant Alloy cost.

lordpidey updated:

  • The wizard federation has teamed up with various LARP groups to invent a new type of spell.

Pubby updated:

  • PubbyStation's bar is now themed like a spooky castle!

24 October 2016

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Floors now have a glow when healing servants of toxin damage. Only other servants can see it, so don't get any funny ideas.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Daemons are now a structure instead of a Cache addon.
  • Tinkerer's Daemons now consume a small amount of power when producing a component, but produce components every 12 seconds with no additional delay.
  • Adjusted the costs of the Tinkerer's Daemon and Interdiction Lens.
  • Floaty component images appear when Tinkerer's Caches and Daemons produce components.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork marauders now have a HUD, showing block chance, counter chance, health, fatigue, and host health(if applicable), as well as including a button to try to emerge/recall.
  • Clockwork marauders can now block bullets and thrown items, even if Ratvar has not risen.

Cobby updated:

  • Finally, a way to relate to Bees!

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Spectral sword now tracks orbiting ghosts correctly.

Joan updated:

  • The Judicial Visor no longer requires an open hand to use. Instead, clicking the button will give you a target selector to place the Judicial Marker.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Damaged airlocks now have a sparking effect

Cyberboss updated:

  • Spray bottle can now be used in the chem dispenser

ma44 updated:

  • Reminds the user that reading or writing a book is stupid.

Swindly updated:

  • Added a button to the ChemMaster that dispenses the entire buffer to bottles.

Batman updated:

  • The sniper rifle descriptions are less edgy.

23 October 2016

Cyberboss updated:

  • Morphs no longer gain the transparency of chameleons

Cyberboss updated:

  • Turrets can no longer shoot when unwrenched

Cyberboss updated:

  • Labcoats no longer have pockets

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Atmos grenades are now in the game and uplink

Cyberboss updated:

  • NOHUNGER species no longer hunger

Yackemflam updated:

  • Riot helmets are now more useful in melee situations and the standard helmet is now slightly weaker

Cyberboss updated:

  • Appropriate gloves now protect you from getting burned by cheap cigarette lighters

Cyberboss updated:

  • Fixed a bug that caused door buttons to open doors one after another rather than simultaneously like they are suppose to

22 October 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • tweak: Being hit by a shuttle is actually dangerous now.

21 October 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Breathing has been moved from species to the lung organ
  • Lung transplants are now possible!

Swindly updated:

  • The action button for a dental implant now includes the name of the pill
  • The pill activation button now properly displays the pill's icon

Joan updated:

  • Wraith Spectacles will now slowly repair the eye damage they did to you as long as you aren't wearing them.
  • You can now see how much eye damage the spectacles have done to you overall, as well as how close you are to being nearsighted/blinded.

Screemonster updated:

  • The anti-tamper mechanism on abandoned crates now resists tampering.
  • Secure, non-abandoned crates can be given a %chance of exploding when tampered with. Defaults to 0.

Joan updated:

  • The range for seeing visible messages in combat is a tile higher.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Your brain is now gibbed upon chestburst

Adam E. updated:

  • Added cargo and engi access to auxillary mine base launching console.

20 October 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The Swap minds wizard event will now function

Joan updated:

  • Mending Motors heal for more.
  • Mania Motors are overall more powerful; they have greater effect, but require more power to run and less power to convert adjacent targets.
  • Interdiction Lenses no longer require power to disrupt electronics and will no longer disrupt the radios of servants.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Adds more replacements to the Swedish gene

Joan updated:

  • You need to be holding teleport talismans and wizard teleport scrolls in your hands when you finish the input, and cannot simply open the input and finish it whenever you get stunned.

Cyberboss updated:

  • The safe is indestructible again

19 October 2016

XDTM updated:

  • PanD.E.M.I.C. now displays the statistics of the viruses inside.

Cyberboss updated:

  • The BSA is no longer ready to fire when constructed
  • The BSA can no longer be reloaded faster by rebuilding the console

Cyberboss updated:

  • You can now attack doors with fireaxes and crowbars when using the harm intent

MrStonedOne updated:

  • tweaked the settings of the space drift subsystem to be less effected by anti-lag slowdowns

phil235 updated:

  • Made the singularity gen and tesla gen immune to fire.
  • All unique traitor steal objective item are now immune to all damage except severity=1 explosion.
  • Mobs on fire no longer get damage to their worn backpacks, belts, id, pocket stuff, and suit storage.
  • Mob receiving melee attacks now only have its outer layer of clothes damaged, e.g. no damage to jumpsuit when wearing a suit.
  • now all hardsuit have 50% more health, as intended.

Pubby updated:

  • A new map: PubbyStation. Set it to your favorite in map preferences!

wrist updated:

  • Toxins is different now.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Physically speaking is no longer delayed by your radio's lag

18 October 2016

Yackemflam updated:

  • fixed the standard vest being weaker than the slim variant

MrPerson updated:

  • New toxin - Rotatium. It doesn't quite do what it does on other servers. Instead it rocks your game view back and forth while slowly doing toxin damage. The rocking gets more intense with time.
  • To make it, mix equal parts mindbreaker, neurotoxin, and teslium.

lordpidey updated:

  • There is a new potential obligation for devils to have. Musical duels. Ask your nearest devil for a musical duel, there's a 14% chance he's obligated to do it.
  • Removed the old offering a drink obligation for devils, it overlapped too much with the food obligation.
  • Trying to clone people who've sold their soul now results in FUN.
  • Devils can no longer spam ghosts with revival contracts.

Kor updated:

  • Added sloths to cargobay on Box and Meta

17 October 2016

phil235 updated:

  • Visual effects appear on the target of an attack, similar to the item attack effect.
  • You now only see a message in chat when witnessing someone else getting attacked or hit by a bullet if you are close enough to the action.

XDTM updated:

  • You can now grind slime extracts in a reagent grinder. If the slime was unused it will result in slime jelly, while if used it will only output the reagents inside the extract.

Basilman updated:

  • A third martial art, CQC, has been added and is now available to nuke ops instead of sleeping carp

TheCarlSaganExpress updated:

  • Provided you have access, you may now use your ID to unlock the display case.
  • The fire axe cabinet and display case may now be repaired with the welder.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • fixed removing modular computer components

16 October 2016

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Byond 511 beta users may now choose their own FPS. This will apply to animations and other client side only effects. Find it in your game preferences.

phil235 updated:

  • Clicking a floor with a bodybag or roller bed now deploys them directly (and the bodybag starts open)

15 October 2016

Joan updated:

  • Normal blob spores now take two welder hits to die, from three.
  • Cyborgs now die much less rapidly to blob attacks.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Modular consoles have been fixed.

Yackemflam updated:

  • extinguishers now spray faster

Cyberboss updated:

  • Plasma fires no longer cause cameras to break.

scoopscoop updated:

  • The cult shifter will now properly spawn as part of the veil walker set.

14 October 2016

Supermichael777 updated:

  • Changeling Sting is now one part screwdriver cocktail and 2 parts lemon-lime soda.
  • Triple citrus now actually displays its sprite.

13 October 2016

Cuboos updated:

  • Added a new unique tool belt to the CE
  • Added new power tools, a hand drill that can be used as a screw driver or wrench and jaws of life which can be used as either a crowbar or wire cutters
  • Power tools can also be made from the protolathe with engineering and electromagnet 6
  • slightly revamped how construction/deconstruction handle sound
  • added new sounds for the power tools
  • added a new sound for activating and deactivating welding tools, just because.

coiax updated:

  • RCDs have a Toggle Window Type verb allowing the rapid construction of reinforced windows, rather than regular windows.
  • RCDs can now finish and deconstruct wall girders.

Joan updated:

  • Blazing Oil blobs are now outright immune to fire. This does not affect damage taken from other sources that happen to do burn damage.

Lzimann updated:

  • Changed two admin hotkeys: f7 is now stealth-mode and f8 to toggle-build-mode-self.

12 October 2016

ma44 updated:

  • Cargo can now order a 2500 supply point crate that requires a QM or above to unlock. This crates contains a explorer suit, compact pickaxe, mesons, and a bag to hold ore with.

Razharas updated:

  • Makes clicking something in heat of battle a bit easier by making drag&drops that dont have any effect be counted as clicks

XDTM updated:

  • You can now store monkey cubes in bio bags; using bio bags on the consoles will load them with the monkey cubes inside the bags.

XDTM updated:

  • Added four new symptoms: Regeneration and Tissue Regrowth heal respectively brute and burn damage slowly; Flesh Mending and Heat Resistance are the level 8 version of those symptoms, and heal faster.
  • The Toxic Compensation, Toxic Metabolism and Stimulants symptoms have been removed.
  • Viruses no longer stack. Viruses can be overridden if the infecting virus has higher transmittability than the previous virus' resistance.
  • Viruses can now have 8 symptoms, up from 6.

XDTM updated:

  • Airlocks are now immune to any damage below 20, to prevent pickaxe prison breaks.
  • High-Security Airlocks, such as the vault or the AI core's airlocks, are now immune to any damage below 30.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Fixed motion alarms instantly triggering and de/un/re/triggering

XDTM updated:

  • Exhausted slime extracts will now dissolve instead of leaving useless used slime extracts.

11 October 2016

Cyberboss updated:

  • Airlock speed mode now works

WJohnston updated:

  • Recolored and resprited candles and ID cards. Folders should have improved color contrast.

Joan updated:

  • You can now deconstruct AI cores that contain no actual AI.

Papa Bones updated:

  • You harvest flora on lavaland with your hands, not a knife. My bad.

Papa Bones updated:

  • Flora now spawns in lavaland tunnels, they can be harvested with a knife.
  • Flora have a range of effects, be careful what you eat!

10 October 2016

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Wizards may finally use jaunt and blink on the escape shuttle. Maybe elsewhere too?
  • The previously broken radios in the wizards den should work now. You still have to turn them on though.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Cargo can order the antimatter engine

Kor updated:

  • Added frogs, with sprites by WJ and sounds by Cuboos.

Cyberboss updated:

  • The waste line now has a digital valve leading to space (off by default) along with a port on it's far side

Cyberboss updated:

  • More reagent containers can be used for filling your dirty vapor cancer sticks
  • Fixed some vape spelling/grammar

09 October 2016

ChemicalRascal updated:

  • Previously, improving the incinerator's efficiency made the RPM decay more quickly, instead of less quickly. No more!

Supermichael777 updated:

  • The wizards federation have instituted a strict 1 demon limit on demon bottles.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Player Preferences window made slightly faster.

Nanotrasen Stress Relief Board updated:

  • Claymores created through Highlander no longer thirst for blood or announce their wielder's location incessantly.
  • Claymores should now properly absorb fallen foes' corpses.
  • Losing a limb now properly destroys your claymore.

XDTM updated:

  • You can now retrieve materials inserted in a Drone Shell Dispenser with a crowbar.

XDTM updated:

  • Using blood on an Oil Slime will create Corn Oil.
  • Using blood on Pyrite Slimes will create a random crayon.
  • Using water on Orange Slimes will create a small smoke cloud.
  • Using water on Blue Slimes will spawn foam.

phil235 updated:

  • A whole bunch of structures and machines can now be broken and destroyed using conventional attack methods.
  • The effect of fire on objects is overhauled. When on fire, your external clothes now take fire damage and can become ashes, unless fire proof. All objects caught in a fire can now take fire damage, instead of just flammable ones, unless fire proof.
  • Acid effect is overhauled. Splashing acid on something puts a green effect on it and start slowly melting it. Throwing acid on mobs puts acid on their clothes. Acid can destroy structures and items alike, as long as they're not acid proof. The more acid put on an object, the faster it melts. Walking on an acid puddle puts acid on your shoes or burns your bare feet. Picking up an item with acid without adequate glove protection burns your hand. Acid can be washed away with any sort of water source (extinguisher, shower, water glass,etc...).
  • When a mob receives melee attacks, its clothes also get damaged. Clothes with enough damage get a visual effect. Damaged clothes can be repaired with cloth (produced with botany's biogenerator). Clothes that receives too much melee damage become shreds.
  • Clicking a structure/machine with an item on help intent can never result in an attack.
  • Hostile animals that are environment destroyers no longer destroys tables&closets in one hit. It now takes several hits depending on the animal.

06 October 2016

WJohnston updated:

  • Improved/resprited Paper, stamps, folders, small fires, pens, energy daggers, cabinets, newspaper and other bureaucracy related items.

05 October 2016

WJohnston updated:

  • Improved/resprited a few bar signs, basketball/dodgeball/hoop, blood bags, and body bags.

WJohnston updated:

  • Improved/resprited AI card, pAI, easel/canvases, shotgun shells, RCD cartridge, speedloaders, and certain older buttons.

03 October 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • removed morphine from nurse spiders
  • cocoon breakout time is faster
  • Spiderwebs are no longer tables

XDTM updated:

  • You can now stabilize unstable mutation toxin with different chems to get the race you want.

01 October 2016

XDTM updated:

  • Abductors no longer delete their research data when buying new gear.
  • The Plasma Gland no longer gibs, but instead causes the abductee to vomit plasma every once in a while.

30 September 2016

Incoming5643 updated:

  • After years of having to live on a mostly blown up hunk of junk the wizard's ship has finally been repaired
  • No one paid attention to that lore anyway

28 September 2016

LanCartwright updated:

  • Removed Stimulants and Coffee from survival pens.
  • Nanites have been replaced with Mining Nanites which heal more when you are lower health, and do not have the ridiculous healing Adminorazine had.

27 September 2016

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Custom Round end sounds selected by admins will be preloaded to all clients before actually rebooting the world

TrustyGun+Pubby updated:

  • Lawyers now have unique speech bubbles.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Fixes broken icon states when replacing warning floor tile

Supermichael777 updated:

  • Cat men have finally achieved equal discrimination.

Cobby updated:

  • Nanotrasen has buffed the electronic safety devices found in Secure Briefcases and Wallsafes, making them... well... more secure. In Particular, we added more wires that do absolutely nothing but hinder the use of the multitool, along with removing the ID slot only used by syndicates to emag the safe.

uraniummeltdown updated:

  • Protolathe stock parts now build 5 times faster

Incoming5643 updated:

  • The secret satchels system has been updated to hide more smuggler's satchels hidden randomly under the station
  • In case you forgot about the secret satchel system, basically if you take a smuggler's satchel (a traitor item also occasionally found under a random tile in the station [USE T-RAYS]), stow away an item in it, and bury it under the floor tiles that item can reappear in a random later round!

XDTM updated:

  • Using plasma on dark blue slimes will now spawn freon instead of arbitrarily freezing mobs.

26 September 2016

TheCarlSaganExpress updated:

  • You may now insert crayons, lipstick, penlights, or cigarettes in your PDA.
  • Removing cartridges from the PDA will no longer cause them to automatically fall to the floor.

25 September 2016

Razharas updated:

  • "Kudzu now keeps the mutations it had before and thus can be properly cultivated to be whatever you want"

24 September 2016

Joan updated:

  • Blobs will generally require fewer blobs to win during the blob mode, which should hopefully make the mode end faster at lower overmind amounts.

oranges updated:

  • It looks like a pizza delivery from an un-named station got misplaced

optional name here updated:

  • Changes cursed heart description to something slightly more clear.
  • Fixes a capitalization issue

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Orbits now use a subsystem.
  • Orbits now bind to object's moving to allow for quicker updates, subsystem fallback for when that doesn't work (for things inside of things or things that move without announcing it)

Cheridan updated:

  • Nerfed Critical Hits

XDTM updated:

  • Atomic Bomb, Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster, Neurotoxin and Hippie's Delight are now proper alcoholic drinks, and as such can disinfect, ignite, and be purged by antihol.

XDTM updated:

  • Viruses start with 0 in every stat instead of 1.

23 September 2016

Incoming5643 + WJohnston updated:

  • Lizard sprites have received an overhaul, sprites courtesy of WJohnston!
  • While there are some new bits, a few old bits have gone by the wayside, if your lizard has been affected by this the specific feature will be randomized until you pick a new setting.
  • Lizards can now choose to have digitigrade legs (those weird backwards bending ones). Keep in mind that they can only be properly seen in rather short pants. They also preclude the use of shoes. By default no lizard will have these legs, you have to opt in.
  • All ash walker lizards however are forced to have these legs.
  • There is absolutely no tactical benefits to using digitigrade legs, you are only crippling yourself if you use them.

22 September 2016

Papa Bones updated:

  • You can now quick-draw the officer's sabre from its sheath by alt-clicking it.

Cyberboss updated:

  • Wire layouts of NanoTransen devices for the round can now be found in the Station Blueprints

XDTM updated:

  • Holy Water no longer leaves you stuttering for years.

21 September 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • tweak: Instead of being sold by kitchen's vending machine, the whetstone now spawns in chef's backpack!

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Fixes minimap generation crashes by making parts of it less precise

Cyberboss updated:

  • Tesla arcs no longer lose power when passing through a coil that isn't connected to a grid

Cyberboss updated:

  • The food processor's sprite's maintenance panel is no longer open while closed and vice/versa

20 September 2016

Joan updated:

  • The Raise Dead rune no longer requires a noncultist corpse to revive a cultist; instead, it will draw from the pool of all people sacrificed to power the rune.

Yackemflam updated:

  • The syndicate has learned on how to give their agents a true syndicate ninja experience.

phil235 updated:

  • adds a talk button next to the crafting button. Clicking it makes a "wheel" appear around you with short predetermined messages that you click to say them. This lets you say common responses without having to type in the chat bar. Current messages available are: "Hi", "Bye", "Thanks", "Come", "Help", "Stop", "Get out", "Yes", and "No". The talk button can be activated with the hotkey "H" or "CTRL+H"

Nanotrasen Stress Relief Board updated:

  • Latecomers to highlander can now join in on the fun.
  • The crew are encouraged to less pacifistic during highlander. Failing to shed blood will result in your soul being devoured. Have a nice day.

Mekhi updated:

  • Nanotrasen has been experimenting on cybernetics for a while, and rumors are they have a few combat prototypes available...
  • New arm implants: Energy-blade projector, implanted medical beamgun, stun-arm implant (Like the borg version), flash implant that is automatically-regenerating and doubles as a powerful flashlight. There is also one with all four items in one. Also, a surgery toolkit implant. Adminspawn only for the moment.

Screemonster updated:

  • Abandoned crates no longer accept impossible guesses.
  • Lets players know that all the digits in the code must be unique.
  • Reads the last guess back on the multitool along with the correct/incorrect guess readout.
  • multitool output on crates no longer returns nonsense values.

hamzah-hayat updated:

  • Added a Experimental Limb Grower to the medbay department, now medical stuff can grow synthetic limbs using Synthflesh to help crew that suffer any work related accidents. There may also be a limb that can be grown with a special card...

Ergovisavi updated:

  • fixed "friendly" xenobio mobs and mining drones attacking station drones

Joan updated:

  • Bubblegum has been seen reaching through blood. Try not to get hit.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Fixed space/nograv movement not triggering when atoms moved twice quickly in space/nograv

19 September 2016

Nicho1010 updated:

  • Fixed lattices appearing after exploding lava

feemjmeem updated:

  • You can now disassemble meatspike frames with a welding tool.

XDTM updated:

  • Positive viruses are now recognized by medical HUDs with a special icon.
  • fully_heal no longer removes nonharmful viruses. This affects legion souls, staffs of healing, and changeling's revive.

XDTM updated:

  • Canisters of any type of gas are now orderable in cargo. Dangerous experimental gases will require Research Director approval.

17 September 2016

phil235 updated:

  • Wearing colored glasses colors your vision. This option can be enabled/disabled by alt-clicking any glasses with such feature.

Joan updated:

  • Miners can now buy KA AoE damage mods from the mining vendor for 2000 points per mod.

Joan updated:

  • Combined the Convert and Sacrifice runes into one rune. It'll convert targets that are alive and eligible, and attempt to sacrifice them otherwise. The only changes to mechanics are that: Converting someone will heal them of all brute and burn damage they had, and sacrificing anything will always produce a soulstone(but will still only sometimes fill it)
  • You can no longer teleport to Teleport runes that have dense objects on top of them.
  • Wall runes will now activate other nearby wall runes when activated, but will automatically disable after a minute and a half of continuous activity and become unusable for 5 seconds.
  • The Blood Boil rune no longer does all of its damage instantly or stuns, but if you remain in range for the full duration you will be sent deep into critical.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Added a nightvision toggle to Shadowpeople
  • Made several anomalous crystal variants more easily identified/easier to see the effects thereof, and removed the "magic" activation possibility (replaced with the "bomb" flag)

16 September 2016

phil235 updated:

  • Added new things
  • added some icons and images

15 September 2016

Joan updated:

  • Volt Void and Interdiction Lenses will now drain mech cells of energy.
  • Ocular Wardens do slightly more damage to mechs.
  • Replicant, Soul Vessel, Cogscarab, and Anima Fragment now take an additional second to recite.
  • Anima Fragments do slightly less damage in melee.
  • Mending Motors and Clockwork Obelisks have slightly less health.
  • Invoking Nezbere now requires 3 invokers.
  • Clockwork armor no longer has 5% energy resistance.
  • You can no longer construct clockwork structures on space turfs.

Gun Hog updated:

  • Nanotrasen Robotics Division is proud to announce slightly less clunky leg servo designs relating to the "Ripley" APLU and "Firefighter" exosuits. Tests show increased mobility in both high and low pressure environments. The previous designer has been fired for incompetence.

14 September 2016

Joan updated:

  • Megafauna will now use ranged attacks even if they don't have direct vision on their target.

Papa Bones updated:

  • BZ gas is no longer available on Box and Metastation layouts.

phil235 updated:

  • You no longer have to click a megaphone to use it, you simply keep it in your active hand and talk normally.

Improves tablets design updated:

  • Brings the tablet icons into the holy light of having depth

13 September 2016

Erwgd updated:

  • Upgraded sleepers can now inject inacusiate to treat ear damage.

Slignerd updated:

  • Captain's space armor has been readapted with modern hardsuit technology.

oranges updated:

  • Examine code for dismembered humans now has better easter eggs

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Fixes lockers, bodybags, etc, giving you ash storm / radiation storm protection

Joan updated:

  • Added brass, producible by proselytizing rods, metal, or plasteel, or by using Replicant Alloy in-hand, and usable to construct a variety of cult-y brass objects.
  • Objects constructable with brass include; wall gears, pinion airlocks, brass windoors, brass windows, brass table frames and tables, and brass floor tiles.
  • Cogscarabs can convert brass sheets into liquified alloy with their proselytizer.
  • You can use brass sheets on wall gears to produce clockwork walls, or, if the gear is unanchored, false clockwork walls.
  • Fixed a bug preventing you from converting grilles into ratvar grilles.
  • Please note that conservation of mass exists.

12 September 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Minimaps will now try to load from a cache or backup file if minimap generation is disabled.

Nanotrasen Anti-Cheese Committee updated:

  • A glitch in the hydroponics tray firmware allowed it to retain plant growth even after the plant was removed, resulting in the next planted seed being grown instantaneously. This is no longer possible.

Joan updated:

  • The Recollection function of the clockwork slab is much more useful and easier to parse.
  • Tweaked the Recital menus for scripture so the scripture are all in the proper order. This might fuck you up if you were used to the incorrect order, but you'll get used to it.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Tesla shocks from grilles will no longer do thousands and thousands of damage. They now properly deal burn damage that is equal to the current power in the powernet divided by 5000.

Papa Bones updated:

  • You can now rename the captain's sabre by using a pen on it.

phil235 updated:

  • Monkeys can be dismembered.
  • Humans, monkeys and aliens can drop limbs when they are gibbed.
  • Roboticists can remove flashes, wires and power cells that they inserted in robot head or torso by using a crowbar on it.
  • visual wounds appear on a monkey's bodyparts when injured, exactly like humans.
  • Using a health analyzer on a monkey or alien shows the injuries to each bodypart.
  • Monkeys can become husks.
  • Human-monkey transformations now respect missing limbs. No more limb regrowth by becoming a monkey.
  • Changeling's regenerate ability also work while in monkey form.
  • Alien larva has its own gib and dust animation.
  • A bodypart that looks wounded still looks bloody when dismembered.
  • Amputation surgery now works on robotic limbs, and monkeys.

11 September 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • Added the functionality for mobs to have multiple hands, this might have broken some things, so please report any weirdness

10 September 2016

TheCarlSaganExpress updated:

  • Crayons, lipstick, cigarettes, and penlights can now be inserted into PDAs.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The surplus crate and random item will now only contain items allowed by the gamemode
  • removes sleeping carp scroll from surplus crates

Joan updated:

  • Cult structures can once again be constructed with runed metal.
  • Cult structures can now take damage and be destroyed. Artificers can repair them if they're damaged.

  • Blessed our beloved code with dark magic.

  • Radiation storms now cause a radiation alert to appear for the duration

  • Added some very fancy tables, constructed by adding carpet tiles to a standard table frame.

  • Notes can now be tagged as secret to be hidden from player viewed notes.

Cheridan updated:

  • Brain damage no longer causes machines to be inoperable.

Lzimann updated:

  • Stunprods no longer fit in your backpack, they go on your back now.

Joan updated:

  • The lava staff now has a short delay before creating lava, with a visible indicator.
  • The lava staff's cooldown is now somewhat shorter, and turning lava back into basalt has a much shorter cooldown and no delay.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • AFK players will no longer default to continue playing during restart votes.

  • Cloners now preserve your genetic mutations.

  • you can now label canisters as freon and water vapor

  • Fixed lava sometimes doing massive amounts of damage.

pubby updated:

  • Changed military belt TC cost from 3 -> 1

03 September 2016

MMMiracles updated:

  • A set of combat gear for bears has been added, see your local russian for more information.

A-t48 updated:

  • Radiation storms no longer spam "Your armor softened the blow."
  • Radiation always gives a message that you are being irradiated, regardless of armor level (only an issue if you stripped off all clothing)
  • Radiation now displays a message appropriate for all mob types (no longer references clothes).

Joan updated:

  • You can no longer use telekinesis to hit people with items they're holding, items inside items they're holding, items embedded in them, items actually implanted in them, or items they're wearing.

XDTM updated:

  • Nanotrasen has now stocked the DNA Manipulators with potassium iodide instead of epinephrine as rejuvenators.

Gun Hog updated:

  • Ghosts may now read an AI or Cyborg's laws by examining them.

Joan updated:

  • Added the 'Drain Life' rune to the runes cultists can make. It will drain life from all creatures on the rune, healing the invoker.
  • The 'Astral Communion' rune has a new sprite, made by WJohnston.

Joan updated:

  • The talisman of construction now has 25 uses, each of which can convert a sheet of plasteel to a sheet of runed metal. It can still convert metal into construct shells, and requires no specific amount of uses to do so.

02 September 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • Cutting bedsheets with a sharp object/wirecutters no longer puts the resulting cloth INSIDE OF YOU if you're holding it, what a bug.

A-t48 updated:

  • Fixed cyborgs being able to use Power Warning emote when broken.

bgobandit updated:

  • You can hide small items in urinals now. Use a screwdriver to screw open the drain enclosure.
  • Every space urinal comes complete with space urinal cake. Do not eat.

01 September 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Pizza bombs will now delete after exploding.

Lzimann updated:

  • You can now open all access doors while restrained.

Cruix updated:

  • fortune cookies will now drop their fortunes when they are eaten.

  • Putting packagewrap or hand labeler in a backpack is now done by clicking and dragging.
  • You can now wrap backpacks and other storage items with packagewrap.

  • Watertanks will now explode when shot.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Rad storms are more obvious

30 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Vanguard now has a tooltip showing the amount of stuns you've absorbed and will be affected by.

XDTM updated:

  • Metal slimes now spawn a few sheets of glass when injected with water.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Xenomorphs can now actually damage barricades.

yackemflam updated:

  • The standard rounds now blow off limbs. Happy hunting!

xxalpha updated:

  • Opening and closing of donut boxes, etc. is now done with clicking the object with itself.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Fixed runtime preventing access locked programs from being downloaded

oranges updated:

  • The ed209 can now only fire as fast as the portaturrets

29 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Lava bubbling up from basalt turfs now glows if in sufficient concentration.
  • Necropolis tendrils now glow.
  • Lava rivers now have riverbanks, and should overall look much nicer.

Cruix updated:

  • Space floppy-disk technology has advanced to the point that multiple technologies or designs can be stored on a single disk.

28 August 2016

Xhuis updated:

  • Highlander has been revamped. Now you can butcher your coworkers in cold blood like never before!

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The revenant ectoplasm sprite is no longer invisible.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Due to a bad case of "being terrible" the save system for secret satchels has been reworked. All saves are now unified in a single data file: /data/npc_saves/SecretSatchels
  • Old savefiles such as: /data/npc_saves/SecretSatchels_Box Station can now be safely removed.

Kor updated:

  • Added Battlemage armour to the spellbook. The armour is heavily shielded, but will not recharge once the shields are depleted.
  • Added armour runes to the spellbook, which can grant additional charges to the Battlemage armour.

Joan updated:

  • Placing a singularity or energy ball generator directly in front of an active particle accelerator may be a bad idea.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • The tesla is now much more dangerous, and can cause electronics to explode violently.

Joan updated:

  • The staff of lava can now turn lava back into basalt.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • A new slime reaction has been found for pink slimes using blood. The potion produced from this reaction can be used to change the gender of living things. Decently useful for animal husbandry, but otherwise mostly just for pranks/"""roleplay"""/enforcing a brutal regime composed entirely of female slime people.

27 August 2016

pubby updated:

  • Mining scanner module to standard borgs
  • Sheet snatcher module from standard borgs

WJohnston updated:

  • Lavaland lava probably sorta looks better I guess.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Added config option to use byond account creation age for job limits.

CoreOverload updated:

  • You can now use sheets from any hand, not just the active one.

26 August 2016

xxalpha updated:

  • Cigarette packs, donut boxes, egg boxes can now be closed and opened with Ctrl+Click.
  • Lighters are now represented in cigarette packs with a sprite of their own.
  • You can now remove a lighter from a cigarette pack quickly with Alt+Click.
  • Reduced the amount of cigars that cigar cases can hold to 5 because the cigar case sprite doesn't support more than that.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • It now hurts to get thrown into another person.

Joan updated:

  • Bumping the AI on help intent will no longer cause it and you to swap positions, even if it is unanchored. If unanchored, it will properly push the AI around.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The security temperature gun now has a firing pin making it 0.0000001% more useful!

25 August 2016

kilkun updated:

  • Adds a shielded deathsquad hardsuit. it has four charges and recharges after 15 seconds of not being shot (compared to the syndicate 3 charges and 20 second recharge rate)
  • All death commandos now spawn with this new hardsuit. The previous hardsuit was not removed.

Yackemflam updated:

  • Sniper kit have been given as a syndicate bundle set. Be warned though, they are not as equipped as the nuclear agent kits.

24 August 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The radiation storm random event will automatically enable and disable emergency maint.
  • The radiation storm random event is now a weather type that affects the station.

MrStonedOne updated:
