  • The game window will now flash in the taskbar on incoming admin pm, and to all admins when an admin help comes in.

Joan updated:

  • Adds a KA mod that does damage in an AoE, found only in necropolis chests.
  • You can now install any KA mods into a mining cyborg, though its mod capacity is slightly lower.
  • Mining cyborgs now have a crowbar to remove mods from their KA.
  • Kinetic Accelerators now have a larger mod capacity, though most mods can still only be installed the same amount of times as they can currently.
  • You can now hit modkits with Kinetic Accelerators to install that modkit into the accelerator. Mining cyborgs are unable to do so.
  • Added white and adjustably-coloured tracer round mods to the mining equipment vendor, so you can see where your projectile is going(and look cool).
  • Added the super and hyper chassis mods to the mining equipment vendor, so you can use excess mod space to have a cool-looking KA.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • A slight change to the secret satchel system described below: If a satchel cannot be spawned due to there not being enough hidden satchels to choose from, a free empty satchel will spawn hidden SOMEWHERE on the station. Dig it up and bury it with something interesting!

Joan updated:

  • Using a resonator on an existing resonator field will immediately detonate that field. Normal resonators will reduce the damage dealt to 80% of normal, while upgraded resonators will not reduce it at all.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • A new event has been added. The automated grid check. All apcs in non critical areas will be shut off for some time, but can be manually rebooted via interaction.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Xeno queens now have an action button that makes them appear to themselves as the old, small queen sprite. Now they should be able to interact with things that are above them more easily.

23 August 2016

Papa Bones updated:

  • The detective's closet now contains a seclite, get sleuthing!

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Removes check on lights preventing you from turning them on while in a locker

Yackemflam updated:

  • Boxes are worth >26 tc at LEAST

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Reviver and nutriment implants are far easier to get and have lower tech origins.

Gun Hog updated:

  • The Aux mining base can now call the mining shuttle once landed! The mining shuttle beacon that comes with the base must be deployed to enable this functionality.
  • Multiple landing zones may now be set for the mining base.
  • The coordinates of each landing zone is shown in the list.
  • Miners now each get a remote in their starting lockers.
  • tweak The Aux mining base now requires lighting while on station.
  • The Aux Mining Base now has a GPS signal.
  • The Aux Mining Base now has an alarm for when it is about to drop.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Centcom has cut back on their cat carrier budget and will now only be able to bring kittens along with runtime.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Adds "Sacred Flame", a spell that makes everyone around you more flammable, and lights yourself on fire. Share the wealth. Of fire.
  • Replaces the fireball spellbook as a possible reward from a Drake chest with a book of sacred flame.

22 August 2016

XDTM updated:

  • Cloning can now give bad mutations if unupgraded!
  • Cloning can, however, give you good ones if upgraded!

Lzimann & Lexorion updated:

  • Adds a bow to the game, currently not craftable

ExcessiveUseOfCobblestone updated:

  • Reverts getting partial credit for discovered seeds.
  • Tweaks Money Tree Potency Values [For instance: 1000 Space Cash requires 98-100 Potency]

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • The efficiency AI sat SMES will now charge the APCs instead of itself.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Bubblegum's charge indicator should be significantly more accurate now.

21 August 2016

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Stock computers have been temporarily removed due to imbalances.

XDTM updated:

  • Removed the Longevity symptom.
  • Added Viral Aggressive Metabolism, which will make viruses act quickly but decay over time.

20 August 2016

Jalleo updated:

  • Gulag Teleporter of two issues any more please report them.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Smuggler satchels left behind hidden on the station can now reappear in a later round.
  • There's absolutely no way of knowing when exactly it will reappear however...
  • Only one item in the satchel will remain when the satchel reappears.
  • Items are saved in their initial forms, so saving things like chemical grenades will only disappoint you.
  • The item pool is map specific and needs to be a certain size before satchels can start reappearing, so get to hiding that loot!

19 August 2016

Kor updated:

  • Kinetic Accelerators are now modular. You can find mod kits in the mining vendor and in RnD.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Service and cargo have lost roundstart tablets and engineering has gained them
  • you can now charge battery modules in cell chargers. Use a screwdriver on a computer to remove them. As a note, tablets and laptops can be charged directly by placing them in a security charger.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Consolidates the fulton packs into a single item and makes them more user friendly

Jordie0608 updated:

  • Advanced Energy Guns once again have a chance to irradiate you if EMPed.

18 August 2016

Kor updated:

  • Chaplain's dormant spellblade is no longer invisible.

Wjohnston, Gun Hog updated:

  • Aliens with Neurotoxic Spit readied will now have drooling animations.
  • Hunters may now safely leap over lava.
  • Hulk punches no longer stun Xenos.
  • Alien evolve and promotion buttons updated to current Xeno sprites
  • Handcuff sprites for Xenos now show properly.

WJohnston updated:

  • Metastation and Boxstation now boast auxillary mining construction rooms in arrivals. These allow you to build a base and then launch it to wherever you want on lavaland.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • The staff of change has been expanded to turn you into even more things that don't have hands.

17 August 2016

Google Play Store updated:

  • Minor Text Fixes.

Papa Bones updated:

  • A new, scandalous outfit is now available as contraband from the clothesmate vendor, check it out! Fulfill your deep, dark fantasies.

Basilman updated:

  • Added an admin-spawnable only "Cosmohonk" hardsuit that has the same protection values of an engineering hardsuit. Comes with built-in lights and requires clown roundstart role to be equipped.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Adds the "Proto-Kinetic Crusher", a new melee mining weapon. Available at a mining vendor near you!

Joan updated:

  • Once the blob alert message is sent in the blob game mode, all mobs get to see how many tiles the blob has until it wins, via the Status tab.
  • Removed/merged a bunch of blob chems, you probably don't care about the specifics.
  • The remaining blob chems should, overall, be more powerful.
  • Shield blobs soak brute damage less well.
  • Flashbangs do higher damage to blobs up close, but their damage falls off faster.
  • Shield blobs now cost 15 resources to make instead of 10. Node blobs now cost 50 resources to make instead of 60.
  • Expanding/attacking now costs 4 resources instead of 5, and blobs can now ATTACK DIAGONALLY. Diagonal attacks are weaker than normal attacks, especially against cyborgs(which may be entirely immune, depending), and they remain unable to expand diagonally.
  • Shield blobs no longer block atmos while under half health. Shield blobs are still immune to fire, even if they can't block atmos.
  • Blobs should block explosions less well.
  • Blob cores and nodes are no longer immune to fire and no longer block atmos.
  • Blobs can only auto-expand one tile at a time per expanding thing, and should be easier to beat back in general.
  • Blobbernauts now attack faster.
  • Blob Overminds attack mobs slower but can attack non-mobs much faster.
  • Blob Overminds start with some amount of resources; in the gamemode, it's 80 divided by the number of overminds, in the event, it's 20 plus the number of active players, and otherwise, it's 60.
  • You can no longer move blob cores into space, onto the mining shuttle, white ship, gulag shuttle, or solars.
  • Blob rounds might be less laggy, if they were laggy?
  • Blobs don't heal as fast, excluding the core.
  • Blobs are marginally less destructive to their environment.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Adds modular computers

16 August 2016

Gun Hog updated:

  • Nanotrasen has improved the coolant system in the stations automated robots. They will no longer violently explode in hot rooms.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • The server will no longer wait until the next tick to process movement key presses. Movements should now be ~25-50ms more responsive.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Automated the granting of profiler access to admins

15 August 2016

oranges updated:

  • Nanotrasen is an all right kind of company

Joan updated:

  • The Ark of the Clockwork Justicar can now be constructed even if Ratvar's rise is not the objective.
  • Accordingly, its behavior is different; instead of summoning Ratvar, it will convert a massive amount of the station, and should effectively instantly complete the clockwork cult's objectives.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Tweaked the lag stop numbers to hopefully reduce lag during 80+ population

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Fixed the blackbox not blackboxing.

ma44 updated:

  • add: Makes it so you can export any plant's seeds (expect the starting plants as they have no rarity) and always give supply points based on rarity and potency, equation for price is rarity \* potency / 10

14 August 2016

OSCAR MIKE updated:

  • CONTACT ON THE LEFT SIDE!

Kor updated:

  • Players created by sentience potions, mining drone upgrades, or Guardian/Holoparsite summoners will now automatically join the users antagonist team, if any.
  • Mobs created in this manner will no longer be convertable/deconvertable unless their creator is first converted/deconverted.
  • Cayenne will now officially become an operative when given a sentience potion.

LanCartwright updated:

  • Fixes the recipes not working.
  • Changes Stable uranium virus food recipe from Plasma virus food to just plasma.

Kor updated:

  • Humans and drones now have a UI button that allows them to create new areas, in the same manner as blueprints. Unlike blueprints, this button does not allow you to edit existing areas.
  • You can now use mineral doors (or any other object that blocks atmos) to complete rooms with blueprints

Cheridan updated:

  • Greatly reduced amount of Hydroponics yield multipliers
  • Somewhat reduced gaia'd tray sustainability.
  • Mutagen will no longer potentially cause plant instadeath based on RNG.

Joan updated:

  • Ratvarian Spears will now stun any mob they're thrown at instead of just enemy cultists and silicons, though the stun is still longer on enemy cultists and silicons.

13 August 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • You can no longer use the incorrect limb type during augmentation
  • You can no longer use the incorrect limb type during prosthetic replacement

optional name here updated:

  • The syndicate uplink ui has been refactored to majorly reduce lag

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Security has two new weapons in their arsenal. The security temperature gun, and the DRAGnet capture and recovery system.

Joan updated:

  • Belligerent now does minor damage to the legs on each invocation, up to a maximum of 30 damage per recital.

Joan updated:

  • Function Call can be used to summon a Ratvarian Spear once every 3 minutes, from 5, but the spear summoned will now only last 3 minutes.

12 August 2016

Gun Hog updated:

  • The AI's Crew Manifest button now uses the updated styling.

Jordie0608 updated:

  • Removed clicking clown mask to morph it's shape, use action button instead.

11 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Sigils of Transgression now glow brightly when stunning a target.
  • The Global Records alert now shows the location and countdown time of the Gateway to the Celestial Derelict.
  • Clockcult tooltips now all have the clockcult tooltip style.
  • You can no longer become a Reclaimer when clicking on Ratvar. You can still become a Cogscarab, however.
  • You can no longer invoke Vanguard while under its effects.
  • Servants of Ratvar should now always get an announcement when scripture states change.

Kor updated:

  • Added support for projectiles which can dismember
  • Added a new wizard sword, the spellblade, which fires dismembering projectiles. Sprites from Lexorion.
  • Plasmacutter blasts can now take limbs off, but they still do pitiful damage in a pressurized environment.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Watchers no longer randomly fire beams at you when damaged, and no longer beam you at point blank.

10 August 2016

Kor updated:

  • You can now detonate drones with the RD console

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Tweaked space wind, it should now only trigger at higher pressure differences, but be quicker to become aggressive as the pressure difference gets higher. This should alleviate issues where small differences was still moving a lot of things.
  • Paper still moves with any pressure difference.

RemieRichards updated:

  • Added a new PDA button/app: Drone Phone!

LanCartwright updated:

  • Acute respiratory distress syndrom symptom.
  • Toxic metabolism.
  • Alkali perspiration
  • Autophagocytosis Necrosis
  • Apoptoxin filter
  • 3 different lategame/Non-roundstart virus reagents
  • 4 different lategame/Non-roundstart virus recipes

09 August 2016

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • There's now an achievement for managing to examine a meteor as a living mob!

Cruix updated:

  • The cooldown on wizard lightning will no longer break if you ethereal jaunt or RISE! after the initial cast.

Cruix updated:

  • Sentient minebots can now toggle meson vision, a flashlight, their mode, and dump their stored ore.
  • Sentient minebots can now be repaired if they were made sentient while the AI was active.
  • Healing minebots will no longer switch them to attack mode.
  • Sentient minebots can now shoot at humans.

08 August 2016

WJohnston, Gun Hog updated:

  • Xenos are now considered female.
  • Hunter pounce are now always blocked by shields, and may be blocked more often by other protective items.
  • Alien Queen is now somewhat faster.
  • Adjusted larva growth sprites.
  • Removed 20% facehugger failure chance for masks.
  • Disarm now always forces a person to drop an item in the active hand, and if a person's hand is empty/undroppable, Disarm will always result in a tackle.
  • Cyborgs disarmed by a Xeno will first disable their selected module, and if there is none selected, the cyborg will be pushed back and stunned.
  • Tail Sweep now has a slightly longer stun.

Ergovisavi updated:

  • Added bonfires to botany. Requires five tower cap logs to create, and mobs can be buckled to them if an iron rod is added to the bonfire and the mob is restrained.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Ghosts can now see human player's huds when using the OOC -> Observe verb

07 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Added the clockcult "Global Records" alert, which clock cultists can mouse over to check a variety of information on the clockcult's status, including living servants, number of caches, CV, tinkerer's daemons, if there's an unconverted AI, what clockwork generals can be invoked, and what scripture is unlocked.

lordpidey updated:

  • Centcom has received reports of cyborgs electrocuting themselves when working on the power grid, and we have decided to stop storing important electronics on the wirecutter's blade.

frtbngll updated:

  • Fixed Paper Wizard summoning only 9 minions in its lifespan by making the dead stickman decrease it's summoned_minions variable

06 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Trying to use sleeping carp against the colossus will now anger it.

05 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Barrier runes will now block air while active.

Arctophylax updated:

  • You can unbuckle mobs from meat spikes by clicking on the spike once again.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • You will now receive an achievement for winning a pulse rifle at the arcade.

Lzimann updated:

  • Holy water no longers makes you confused.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • Parrots have been made more robust.

04 August 2016

Lordpidey and PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Recent studies have revealed that fly amanita can give you a huge trip.

Robustin updated:

  • The initial supply talisman can now be used to create runed metal, 5 per use
  • The void torch is now available from the altar, use it to transport any item instantly to any cultist! It appears alongside the veil shifter as part of the "Veil Walker" set.
  • Cult floors no longer appear on mesons!
  • Flagellant's Robes now increases damage taken by 50%, down from 100%
  • Veil Shifter has 4 uses, up from 2
  • Shuttle curse now delays shuttle 3 minutes, up from 2.5 minutes
  • Cult forges, archives, and airlocks have had their cost reduced by 1 runed metal each

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Chef, do your station a favor and make a home run baseball burger (TM)

Cruix updated:

  • RCDs can no longer place multiple grilles on the same tile.
  • RCDs will no longer use all their ammo if you try to build a wall on the same turf multiple times.
  • RCDs will now inform their user if they do not have enough ammo to complete an operation.

Joan updated:

  • Plasma cutters(normal, advanced, and mech) now have double range in low pressure areas, but slightly lower range in high pressure areas.

Arctophylax updated:

  • The Emergency Medical and Winter Wonderland Holodeck programs work once again.

03 August 2016

Joan updated:

  • Vitality Matrices will consume dead non-servant mobs to gain a large amount of Vitality. This doesn't work on mobs that did not have a mind at some point.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Constructs, including anima fragments, marauders, and reclaimers, can now communicate over the Hierophant Network.

01 August 2016

CoreOverload updated:

  • Pockets in coats!

Joan updated:

  • Xenobiology golems enslaved to someone will become convertable if their enslaver is converted to the enslaving antag type; this applies to gang and both cult types.

Joan updated:

  • Soul Vessels can now communicate over the Hierophant Network

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Adds in generic uplink refund system that potentially allows for even regular traitors to refund uplink items

Joan updated:

  • Soul Vessels can now be used on unconscious or dead humans to extract their consciousness, much like a soulstone.
  • Soul Vessels no longer automatically ping ghosts when created, though they can still be used in-hand to ping ghosts.

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Added crowns. Make them from gold. Cap gets a fancy one.

31 July 2016

Robustin updated:

  • Amber ERT Commanders no longer have thermal goggles

Arctophylax updated:

  • Birdboat's atmospheric tanks now function normally again.
  • Birdboat's TEG is now orientated to match the pipe layout.

Joan updated:

  • Toolboxes are slightly more robust.

Joan updated:

  • Vanguard now only stuns for 25% of absorbed stuns, from 50%.

Joan updated:

  • Megafauna will now seek and consume corpses of enemies to heal or otherwise.

lordpidey updated:

  • Added Devil agent gamemode, where multiple devils are each trying to buy more souls than the next in line.
  • If you've already sold your soul, you can sell it again to a different devil. You can even go back and forth for INFINITE POWER.

30 July 2016

Kor updated:

  • Hostile mobs will now attack turrets.

Gun Hog updated:

  • In an effort to reduce the demoralizing effects that accompany the death of a crew member, Nanotrasen has provided the prototype designs for the Sad Trombone implant. It can be fabricated at your station's protolathe, if you manage to secure the ever elusive Bananium ore.

Bawhoppen updated:

  • toolboxes fit in backpacks

28 July 2016

astralenigma updated:

  • Admins can now turn people into red god.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Space wind (movement from pressure differentials (like a hole to space)) has been improved.
  • Space wind's rate of movement now scales with pressure differential amount.
  • Actively moving (as in holding down a move key) reduces chance/rate of getting moved by space wind.
  • Having a wall or dense anchored object to your left or right will lower the chance/rate of getting moved by space wind for each direction (IE: a wall on both sides of you will be a double reduction)

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Added Lazy airlock cycling. Bump opening an airlock with this system will close its partner. This system has been added to most airlocks that go to space on boxstation, as well as airlocks to secure areas like brig, bridge, engine.
  • This can be overridden by click opening, having a shuttle docked, or setting emergency mode on one of the doors.

27 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • Ghosts can now click Spatial Gateways to teleport to the other gateway.
  • Spatial Gateways are now properly disrupted by devastating explosions(but not heavy or light explosions)

26 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • Striking a Sigil with any damaging item as a non-servant will remove it. Servants still need to be on harm intent with an empty hand to remove Sigils.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Sigils will now be destroyed by any level of explosion, except for Sigils of Transmission, which will gain a small amount of power if hit by a light explosion instead of breaking.
  • Clockwork Structures will now properly take damage from explosions instead of variably not taking damage or instantly being destroyed.

Thunder12345 updated:

  • An old rapier was found rusting in the back of a closet. We cleaned it up, polished it, and assigned it to your captain as a ceremonial weapon only. Warranty void if used in combat.

Kor updated:

  • The Staff of Storms, dropped by Legion, can now be used on station.

Joan updated:

  • Halves the Interdiction Lens' disrupt cost from 100 per disrupted object to 50 per disrupted object.

Joan updated:

  • Wraith Spectacles are now less hard on the eyes, and can be used without permanent vision impairment for about 50% longer; from 40~ seconds to about 1 minute.

25 July 2016

incoming5643 updated:

  • viscerator grenades are now more generous with viscerators spawned

Incoming5643 updated:

  • The previously underwhelming viscerator robot has been made a lot more terrifying by the new ability to proactively target and dismember limbs.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Laughter no longer makes you laugh if you're muted.
  • Laughter can now be brewed with banana juice and sugar.

Joan updated:

  • Anima Fragments slow down for slightly less time when hit.
  • Clockwork Marauders do 1 more damage on every attack.

Joan updated:

  • If the invoker of Nzcrentr is knocked unconscious or killed, they will gib instead of producing a lighting blast.

Cruix updated:

  • Fixed a bug where some objects in photos would not be displayed if they were facing a certain direction.
  • Photograph descriptions will no longer claim that mobs with low max health are hurt when they are not.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Adds jump boots, a mid/end-tier mining equipment that allows the user to dash over 4-wide chasms.

23 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • The Tinkerer's Cache cost increase for having multiple Tinkerer's Caches now happens every 5 caches, from every 3.

22 July 2016

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Players will now receive an achievement for killing their first megafauna after this point.
  • Additionally, megafauna kills are now tracked on a hub page. Rack up those kills for first place!

Joan updated:

  • Revenant scriptures now announce to all servants and ghosts when used instead of having a visible message.

21 July 2016

MMMiracles updated:

  • A giant wad of paper has been seen hurling through the nearby sector of SS13, officials deny existence of giant paper ball hurling through space because 'thats really fucking stupid'.

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Titanium now spawns in mining again.
  • It has uses in R&D and robotics production.
  • All shuttle walls are now using a new proper smoothing path. Mappers please make sure to use this path correctly in the future. (along with tiles)

Cruix updated:

  • Camera bugs can now show camera views.
  • The chameleon masks in the chameleon kit can once again have their voice changers toggled.

Shadowlight213 updated:

  • Angels can now equip satchels

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • Added Canned Laughter for the clown. Hehehe

20 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • If you lack the components to recite a scripture, you will be informed of how many components that scripture requires.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Caches now cost an additional one of each non-alloy component to construct for every three existing Tinkerer's Caches, up to a maximum of 5 of each non-alloy component.

Xhuis updated:

  • Clockwork cultists may now have the "Escape" and "Silicon" objectives, requiring a certain amount of servants to escape on the shuttle and all silicons to be converted respectively.
  • Ocular wardens are now forced to target bibles rather than the people holding them.

RemieRichards updated:

  • Auto-generated ratvarian now follows all the rules of hand-written ratvarian, but you probably won't notice.

Incoming5643 updated:

  • You now have the ability to automatically "back out" of a round if you miss your chance at all the jobs you have set to low or higher. This is found on the toggle at the bottom of the jobs window
  • Due to a quirk of game mode code this option will fail to work if you've been selected as an antag (what a tragedy!) In this situation, you'll be assigned a random job.

Joan updated:

  • Ocular Wardens do 17% less damage.
  • Mania Motors cause less brain damage and hallucinations.

Joan updated:

  • Sigils of Transgression now stun for about 7 seconds.
  • Sigils of Submission/Accession now take 7 seconds to convert successfully, and have an obvious message to the person on them that their mind is being invaded.

Joan updated:

  • Guvax is now slightly slower when above 5 valid servants; 1 additional second of invoke time for each one above 5, from 0.75 additional seconds, up to a maximum of 20 seconds of invoke time, from 15 seconds.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Caches now link to a nearby unlinked clockwork wall, and will not generate components unless linked. As compensation, they will link to nearby walls(and can generate components) in a larger area.

Lzimann updated:

  • Blood packs are now back in surgery room.

Joan updated:

  • You can now throw items and mobs over chasms without causing them to drop.
  • You can now throw items over lava without burning them. Mobs will still burn, however.

19 July 2016

Cheridan updated:

  • Added another space ruin.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Fixes super darkness from lighting creating two darkness overlays on the same turf but only changing the darkness of one of the overlays

18 July 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • Added VR Sleepers that allow users to enter a virtual body in a virtual world (Currently not mapped in ;_;)

Xhuis updated:

  • The shuttle can now leave while a celestial gateway exists.
  • If the shuttle docks at Central Command while a celestial gateway exists, Ratvar's servants will win a minor victory. His arrival will still award a major victory.
  • The celestial gateway can now take damage from explosions.

Joan updated:

  • Cogscarabs can no longer pass mobs and have slightly less health.
  • The Gateway to the Celestial Derelict can now take damage from bombs.

Xhuis updated:

  • Added communication intercept texts for gamemodes that were missing them.
  • Changed all intercept texts and improved grammar for a lot of key game code.

IgnisCorvus updated:

  • Fixed bug with defib. The stick wont stick in your hand when someone remove your back while you are holding the paddles.

Joan updated:

  • The Clockwork Slab now has action buttons for rapidly invoking Guvax and Vanguard.

Joan updated:

  • Belligerent is now chanted more often.
  • Taunting Tirade now weakens nearby nonservants, but is now only invoked once every 6 seconds(1 second chant, 5 second flee time) and is only chanted five times.

17 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • Invoking Sevtug is less potent at long ranges, and slightly more potent if extremely close.
  • Invoking Sevtug now requires 3 invokers instead of 1.

CoreOverload updated:

  • Sterilizine now reduces probability of step failure if you apply it after starting surgery. Useful while operating in less-than-perfect conditions.
  • Potent alcohol can be used as replacement for sterilizine.

16 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • The Vanguard scripture no longer prevents you from using slabs while active, but you cannot reactivate it if it is currently active.
  • It now only lasts 20 seconds, instead of 30.
  • When Vanguard deactivates, it now stuns for half the time of all stuns absorbed, instead of all of them.

lordpidey updated:

  • Flyswatters are now included in beekeeping crates, they are great at killing insects and flies of all sizes.

Joan updated:

  • Cogscarabs(and other nonhuman mobs able to hold clockwork slabs) can now check the stats of the clockwork cult by using a clockwork slab. They remain unable to use slabs under normal conditions.

Gun Hog and WJohnston updated:

  • Aliens (Xenos) now have the ability to sense the direction and rough distance of their queen!

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Added a system to detect when stickybans go rogue and revert all recent matches.

14 July 2016

Cheridan updated:

  • Added an aesthetic new space ruin

Bawhoppen updated:

  • Added two new materials, Titanium and plastitanium. Titanium is naturally occuring, and plastitanium is an alloy made of plasma and titanium.
  • These materials can be used to build shuttle walls and floors, though this serves no current purpose.

Kor updated:

  • Shuttle travel time has been shortened from 25 seconds to 6 seconds

Firecage updated:

  • Mechas can no longer pass through Plastic Flaps

lordpidey updated:

  • Infernal jaunt now has a cooldown, to prevent trying to jaunt while already jaunting. This should have no practical changes.
  • Infernal jaunt no longer occasionally leaves you permanently on fire.
  • Pitchforks no longer burn devils and soul-sellers, as intended.

Lzimann updated:

  • Alt clicking a jumpsuit now removes the accessories(if there's any)!

CoreOverload updated:

  • Some clothing has pockets now.

13 July 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • tweak: Medals are no longer instant to attach to someone's jumpsuit.

Papa Bones updated:

  • Security's lethal injections are actually lethal now.

Xhuis updated:

  • Nanotrasen electricians have introduced a software update to all licensed pinpointers. The new pinpointers are more responsive and automatically switch modes based on the current crisis.
  • It should be noted that some of these pinpointers have been reported as missing from their distribution warehouse and are presumed to have been stolen. This is likely nothing to worry about.

Basilman updated:

  • Added a new hairstyle "Boddicker"

12 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • Added dextrous guardians to the code, able to hold and use items and store a single item within themselves.
  • Dextrous guardians do low damage on punches, have medium damage resist, and recalling or leashing will force them to drop any items in their hands.

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Fixes borg stun arm not having a hitsound, bypassing shields, and not doing an attack animation
  • Fixes simple mobs not properly having armor penetration

hornygranny updated:

  • Attacks will no longer miss missing limbs

11 July 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • fixed Kor's plant disguises
  • fixed some issues with Alternate Appearances not being added/removed

MMMiracles updated:

  • Hotel staff can now actually use their own lockers.

coiax updated:

  • The AI doomsday device timer is more accurate.
  • Fixes a bug where the doomsday device would take twice as long as
  • it should.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Walls and Floors will appear as normal walls and plating to mesons, respectively.

10 July 2016

optional name here updated:

  • The search function on security records consoles now works.

Joan updated:

  • The Function Call action that summons a Ratvarian Spear is no longer one-use; instead, it can be reused once every five minutes.

coiax updated:

  • Syndicate bombs now use a more accurate timer.
  • Fixed a separate bug that caused bomb timers to take twice as long (ie. 60 seconds took 120 seconds)

09 July 2016

coiax updated:

  • Fleshmend no longer regrows lost limbs.
  • Added free Regenerate power to changelings, which regrows all
  • external limbs and internal organs
  • (including the tongue if you lost your head). It costs 10 chemicals to
  • use.
  • Fleshmend now costs 20 chemicals, down from 25.
  • Changeling revive power name changed from Regenerate to Revive.

coiax updated:

  • Nuclear bombs now use a more accurate timer system, the same as gang dominators and shuttles.
  • Nuclear bombs now have a TGUI interface.

coiax updated:

  • When a player uses a communication console to ask for the codes to
  • the self destruct, for better or for worse, the admins can set them with
  • a single click. Whether the admins a) click the button b) actually give
  • the random person the codes, is another thing entirely.

Joan updated:

  • Application scripture now requires 100 CV, from 75, Revenant scripture now requires 200 CV, from 150, and Judgment scripture now requires 300 CV, from 250.
  • However, converted windows, windoors, airlocks, and grilles will all provide some CV.

Joan updated:

  • You can now transfer components between two clockwork slabs by attacking one slab, or a person holding a slab, with the other; this will transfer the attacking slab's components into the target slab.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Slabs now produce a component every 1 minute, 30 seconds, from every 1 minute.
  • The slab production time gain from each servant above 5 has been increased from 20 seconds to 30 seconds, and the maximum production time has been increased from 5 minutes to 6 minutes.

coiax updated:

  • Servants of Ratvar get an alert if they have no tinkerer's caches constructed. Because it's important that they should.

MrStonedOne, coiax updated:

  • View Variables can expand on associated lists with type keys. Only 90s admins will truely understand.

Crazylemon updated:

  • The map loader no longer resets when reading another map mid-load

Joan updated:

  • Clock Cult silicons get an action button to communicate with other servants.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Atmos on planets is now more realistic. There is an unseen upper atmosphere that gas changes get carried away into, causing planet turfs to revert back to their original gas mixture.
  • This should massively improve atmos run speed as all of lavaland won't be processing the moment somebody opens a door anymore

CoreOverload updated:

  • You can remove jetpack from a hardsuit by using screwdriver on it.

coiax updated:

  • During a meteor shower, observers can automatically orbit
  • threatening meteors via an action button and watch them hit the station.
  • Added Major Space Dust event, which is a meteor shower
  • containing only space dust.
  • Fixes bug where meteors wouldn't move when spawned.
  • Meteor Shower split into three different events, Normal, Threatening and Catastrophic. They all have the same crew messages, but admins can tell the difference.

08 July 2016

RemieRichards updated:

  • Added a Compact mode to the crafting tgui
  • Modified the back end of the crafting tgui so that it has well let's just say "a lot less" calls to certain functions, should lag a little less but don't expect miracles (you'd have to wait till we get a new version of ractive for those!)

coiax updated:

  • AIs get a notification when hacking an APC, which can be clicked to jump your camera to the APC's location. AIs also get notification sounds when a hack has completed or failed.

coiax updated:

  • Podpeople (and venus human traps) are now no longer damaged,
  • poisoned or obstructed by space vines. Explosive vines still damage
  • them, because there's an actual explosion.

07 July 2016

Gun Hog updated:

  • Nanotrasen is proud to announce that conveyor belts can now be fabricated at your station's autolathes!

Joan updated:

  • Ratvarian Spears are now sharp and can be used to cut off limbs or butcher mobs.

Gun Hog updated:

  • Malf (Traitor) AI's Fireproof Core ability has been removed, as it was entirely obsolete.

Joan updated:

  • The global component cache can only be accessed by clockwork slabs if there is at least one Tinkerer's Cache active.

Joan updated:

  • Tips for Clock Cult may now show up.

Lzimann & Keekenox updated:

  • You can now craft a baseball bat with 5 sheets of wood!

coiax updated:

  • Damage to a shuttle while it is moving will now correctly make
  • transit space turfs, rather than non-moving space.

06 July 2016

coiax updated:

  • The tesla now dusts all carbon mobs on the turf that it moves to,
  • grounding rod or no.

RemieRichards updated:

  • Fixes accidental buff to botany, all modifiers should now be at the point they were at pre-bees (this does not remove, nerf or alter bees)

Joan updated:

  • Judicial Explosions from a Judicial Visor now mute for about 10 seconds.

coiax updated:

  • You can now reload your gun in CTF.
  • Dying in CTF will spawn a short lived ammo pickup, which you can walk over to reload all your weapons.
  • If reduced to critical status in CTF, you will automatically die, so you no longer have to succumb or be coup de graced. If you are conscious, you will now heal slowly if some damage got through your shield and didn't crit you.

Joan updated:

  • Servants should now be more aware of when scripture tiers are locked or unlocked.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Instant Runoff Voting polls are now available.

Xhuis updated:

  • The Necropolis gate now looks as regal as it should. Credit goes to KorPhaeron for turf and wall sprites.

05 July 2016

coiax, Niknakflak updated:

  • Added fireplaces, fuel with logs or paper and set on fire and enjoy that warm comforting
  • glow.
  • Cardboard cutouts are now flammable.
  • Cigarettes, fireplaces and candles now share a pool of possible igniters. So you can now esword that candle on, but turn it on first.
  • Eswords will ignite plasma in the air if turned on.

Cruix updated:

  • Vending machine restocking units now work.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Kudzu is no longer unstoppable

coiax updated:

  • Gulag prisoners can no longer duplicate their mining efforts
  • through window breaking on the shuttle.
  • Fixes pickaxes inside walls on lavaland, along with lava having eaten
  • one of the storage units.
  • More fire extinguishers for lavaland mining base.

optional name here updated:

  • Suit Storage Units can now disinfect items other than living and dead creatures.

Xhuis updated:

  • Ash storms are actually damaging now.

04 July 2016

Xhuis updated:

  • Ash storms can now occur again.

Gun Hog updated:

  • The Space Wizard Federation has finally begun teaching its pupils how to properly aim the Fireball spell!
  • Fireball spells, including the Devil version, are now aimed via mouse click. It is recommended to avoid firing at anything too close, as the user can still blow himself up!

Joan updated:

  • Mecha are no longer immune to ocular wardens.

coiax updated:

  • Immovable rods now notify ghosts when created, allowing them to
  • orbit it and follow their path of destruction through the station.
  • Fixed bugs where no meteors would come or go from the south.
  • Seriously, that was a real bug. Meteor showers are now about 33%
  • stronger as a result.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Adds space ruins. Balance not included.
  • Simple mob ghosts actually work now.
  • Puzzle1 ruin removed due to issues with projectiles.

X-TheDark updated:

  • Switching mobs/ghosting/etc related actions during the round will now no longer reset your hotkey settings.

bgobandit updated:

  • Bluespace polycrystals, basically stacks of bluespace crystals, have been added. The ore redemptor accepts them now.
  • The ore redemptor machine should be less spammy now.

03 July 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • Throwing active stunbatons now has a chance to stun whoever it hits!

coiax updated:

  • The zone of hyperspace that a shuttle travels in is dynamically determined when a shuttle begins charging its engines. This is signified by the shuttle mode IGN. All shuttles must now charge engines before launching. This time is already included in the emergency shuttle timer.
  • The cargo shuttle can only be loaned to Centcom while at Centcom.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Daemons that would be useless cannot be made.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Slabs generate components 20 seconds slower for each scripture-valid servant above 5, up to a maximum of 1 component every 5 minutes.

Joan updated:

  • Guvax now invokes 1 second faster(5 seconds), but is 0.75 seconds slower for each scripture-valid servant above 5, up to a maximum of 15 seconds.

Joan updated:

  • Clock Cult can now happen at 24 players, same as cult.
  • Clock Cult player scaling is lower; 3 people, plus one for every 15 players above 30, from 1 for every 10 players with a player minimum of 30.

Cruix updated:

  • Hand labelers can now label storage containers.
  • You can now properly resist out of wrapped lockers.
  • You can now resist out of morgues if you are in a bodybag.
  • Mechs can no longer spam doors they do not have access to.

02 July 2016

incoming5643 updated:

  • Nuke ops can now harness the power of METAL BOXES: special versions of cardboard boxes that can take a lot of abuse and can fit the whole team if need be. They're not nearly as light as their cardboard brothers though...

kevinz000 updated:

  • Some new emojis have been added to OOC for your enjoyment. Try them out.
  • New emojis are : coffee, trophy, tea, gear, supermatter, forceweapon, gift, kudzu, dosh, chrono, nya, and tophat. Type :nameofemoji: in OOC to use.

Joan updated:

  • Umbras have been removed.
  • Revenants have been readded, though they are now vulnerable to salt piles.

Joan updated:

  • Mending motors start with 2500W of power in alloy, from 5000. Sigils of Transmission start with 2500W of power, from 4000. Clockwork Proselytizers start with 90 alloy, from 100.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Proselytizers can now reform stored alloy into usable component alloy when used in-hand.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Added the power fist, a gauntlet with a piston-powered ram attached to the top for traitors to punch people across the station. Punch people into walls for added fun.

01 July 2016

Joan updated:

  • Script and Application scripture have had their component costs and requirements tweaked to reduce overuse of certain components.
  • Invoke times for a few scriptures that were instant are now very short instead.

NikNak updated:

  • Showcases are now movable and deconstructable. Wrench them to unanchor and then screwdriver and crowbar to deconstruct.

Papa Bones updated:

  • Security now has energy bolas available to them in their vending machines, check them out!

Flavo updated:

  • fixed a bug where lights would not update.

Joan updated:

  • Application scriptures require at least 75 CV, from 50.
  • Revenant scriptures require at least 4 Caches, from 3, and at least 150 CV, from 100.
  • Judgement scripture requires at least 12 servants, from 10, 5 Caches, from 3, and at least 250 CV, from 100.

name: Lzimann updated:

  • add: Security now has the labor camp teleporter! Send those pesky greytiders to work with no effort!

coiax updated:

  • The nuke disk reappears on the station in far more random locations, but tends to re-materialise in safe pressurised areas that aren't on fire.

name: Lzimann updated:

  • Mulebots with pAI cards no longer stun people

30 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Swarmers consuming swarmer shells now refunds the swarmer the entire cost of the shell instead of 2% of the shell's cost.

Joan updated:

  • Vitality Matrices will drain and heal 50% faster, and the base cost to revive is 20% lower; 20, from 25.
  • Vitality Matrices will not revive or heal corpses unless they can grab the ghost of the corpse, and will immediately grab the ghost when reviving.

Joan updated:

  • Ratvarian Spears will stun cyborgs and cultists for twice as long when thrown; on cyborgs, this should be long enough to use Guvax on them.

Joan updated:

  • Removed the Justicar's Gavel application scripture.

Joan updated:

  • Drones and Swarmers should now sound more robotic.

bobdobbington updated:

  • Added skub to the AutoDrobe as a premium item.

Joan updated:

  • Wet turfs should remain that way for slightly longer than 5 seconds now.

coiax updated:

  • The CTF arena regenerates every round, and the blue team now shoot blue lasers.

Kor updated:

  • Holoparasites are no longer in the uplink

coiax updated:

  • Adds some descriptions to alien surgery tools
  • The agent vest can be locked and unlocked (toggling the NODROP flag)
  • An abductor team can spend data points to purchase an agent vest (note
  • that only abductor agents are trained in their use)

29 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Judicial Visors now tell the user how many targets the Judicial Blast struck.
  • Judicial Markers now have sounds when appearing and exploding.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Slabs now use an action button to communicate instead of the "Report" option in the menu after using a slab.
  • Clockwork Slabs now fit in pockets, the belt slot, or in the suit storage slot(if wearing clockwork armor), where they can be used as hands-free communication.
  • Clockwork items with action buttons have a new, clockwork-y background.

MrStonedOne updated:

  • Ghosts may now jump between the two linked servers using the new Server Hop verb. Rather than whine in deadchat about dieing, you can just go play a new round on the other server.

coiax updated:

  • The AI malfunction "Hostile Lockdown" power now restores the station doors to normal after 90 seconds, rather than keeping everything shut forever.

coiax updated:

  • Adds a new UI to slimepeople, allowing them to select more easily which body to swap to
  • Slimepeople swapping consciousness between bodies is now visible to onlookers

28 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Ghosts spawning via Ratvar can now choose to spawn as a Cogscarab with a usable slab instead of as a Reclaimer.

Joan updated:

  • You can no longer permanently block hostile simple mobs with sandbags and other barricades.

Joan updated:

  • Faked deaths are now effectively indistinguishable from real deaths.

coiax updated:

  • Fixes issue where the AI core APC on Metastation would not charge.

oranges updated:

  • You can now hear dice

MMMiracles updated:

  • Adds some ruins for space and lavaland. Balance not included.
  • Adds spooky ghosts.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Marauders are no longer totally invincible to damage unless a holy weapon was involved.
  • Clockwork Marauders will take damage when attacked, but unless they're fighting excessive amounts, they'll be forced to return to their host before they'd normally die.
  • A holy weapon held in either hand in the presence of a marauder will massively increase the damage they take, making it much more likely the marauder can be killed.
  • Clockwork Marauders do slightly less damage at low fatigue levels.
  • Clockwork Marauders now have a chance to block melee attacks, negating the damage from them, and an additional chance to immediately counter, attacking whoever tried to attack them.
  • If Ratvar has awoken, Marauders have a much higher chance to block and counter, will block thrown items and projectiles, and gradually regenerate.
  • Clockwork Marauders no longer have a verb to communicate; they instead use :b to do so.

coiax updated:

  • All items inside the supply shuttle will now be sold, regardless of whether they're inside a container or not.

CoreOverload updated:

  • Kinetic accelerator now supports seclite attachment.
  • All cyborgs have been outfitted with ash-proof plating.
  • Mining cyborg module now includes a welder and a fire extinguisher.
  • Mining cyborgs now have a new upgrade: lavaproof tracks.

Time-Green updated:

  • adds a hud soul counter for devils. Sprites by PouFrou and special thanks to lordpidey for about everything.

Xhuis updated:

  • You can no longer put paper cups back onto water coolers. In addition, they're now just called "liquid coolers" instead of changing based on their contents.

optional name here updated:

  • Shadowlings have been completely removed.

27 June 2016

Wizard's Federation updated:

  • Acolytes of Hades have been scolded for gluing their clothes to themselves, and their clothes can now be cut off them.
  • Hades has learned a few new tricks, to ensure the ultimate demise of his target.
  • Hades has faced a council of his repeated use of time magic inside chapels, and as it was deemed unholy, he will no longer do it.
  • Wizards of the Wizard's Federation have been granted access to Dark Seeds, ancient relics used to call upon Hades in a time of need.

SnipeDragon updated:

  • Cardboard Cutouts now become opaque when their appearance is changed.

name: Lzimann updated:

  • Engineer and atmos wintercoat can hold the RPD now!

26 June 2016

coiax updated:

  • Large graffiti now consumes 5 uses from limited use crayons and
  • spraycans, as well as taking three times the amount of time to draw.

coiax updated:

  • Status displays added to a variety of shuttle templates.

25 June 2016

Basilman updated:

  • The Donor prompt for becoming an alien queen maid is now an action button instead, and can be toggled on and off.

Joan updated:

  • Fellowship Armory now invokes faster for each nearby servant and provides clockwork gauntlets, which are shock-resistant and provide armor to the arms.
  • It's not wise to equip clockwork armor if you don't serve Ratvar.
  • A full set of clockwork armor will now actually cover all limbs.

coiax updated:

  • Our administrators, here at /tg/, don't get enough credit for
  • their wealth of experience and knowledge. Now they get the chance to
  • share that with you by giving out custom tips!

coiax updated:

  • Please do not commit suicide with the nuclear authentication disk.

coiax updated:

  • The default shuttle transit time is now 15 seconds.

coiax updated:

  • Gang domination now uses the same timing method as shuttles, making
  • their domination times more accurate.

coiax updated:

  • Observers now have a visible countdown for borg factories,
  • silicons can examine the factory to determine how long it has remaining
  • until it is ready.

coiax updated:

  • Clockwork mobs sound like Ratvar chants if you do not serve Ratvar.
  • When servants recite, they now talk in a strange voice that is more noticable.

24 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Flashes will once again stun borgs, but for a much shorter time than they previously did; average stun time is reduced from the previous average of 15 seconds to about 6 seconds. The confusion remains, but it will no longer unequip borg modules.

SnipeDragon updated:

  • Changelings created at round start now correctly receive their Antag HUD.

Xhuis updated:

  • Cardboard cutouts have been added. Now you can set up advertisements for your clown mart.

MMMiracles updated:

  • Metastation xenobiology's lights and cell have been modified so it won't drain 5 minutes into the round.

Joan updated:

  • The Interdiction Lens has been reworked; instead of allowing you to disable Telecomms, Cameras, or non-Servant Cyborgs, it drains power from all APCs, SMES units, and non-Servant cyborgs in a relatively large area, funneling that power into nearby Sigils of Transmission, then disables all cameras and radios in that same area.
  • If it fails to find anything it could disable or drain any power, it turns off for 2 minutes.

Joan updated:

  • You can now target yourself with Sentinel's Compromise, allowing you to heal yourself with it.

23 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • You can no longer place ocular wardens very close to other ocular wardens.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork floors now only heal toxin damage on servants of Ratvar.

coiax updated:

  • If you are an observer, you can click on transition edges of a Z-level in order to move as a mob would.

coiax updated:

  • Due to safety concerns, the Hyperfractal Gigashuttle now has some safety grilles to prevent accidental matter energising.

22 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • The Flame produced by a Judicial Visor is no longer an effective melee weapon and will trigger on all intents, not just harm intent.

coiax updated:

  • Changelings now evolve powers via the cellular emporium, which they can access via an action button.

coiax, incoming updated:

  • Due to budget cuts, the builtin anti-orbit engines on the station have been removed. As such, expect the station to start orbiting the system again, and encounter an unpredictable stellar environment.
  • All permanent structures (not on station, Centcom or lavaland) have been removed.
  • All removed structures are now space ruins, and can be placed randomly in space ruin zlevels.
  • The White Ship remains at its current location, but has lost any reliable landmarks near it. Its starting position will be made more random in a coming update.
  • The Space Bar has a small atmos system added and a teleporter. Some other ruins have been cleaned up to not have atmos active turfs.

Joan updated:

  • Spatial Gateway will last four seconds per invoker, instead of two per invoker.

Joan updated:

  • Tinkerer's Caches generate components(when near clockwork walls) every minute and a half, from every 35 seconds. Clockwork Slabs generate components once per minute, from once per 50 seconds.

coiax updated:

  • Due to budget cuts, the shuttle's hyperspace engines now create a visual distortion at their destination, a few seconds before arrival. Crewmembers are encouraged to use these "ripples" as an indication of where not to stand.
  • Shuttles now only run over mobs in turfs they are moving into, rather than the entire rectangle.

Wizard's Federation updated:

  • Acolytes of Hades have revealed their true forms.
  • We've discovered a way to traverse portals left behind by Hades, and have discovered a great treasure through it.
  • Hades has undergone Anger Management classes, and should no longer remain wrathful for the duration of his visit.

Xhuis updated:

  • Holy weapons, such as the null rod and possessed blade, now protect from Ratvar's magic.

Kor updated:

  • You can now pick up potted plants.

21 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Nuclear bombs will no longer explode the station if in space. Please be aware of this.

coiax updated:

  • Drone shells can be ordered in Emergency supplies at Cargo.

Quiltyquilty updated:

  • The AI is back in the center of the station. The gravity generator is now where the SMES room used to be. The SMESes are in the equipment room.

Joan updated:

  • Scarab proselytizers are more efficient and will reap more alloy from metal and plasteel.
  • They can also directly convert rods to alloy.

Joan updated:

  • You can now repair clockwork structures with a clockwork proselytizer. This is about a third as efficient as a mending motor, costing 2 liquified alloy to 1 health, and also about a third as fast.

coiax updated:

  • Certain custom station names may be rejected by Centcom.

Joan updated:

  • Those who do not serve Ratvar cannot understand His creations.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • You can now pick up a skateboard and use it as a weapon by dragging it to yourself.
  • Skateboards have been given brand new sprites, courtesy of JStheguy

Cheridan updated:

  • Flashes no longer stun cyborgs, instead working almost exactly like a human, causing them to become confused and unequip their current module.

20 June 2016

Supermichael777 updated:

  • Flaps are no longer space-racist and now accept all bots.

19 June 2016

Kor updated:

  • The comms console now has a new option allowing you to communicate with the other server.

Quiltyquilty updated:

  • The detective has been moved to above the post office.

coiax updated:

  • Birdboat's supply loop has been split into two unconnected halves, to maintain award winning air quality.

Kor updated:

  • Cult runes can only be scribed on station and on mining.

incoming5643 updated:

  • New abilities for some races!
  • Skeletons (liches) and zombies now are much more susceptible to limb loss, but can also reattach lost limbs manually without surgery.
  • Slimepeople can now lose their limbs, but also can regenerate them if they have the jelly for it. Additionally slimepeople will (involuntarily) lose limbs and convert them to slime jelly if they're extremely low on jelly.
  • Zombies and slimepeople now have reversed toxic damage, what usually heals now hurts and what usually hurts now heals. Keep in mind that while you could for example heal with unstable mutagen, you'd still mutate. Beware of secondary effects! Drugs like antitoxin are especially dangerous to these races now since not only do they do toxin damage, but they remove other toxic chems before they can heal you. Be wary also of wide band healing drugs like omnizine.
  • For slime people the above mechanic also adds/drains slime jelly. So yes inhaling plasma is now a valid way to build jelly (but you'll still suffocate if there's no oxygen).
  • Pod people now mutate if shot with the mutation setting of the floral somatoray.

coiax updated:

  • Potted plants can now be ordered from cargo.

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork slabs now produce a component every 50 seconds, from 40, Tinkerer's Caches now produce(if near a clockwork wall) a component every 35 seconds, from 30.
  • Tinkerer's daemons have a slightly higher cooldown for each component of the type they chose to produce that's already in the cache: This is very slight, but it'll add up if you have a lot of one component type and are trying to get more of it with daemons; 5 of a component type will add a second of delay.

Joan updated:

  • Invoking Sevtug now causes massive hallucinations, brain damage, confusion, and dizziness for all non-servant humans on the same zlevel as the invoker.
  • Invoking Sevtug is no longer mind control. RIP mind control 2016-2016.

Joan updated:

  • Servants of ratvar can now create cogscarab shells with a Script scripture. Adding a soul vessel to one will produce a small, drone-like being with an inbuilt proselytizer and tools.
  • Clockwork mobs have their own speechbubble icons.

Wizard's Federation updated:

  • We've fired the old Pope, who was actually an apprentice in disguise. We've a-pope-riately replaced him with a much more experienced magic user.
  • Some less-then-sane people have been sighted forming mysterious cults in lieu of recent Pope sightings, lashing out at anyone who speaks ill of him.
  • We've rejiggered our trans-dimensional rifts, and almost all cases of clergy members being flung into nothingness should be resolved.
  • All members of the Space Wizard's Clergy have been appropriately warned about usage of skin-to-stone spells, and such there should be no more instances of permanent statueification.

18 June 2016

coiax updated:

  • AI turrets no longer fire at drones.

Joan updated:

  • Clock cult scripture unlock now only counts humans and silicons.

17 June 2016

coiax updated:

  • Drones can hear robotic talk, but cannot communicate on it. AIs and cyborgs are encouraged to share information with station repair drones.

Joan updated:

  • Assassin holoparasite attack damage increased from 13 to 15, stealth cooldown decreased from 20 seconds to 16 seconds.
  • Charger holoparasite charge cooldown decreased from 5 seconds to 4 seconds.
  • Chaos holoparasite attack damage decreased from 10 to 7, range decreased from 10 to 7.
  • Lightning holoparasite attack damage increased from 5 to 7, chain damage increased by 33%.

Kor and Iamgoofball updated:

  • Miners can now purchase fulton extraction packs.
  • Miners can now purchase fulton medivac packs.
  • Two new fulton related bundles are available for purchase with vouchers.

16 June 2016

Quiltyquilty updated:

  • Beepsky now has his own home in the labor shuttle room.

Xhuis updated:

  • Revenants have been renamed to umbras and have undergone some tweaks.

coiax updated:

  • Polymorphed mobs now have the same name, and where possible, the same equipment as their previous form.

Joan updated:

  • Anima Fragments are now slightly slower if not at maximum health and no longer drop a soul vessel when destroyed.

Joan updated:

  • Ghosts can now see the Gateway to the Celestial Derelict's remaining time as a countdown.

Quiltyquilty updated:

  • Patches now hold only 40u.
  • Patches in first aid kits now only contain 20u of chemicals.

15 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Removed Dementia Doctrine, replacing it with an Application sigil.
  • Adds the Sigil of Accession, the previously-mentioned Application sigil, which is much like a Sigil of Submission, except it isn't removed on converting un-mindshielded targets and will disappear after converting a mindshielded target.
  • Sigil of Submission is now a Script instead of a Driver; It's unlocked one tier up, so you have to rely on the Drivers you have until you get Scripts, instead of spamming both Driver sigils for free converts.
  • To replace Sigil of Submission in the Driver tier; Added Taunting Tirade, which is a chanted scripture with a very fast invocation, which, on chanting, confuses, dizzies, and briefly stuns nearby non-servants and allows the invoker a brief time to relocate before continuing the chant.

Joan updated:

  • Judicial Markers(the things spawned from Ratvar's Flame, in turn spawned from a Judicial Visor) explode one second faster.

Joan updated:

  • Impaling a target with a ratvarian spear no longer breaks the spear.

Joan updated:

  • Invoking Inath-Neq, the Resonant Cogwheel, now gives total invulnerability to all servants in range for 15 seconds instead of buffing maximum health.

14 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • You can now strike a Tinkerer's Cache with a Clockwork Proselytizer to refill the Proselytizer from the global component cache.
  • The Clockwork Proselytizer requires slightly less alloy to convert windows and windoors.
  • Several clockwork objects have more useful descriptions, most notably including structures, which will show a general health level to non-servants and exact health to servants.
  • The Clockwork Proselytizer has new, more appropriate inhands.

GunHog updated:

  • Gun Hog
  • In response to alarmingly high mining cyborg losses, Nanotrasen has equipped the units with an internal positioning beacon, as standard within the module.

kevinz000 updated:

  • rscadd:Gravity Guns have gained a new mode that shoots a gravitational distortion bolt
  • Gravity Guns should no longer destroy local reality when set to attract and shot in an east cardinal direction. Added safety checks has slightly increased the cost of the gun's fabrication. Nanotrasen apologizes for the inconvenience.
  • Gravity guns now have an inhand sprite.

13 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • All Scripture in the Clockwork Slab's recital has a simple description.

Joan updated:

  • The Gateway to the Celestial Derelict now takes exactly 5 minutes to successfully summon Ratvar and has 500 health, from 1000.
  • You can now actually hit people adjacent to the Gateway; only the center of the Gateway can be attacked. The Gateway is also now dense, allowing you to more easily shoot at it.

Lati updated:

  • Nanotrasen has added one of their rare machine prototypes to cargo's selection. It might be valuable to research.

Xhuis updated:

  • You can now create living cake/cat hybrids through a slightly expensive crafting recipe. These "caks" are remarkably resilient, quickly regenerating any brute damage dealt, and can be attacked on harm intent to take a bite to be fed by a small amount. They serve as mobile sources of food and make great pets.
  • If a brain occupied by a player is used in the crafting recipe for caks, that player then takes control of the cak!

12 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Sigils of Transgression will now only stun for about 5 seconds, from around 10 seconds.
  • Sigils of Submission take about 5 seconds to convert a target, from around 3 seconds, and will glow faintly.
  • Sigils of any type can be attacked with an open hand to destroy them, instead of requiring harm intent. Servants still require harm intent to do so.

Joan updated:

  • Attacking a human you are pulling or have grabbed with a ratvarian spear will impale them, doing massive damage, stunning the target, and breaking the spear if they remain conscious after being attacked.
  • The Function Call verb is now an action button.

xxalpha updated:

  • New wizard spell: Spacetime Distortion.

xxalpha updated:

  • 3x1 grafitti

NikNak updated:

  • Adds an electric guitar for those more hardcore space crewmembers who have a desire to shred.

Xhuis updated:

  • While experimenting with floral genetic engineering, Nanotrasen botanists discovered an explosive variety of the cherry plant. Due to gross misuse, the genes used to produce this strain have been isolated and removed while Central Command decides how best to modify it.

11 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork Slabs, Clockwork Caches near walls, and Tinkerer's Daemons will now be more likely to generate components that the clockwork cult has the least of.
  • Destroyed Clockwork Caches will drop all Tinkerer's Daemons in them.
  • Clockwork Caches can now only generate a component every 30 seconds(when near a clockwork wall), Clockwork Slabs can only generate a component every 40 seconds, and Tinkerer's Daemons can only generate a component every 20 seconds. This should result in higher component generation for everything except Clockwork Caches near clockwork walls.
  • Adding a component to a Clockwork Slab instead puts that component in the global component cache.
  • Clockwork Slabs only generate components if held by a mob or in a mob's storage, and when generating a component will prevent other Slabs held from generating a component.
  • The Replicant Driver no longer costs a Replicant Alloy to invoke; basically you can throw free Slabs at converts.
  • Clockwork Slabs no longer have Repository as a menu option; instead, you can examine them to see how many components they have access to.
  • Clockwork Caches directly on top of clockwork walls won't generate components from that wall.

coiax updated:

  • Ghosts are notified when someone arrives on the Arrivals
  • Shuttle. This is independent of the announcement system, and the (F)
  • link will follow the arrived person.

10 June 2016

phil235 updated:

  • Firelock assemblies can be reinforced with plasteel to construct heavy firelocks.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Malf AI hacking an APC that is then destroyed will no longer bug the AI
  • Being turned into a Revolutionary now stuns you for a short while.
  • Kinetic Accelerators no longer drop their firing pin or cell when destroyed by lava

coiax updated:

  • Slimes and aliens with custom names now retain those names when changing forms.

Name: Lzimann updated:

  • Bar stools are now constructable with metal!

09 June 2016

nullbear updated:

  • Removes the restriction on wormhole jaunters, preventing them from teleporting you to beacons on other z-levels.
  • No longer able to use beacons to bypass normal shuttle/centcomm anti-bluespace measures.

Xhuis updated:

  • You can now remove all plants and weeds from a hydroponics tray by using a spade on it.
  • Added meatwheat, a mutated variant of wheat that can be crushed into meat substitute.
  • Added ambrosia gaia, a mysterious plant that is rumored to provide nutrients and water to any soil - hydroponic or otherwise - that it's planted in.
  • Added cherry bombs, a mutated variant of blue cherries that have an explosively good taste. Oh, and don't pluck the stems.

GunHog updated:

  • Gun Hog
  • Nanotrasen scientists have completed a design for adapting mining cyborgs to the Lavaland Wastes in the form of anti-ash storm plating. Research for this technology must be adapted at your local station.

coiax updated:

  • The beacons from support guardians are now structures, rather than replacing the floor tile. In practice, this will change little, aside from not leaving empty plating when a beacon is removed because a new one has been placed.

Papa Bones updated:

  • Loyalty implants have been refluffed to mindshield implants, they are mechanically the same.

Kor updated:

  • The captain now spawns with the station charter, which allows him to name the station.

08 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Anima Fragments have slightly less health and damage and will slow down for longer when hit.

Kor updated:

  • Colossi now roam the wastes.
  • Bubblegum now roams the wastes.

lordpidey updated:

  • Infernal jaunt has been significantly nerfed with an enter and exit delay.

Joan updated:

  • Anima Fragments have slightly more health and move faster, but slow down temporarily when taking damage. Also they can move in space now.

Fox McCloud updated:

  • Fixes Experimentor critical reactions not working
  • Fixes Experimentor item cloning not working
  • Fixes Experimentor producing coffee vending machines instead of coffe cups
  • Experimentor can only clone critical reaction items instead of anything with an origin tech

Kor updated:

  • The clown will play a sad trombone noise upon death.

07 June 2016

Cruix updated:

  • Changelings no longer lose the regenerate ability if they respect while in regenerative stasis.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • You can now emag chemical dispensers, such as the ones in chemistry or the bar, to unlock illegal chemicals.

GunHog updated:

  • Gun Hog
  • Nanotrasen has approved the Hyper-Kenetic Accelerator upgrade for cyborg mining modules.

GunHog updated:

  • Gun Hog, Wjohnston
  • Each of the heads' ID computers are now themed for their department!

Xhuis updated:

  • Removed the global message played when Nar-Sie _begins_ to spawn (but not when it actually spawns).
  • Drunkenness recovery speed now increases with how drunk the imbiber is and is much quicker when the imbiber is asleep.
  • Suit storage units now take three seconds to enter (up from one) and have different sounds and messages for UV ray cauterization.
  • Fixed some bugs with the suit storage unit, inserting mobs, and contents to seemed to duplicate themselves.
  • The Summon Nar-Sie rune can now only be drawn on original station tiles and fails to invoke if scribed on the station then moved elsewhere.

GunHog updated:

  • Gun Hog
  • Alien (xeno) neurotoxic spit is now a click-to-aim projectile.

coiax updated:

  • Bluespace shelter capsules can no longer be used on shuttles.
  • Bluespace shelters may have different capsules stored. View what your capsule has inside by examining it.

coiax updated:

  • Deadchat is now notified when a sentient mob dies.

Joan updated:

  • This is a bunch of Clockwork Cult changes.
  • Added the Clockwork Obelisk, an Application scripture that produces a clockwork obelisk, which can Hierophant Broadcast a large message to all servants or open a Spatial Gateway with 5 uses and a 10 second duration to any conscious servant or clockwork obelisk.
  • Spatial Gateways of any source have doubled uses and duration when the target is a clockwork obelisk.
  • Added the Mania Motor, an Application scripture that produces a mania motor, which, while active, causes hallucinations and brain damage in all nearby humans.
  • The Mania Motor will try to convert any non-servant human directly adjacent to it at an additional power cost and will remove brain damage, hallucinations, and the druggy effect from servants.
  • Added the Vitality Matrix, an Application scripture that produces a sigil that will slowly drain health from non-servants that remain on it. Servants that remain on the sigil will instead be healed with the vitality drained from non-servants.
  • The Vitality Matrix can revive dead servants for a cost of 25 vitality plus all non-oxygen damage the servant has. If it cannot immediately revive a servant, it will still heal their corpse.
  • Most clockwork structures, including the Mending Motor, Interdiction Lens, and the newly added Clockwork Obelisk and Mania Motor, now require power to function.
  • Mending Motors can still use alloy for power.
  • The Sigil of Transmission has been remade into a power battery and will power directly adjecent clockwork structures. Sigils of Transmission start off with 4000 power and can be recharged with Volt Void.
  • Volt Void drains somewhat more power, but will not damage the invoker unless they drain too much power. Invokers with augmented limbs will instead have those limbs healed unless they drain especially massive amounts of power.
  • Using Volt Void on top of a Sigil of Transmission will transfer most of the power drained to the Sigil of Transmission, effectively making it far less likely to damage the invoker.
  • You can no longer stack most sigils and clockwork objects with themself. You can still have multiple different objects or sigils on a tile, however.
  • The Break Will Script has been renamed to Dementia Doctrine, is slightly faster, and causes slightly more brain damage.
  • The Judicial Visor now uses an action button instead of alt-click. Cultists of Nar-Sie judged by the visor will be stunned for half duration, but will be set on fire.
  • Multiple scriptures have had their component requirements changed. The Summon Judicial Visor Script has been reduced from a Script to a Driver.
  • Recollection will now show both required and consumed components.
  • Clockwork Marauders can now emerge from their host if their host is at or below 60% total health(for humans, this is 20 health out of crit)
  • Clockwork Marauders will slowly heal if directly adjacent to their host and have a slightly larger threshold for their no-Fatigue bonus damage.

Quiltyquilty updated:

  • Botany, atmospherics and cargo now all have access to high-capacity watertanks.

Quiltyquilty updated:

  • The bar has now been outfitted with custom bar stools.

06 June 2016

coiax updated:

  • The Nar'sie rune cannot be scribed on shuttles or off Z-level.
  • The Raise Dead rune automatically grabs the ghost of the raised corpse.

phil235 updated:

  • Monkeys and all other animals that should have blood now has it. Beating them up will make you and your weapon bloody, just like beating a human does. Dragging them when wounded and lying will leave a blood trail. Their blood is still mostly cosmetic, they suffer no effects from low blood level, unlike humans.
  • When a mob leaves a blood trail while dragged, it loses blood. You can no longer drag a corpse to make an inifinite amount of blood trails, because once the victim's blood reaches a certain threshold it no longer leaves a blood trail (and no longer lose any more blood). The threshold depends on how much damage the mob has taken. You can always avoid hurting the dragged mob by making them stand up or by buckling them to something or by putting them in a container.
  • You can no longer empty a mob of its blood entirely with a syringe, once the mob's blood volume reaches a critically low level you are unable to draw any more blood from it.
  • A changeling absorbing a human now sucks all their blood.

Bobylein updated:

  • Nanotrasen is finally able to source transparent bottles for chemistry.

05 June 2016

Joan updated:

  • Clockwork structures can be damaged by projectiles and simple animals, and will actually drop debris when destroyed.
  • AIs and Cyborgs that serve Ratvar can control clockwork airlocks and clockwork windoors.
  • The clockwork proselytizer can now proselytize windows, doors, grilles, and windoors.
  • The clockwork proselytizer can proselytize wall gears and alloy shards to produce replicant alloy. It can also proselytize replicant alloy to refill, in addition to refilling by attacking it with alloy.
  • The clockwork proselytizer can replace clockwork floors with clockwork walls and vice versa.
  • Ratvar will convert windoors, tables, and computers in addition to everything else.
  • Ratvar now moves around much faster.
  • Ratvar and Nar-Sie will break each other's objects.
  • The blind eye from a broken ocular warden now serves as a belligerent eye instead of as replicant alloy. The pinion lock from a deconstructed clockwork airlock now serves as a vanguard cogwheel instead of as replicant alloy.
  • Clockwork walls drop a wall gear when removed by a welding tool. The wall gear is dense, but can be climbed over or unwrenched, and drops alloy shards when broken. Clockwork walls drop alloy shards when broken by other means.
  • Fixed Nar-Sie wandering while battling Ratvar.
  • Ratvarian Spears now last for the proper 5 minute duration.
  • Servant communication now has ghost follow links.
  • New sigil sprites, courtesy Skowron.
  • Sigils of Transgression have a visual effect when stunning a target.
  • Clockwork spears now have a visual effect when breaking.

coiax updated:

  • Cloning pods now grab the clone's mind when the body is ejected,
  • rather than when it starts cloning.

coiax updated:

  • Wizards have been experimenting with summoning the slightly less
  • lethal "laughter demon". Please be aware that these demons appear to be
  • nearly as dangerous as their slaughter cousins. But adorable, nonetheless.

PKPenguin321 updated:

  • The CMO's medical HUD implant now comes with a one-use autoimplanter for ease of use.

coiax updated:

  • Laughter demons should now always let their friends go when
  • asked correctly.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Gravity Guns! It is a mildly expensive R&D gun that has a 5 second cooldown between shots, but doesn't need to be recharged. It has two modes, attract and repulse. For all your gravity-manipulation needs!

X-TheDark updated:

  • Mech battery replacement improved. The inserted battery's charge will be set to the same percentage of the removed one's (or 10%, if removed one's was less).

04 June 2016

Lzimann updated:

  • rscadd: You can now configure air alarms to filter BZ gas!

RemieRichards updated:

  • Slimes may now be ordered to attack! You must be VERY good friends with the slime(s) to give this command, asking them to attack their friends or other slimes will result in them liking you less so be careful!

coiax updated:

  • Clicking the (F) link when an AI talks in binary chat will
  • follow its camera eye, the same as when (F) is clicked for its radio
  • chat.

03 June 2016

Xhuis updated:

  • Clockwork marauders can now smash walls and tables.
  • Servants are no longer turned into harvesters by Nar-Sie but instead take heavy brute damage and begin to bleed. Similarly, cultists are no longer converted by Ratvar but instead take heavy fire damage and are set ablaze.
  • Added clockwork reclaimers. Ghosts can now click on Ratvar to become clockwork reclaimers - small constructs capable of forcefully converting those that still resist Ratvar's reign.
